translation.zh: 是否有途径处罚他
translation.en: Is there a way to punish him?
translation.source: 是否有途径处罚他
translation.medium: Can you punish him?
translation.reference: Is there a way to punish him?

translation.zh: 以免再次发生这样的事情
translation.en: So that such a thing won’t happen again.
translation.source: 以免再次发生这样的事情
translation.medium: To avoid such incidents from happening again.
translation.reference: So that such a thing won’t happen again.

translation.zh: 又或者餐厅还要多久会准备好？可不可以帮我问下？
translation.en: And how much longer does it take for the restaurant to prepare it? Could could help me ask them?
translation.source: 又或者餐厅还要多久会准备好？可不可以帮我问下？
translation.medium: Or how long will the restaurant take to prepare? Can you help me ask?
translation.reference: And how much longer does it take for the restaurant to prepare it? Could could help me ask them?

translation.zh: 浙大学术年会上学生唱主角 研究成果让人脑洞大开-新华网
translation.en: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 浙大学术年会上学生唱主角 研究成果让人脑洞大开-新华网
translation.medium: A student from Zhejiang University sings the main theme at the academic conference, and his research results make people's brains "open up" - Xinhua Net.
translation.reference: Students played the leading role at the Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University with creative research achievements - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
translation.en: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 用空气来洗手，哈口气判断疾病，精确搜寻雾霾来源 昨天晚上，在浙江大学2016年学术年会开幕式上，一系列脑洞大开的学术成果获得表彰。
translation.medium: Use air to wash your hands, hah, judge the disease by your breath, and accurately search for the source of the haze. Yesterday evening, at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Academic Conference of Zhejiang University, a series of groundbreaking academic achievements were awarded.
translation.reference: Washing hands with air, diagnosing disease through breath, and accurately seeking for source of smog; last night, a series of creative academic achievements were awarded at the opening ceremony of the 2016 Annual Academic Conference of Zhejiang University.

translation.zh: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
translation.en: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.
translation.source: 这些成果的主要研究者都是学生，研究覆盖了环境、机械、能源、医疗、生命科学、人文教育等各大领域，同学们从一个好奇的点子开始，创造出了许多具有应用价值的高端发明，其中一些项目已在国内国际获奖。
translation.medium: The main researchers of these achievements are all students. The research covers various fields such as environmental science, mechanical engineering, energy, medicine, life sciences, humanities, and education. The students started from a curious point and created many high-end inventions with practical value. Some of these projects have won awards both domestically and internationally.
translation.reference: The main researchers of these achievements are students, with research covering major fields of environment, machinery, energy, medicine, life science and humanities education; students created many high-end inventions with application values from a curious idea, and some of them have won awards at home and abroad.

translation.zh: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
translation.en: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor
translation.source: 生物传感器：你的家庭体检医生
translation.medium: Biological Sensor: Your Family Doctor
translation.reference: Biosensor: your home physical examination doctor

translation.zh: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
translation.en: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.
translation.source: 生物医学工程学院博士生张迪鸣团队现场展示了一个智能手机端的生物传感器，大小只有智能手机的一半。
translation.medium: Zhang Dingyun, a team member of the Biomedical Engineering Department's doctoral program, demonstrated a smartphone-end biological sensor on the spot, with a size only half that of a smartphone.
translation.reference: The team of Zhang Diming, a doctoral student of School of Biomedical Engineering, showed a biosensor on the smart phone with the size of only a half of a smart phone.

translation.zh: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
translation.en: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”
translation.source: “你只需要轻轻呼一口气，这套仪器就能从你呼出的气体成分中，初步检测身体健康状况 。 ”
translation.medium: “You just need to blow lightly into this device, and it can initially detect your body's health condition from the components of the air you exhale.”
translation.reference: “All you need to do is to breathe out, and this set of instrument can detect your physical conditions preliminarily from the components of the air you breathe out.”

translation.zh: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
translation.en: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.
translation.source: 张迪鸣介绍说，这套传感器与智能手机相连，呼出气体后，健康报告就会显示在手机上。
translation.medium: Zhang Ding introduced that this sensor is connected to a smartphone, and when it calls out the gas, the health report will be displayed on the phone.
translation.reference: Zhang Diming introduced, this set of sensor is connected to the smart phone; after you breathe out, the health report will be shown on your phone.

translation.zh: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
translation.en: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
translation.source: 市场上能够检测健康状况的智能手环，一般检测的是温度、脉搏等物理参数。
translation.medium: There are smartwatches on the market that can detect health conditions. Generally, they detect physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.
translation.reference: Smart bands on the market which can detect health conditions often measure physical parameters such as temperature and pulse.

translation.zh: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
translation.en: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.
translation.source: 而这套生物传感器运用了石墨烯这种新型材料，它的目标物是化学元素，敏锐的“嗅觉”让它能更深度、准确地体现身体健康状况。
translation.medium: This set of biological sensors uses a new type of material, graphene, as its target substance. Its sensitive "nose" allows it to detect chemical elements more deeply and accurately, reflecting the body's health status.
translation.reference: This set of biological sensor uses the new material of graphene; its target is chemical elements, and its keen “sense of smell” enables it to reflect the health status of the body more in-depth and accurately.

translation.zh: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
translation.en: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors
translation.source: 智能手术灯：医生的高能眼睛
translation.medium: Smart Surgical Light: Surgeons' High-Powered Eyes
translation.reference: Smart operation lamp: high-functioning eyes for doctors

translation.zh: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
translation.en: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.
translation.source: 除了智能手机，手术室里也用起了智能手术灯。
translation.medium: Besides smartphones, surgical rooms are also using smart surgical lights.
translation.reference: In addition to smart phones, smart operation lamps are now being used in operating rooms.

translation.zh: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
translation.en: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.
translation.source: 这项发明在今年第44届瑞士日内瓦国际发明展中获得银奖。
translation.medium: This invention won a silver medal at the 44th Swiss International Invention Exhibition in Geneva this year.
translation.reference: This invention has won the silver prize in the 44th International Exhibition of Inventions in Geneva, Switzerland this year.

translation.zh: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
translation.en: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.
translation.source: 光电科学与工程学院硕士生朱林靖、申俊飞团队在传统手术灯的缺陷中开启了新思路，发明了智能LED手术无影灯。
translation.medium: Graduate student Jia Linjing and Shen Junfeng team from the College of Optoelectronics and Engineering started a new approach in the deficiencies of traditional surgical lamps and invented the intelligent LED surgical shadowless lamp.
translation.reference: The team of Zhu Linjing and Shen Junfei, two graduate students from School of Optoelectronic Science and Engineering, developed a new idea trying to solve the defects of traditional operating lamps and invented the smart LED operation shadow-less lamp.

translation.zh: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
translation.en: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”
translation.source: “很多疾病早期检测、切除不到位，跟医生手术室用的灯有关 。 ”
translation.medium: “Many diseases are detected too late for surgery, and it is related to the light used in the operating room with the doctor.”
translation.reference: “Improper early detection of many diseases and inaccurate excision are related to operation lamps used by doctors.”

translation.zh: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
translation.en: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.
translation.source: 申俊飞说，比如癌症早期检查时，医生如果不能及时看清所有肿瘤组织，那么之后癌细胞还会扩散。
translation.medium: Shen Junfeng said, for example, when conducting early-stage cancer screening, if the doctor cannot quickly identify all tumor tissues, the cancer cells will continue to spread afterward.
translation.reference: According to Shen Junfei, for example, in early inspection of cancer, if doctors cannot see clearly all the tumor tissues in a timely manner, the tumor cells will still spread.

translation.zh: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
translation.en: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.
translation.source: 这种智能手术灯有四个灯盘，通过调节光谱，来增强不同组织在光照下的区别度。
translation.medium: This type of smart surgical light has four light bulbs, and by adjusting the spectrum, it enhances the difference between different tissues under illumination.
translation.reference: This type of smart operation lamp has four lamp panels, which enhance the distinction degree of different tissues by adjusting the spectrum.

translation.zh: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
translation.en: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.
translation.source: 在手术过程中，医生可以根据手术需要和个人习惯，随时调节光斑的大小、光亮程度、光谱、颜色均匀性以及无影率。
translation.medium: During the surgical procedure, the doctor can adjust the size, brightness, spectrum, color uniformity, and transparency of the light spots according to the surgical needs and personal habits, at any time.
translation.reference: During the operation process, doctors can adjust the size of light spot, brightness, spectrum, color uniformness and shadow-less degree any time according to demands of operation and personal habits.

translation.zh: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
translation.en: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.
translation.source: 这种智能手术灯已经在浙江大学医学院附属邵逸夫医院、浙江大学医学院附属儿童医院等医院试用，得到较好的反馈。
translation.medium: This kind of intelligent surgical light has been used in Zhejiang University Affiliated Huashan Hospital, Zhejiang University Affiliated Children's Hospital, and other hospitals for clinical trials, and has received good feedback.
translation.reference: This type of smart operating lamp has been tried in hospitals such as Sir Run Shaw Hospital Afflicted to Zhejiang University Medical College and the Children’s Hospital Affiliated to Zhejiang University Medical College, and received favorable feedback.

translation.zh: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
translation.en: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.
translation.source: 去年十月，这项发明获得国家挑战杯一等奖。
translation.medium: In October of last year, this invention won the first prize in the national challenge cup.
translation.reference: Last October, this invention won the first prize of the National Challenge Cup Competition.

translation.zh: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
translation.en: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way
translation.source: 用空气洗手：省水又酷炫
translation.medium: Use air to wash your hands: Save water and be cool.
translation.reference: Washing hands with air: save water in a cool way

translation.zh: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
translation.en: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.
translation.source: 普通人洗手就是用水冲，顶多擦点肥皂，挤点洗手液，而李启章等同学则发明了一套“空气洗手装置 ” 。
translation.medium: Ordinary people wash their hands by using water to spray and rubbing some soap on them, while Li Qichang and his classmates invented an "air washing machine" device.
translation.reference: Normally, people wash hands by flushing hands with water, with a little soap and sanitizer at most; however, Li Qizhang and his classmates invented a set of “equipment to wash hands with air”.

translation.zh: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
translation.en: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.
translation.source: 只要站上装置的洗手台，我们的体重就能将空气压缩而出。
translation.medium: As long as there is a hand-washing station installed on the platform, our body weight can squeeze the air out.
translation.reference: As long as we stand on the washbasin of the equipment, our weight can compress the air out.

translation.zh: “就像是一个打气筒。
translation.en: “Just like an inflator.
translation.source: “就像是一个打气筒。
translation.medium: “Just like a pressure cooker.”
translation.reference: “Just like an inflator.

translation.zh: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
translation.en: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.
translation.source: 压缩出的空气，在水龙头处形成流体，和水结合在一起。
translation.medium: The compressed air is discharged and forms a fluid at the water nozzle, and is combined with water.
translation.reference: The air compressed out can form a flow at the faucet and combine with water.

translation.zh: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
translation.en: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”
translation.source: 这样，我们就能把手洗干净啦 ！ ”
translation.medium: "So, we can wash our hands clean!"
translation.reference: As such, we can wash our hands clean!”

translation.zh: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
translation.en: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.
translation.source: 显色反应和细菌残留实验证明：通过这种方法洗手的效果，和普通的洗手方法是一样的。
translation.medium: The results of the color reaction and bacterial survival experiments demonstrate that the effectiveness of hand washing is the same as that of conventional hand washing methods.
translation.reference: Chromogenic reaction and germ residue experiment results prove that the effect of hand washing this way is the same as that of the ordinary method.

translation.zh: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
translation.en: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.
translation.source: 这个装置只需要依靠我们自身的重力作为驱动，既能保证洗净程度，又能节约90%的水，整个过程完全无能耗，节能环保。
translation.medium: This device relies solely on our own gravity as a driving force, ensuring cleaning quality while saving 90% of water. The entire process is completely energy-efficient and environmentally friendly.
translation.reference: This equipment is only driven by our weight, which can not only guarantee we wash our hands clean, but also save 90% of water; the entire process has no energy consumption and is energy-saving and environment-friendly.

translation.zh: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
translation.en: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.
translation.source: 去年，在第二届全球重大挑战峰会中，这项发明在诸多世界顶尖名校中脱颖而出，获得唯一的金奖。
translation.medium: Last year, at the Second Global Major Challenge Conference, this invention stood out in numerous world-class schools and won the only gold award.
translation.reference: Last year, at the 2nd Global Grand Challenge Summit, this invention emerged among all the top universities in the world and was awarded with the only gold award.

translation.en: A certificate I deem meaningful, Certificate of First Aid
translation.source: 觉得很有意义的一本证书——急救证
translation.medium: A certificate that feels meaningful - Emergency Certificate
translation.reference: A certificate I deem meaningful, Certificate of First Aid

translation.zh: 这是我除了驾驶证之外一本觉得重要的技能证书之一！
translation.en: I think this is one of the most important skill type certificate except for driving license!
translation.source: 这是我除了驾驶证之外一本觉得重要的技能证书之一！
translation.medium: This is a skill certificate that I think is important besides my driver's license!
translation.reference: I think this is one of the most important skill type certificate except for driving license!

translation.zh: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
translation.en: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.
translation.source: 普及一下：急救措施其实是做发生突发事件时候的应急救援，即在救护车来之前的抢救。
translation.medium: Popularize: In fact, the emergency rescue measures are emergency rescue measures to be taken when a sudden event occurs, that is, rescue before the arrival of the ambulance.
translation.reference: For your information: first aid measures refer to emergency rescue in emergencies, i.e., emergency treatment conducted before the coming of the ambulance.

translation.zh: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
translation.en: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.
translation.source: 众所周知，在事故发生后救护车来的过程中其实是还有一段时间的，而正是这段时间才是最关键的。
translation.medium: Everyone knows that there is still a period of time after the accident occurs before the ambulance arrives, and it is precisely during this period of time that is the most critical.
translation.reference: As everyone knows, there is a period before the coming of the ambulance after the accident happens, which is most critical.

translation.zh: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
translation.en: This period is the most important time for first aid.
translation.source: 这个时候便是需要急救的时候。
translation.medium: This is the time when you need emergency help.
translation.reference: This period is the most important time for first aid.

translation.zh: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
translation.en: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
translation.source: 如果我真的发生了心脏病、脑溢血、呼吸骤停，那么我们生命的窗口只有四分钟，黄金四分钟！
translation.medium: If I really have a heart attack, brain hemorrhage, and respiratory arrest, then our window of life is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!
translation.reference: If we suffer from heart attack, cerebral hemorrhage or respiratory arrest, our life window is only four minutes, the golden four minutes!

translation.zh: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
translation.en: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!
translation.source: 所以身边的人懂得急救是多么重要呀！
translation.medium: So, how important is it for people around you to know first aid?!
translation.reference: So it is very important for those around us to know first aid!

translation.zh: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
translation.en: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.
translation.source: 当我们身边有人倒下的时候，我们可以通过专业的知识去对他进行抢救，而不是傻傻地站在那里一动不动什么也做不了，这种无助的感觉太让人感到可怕了。
translation.medium: When someone falls down near us, we can use our professional knowledge to rescue them instead of just standing there doing nothing, which is too helpless and terrifying.
translation.reference: When somebody falls down, we can conduct first aid with our professional knowledge, instead of doing nothing and only standing there; this helpless feeling is really frightening.

translation.zh: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
translation.en: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.
translation.source: “在中国，我们官方数据每年有三百万人意外死亡，最危险的叫心脏骤停。
translation.medium: “In China, our official data shows that there are 300,000 people who die from accidents every year, and the most dangerous one is sudden heart failure.”
translation.reference: “In China, 3 million people die from accidents every year according to official data, and the most dangerous one is known as cardiac arrest.

translation.zh: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
translation.en: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.
translation.source: 在美国全国是平均15%能救过来。
translation.medium: In the United States, the average rate of survival is 15%.
translation.reference: 15% of people of cardiac arrest can be brought back to life in the United States.

translation.zh: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
translation.en: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”
translation.source: 在拉斯维加斯的赌场酒店，百分之七八十能救过来，上海、北京低于1%。”
translation.medium: In the casino hotels in Las Vegas, 78% can be saved, while in Shanghai and Beijing, it is below 1%.
translation.reference: In the Casino Hotel in Las Vegas, 70% or 80% of them can be brought back to life, and the proportion in Shanghai and Beijing is lower than 1%. ”

translation.zh: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
translation.en: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.
translation.source: 这是第一反应创始人陆乐说的。
translation.medium: This is what the first reaction founder Luo Le said.
translation.reference: Said Lu Le, the founder of the First Reaction.

translation.zh: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
translation.en: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.
translation.source: 如果一个人发生了心脏骤停，呼吸没有了，心跳没有了，你掐人中是没有任何作用的。
translation.medium: If a person has a heart attack, stops breathing, and has no pulse, performing CPR on them is useless.
translation.reference: Pinching philtrum has no effect at all if a person suffers from cardiac arrest and there is no sign of breathing or heartbeat.

translation.zh: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
translation.en: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.
translation.source: 必须做人工呼吸、胸外按压才有可能把人救过来。
translation.medium: It is necessary to perform artificial respiration and chest compressions in order to possibly save a person.
translation.reference: Artificial respiration and external chest compression are required to bring them back to life.

translation.zh: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
translation.en: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.
translation.source: 我发现我们现在还很少人会有这种意识去学习急救，但是当事情发生的时候就来不及了，所以还是呼吁大家都去学习一下这个技能，让我们在面对突发状况的时候能够及时作出反应。
translation.medium: I have found that few people nowadays have the awareness to learn first aid, but when the situation occurs, it is too late to learn. Therefore, I still urge everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond promptly in emergency situations.
translation.reference: I found that very few people have the awareness to study first aid knowledge, but it will be too late once accident happens; therefore, I appeal to everyone to learn this skill, so that we can respond timely when faced with emergency situations.

translation.zh: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
translation.en: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!
translation.source: 说不定还能挽救一个人的生命！
translation.medium: Maybe you can still save a person's life!
translation.reference: We may bring somebody back to life with this skill!

I saw on Little Red Book that there is a diving emergency certification that you can take, and it seems that you need the emergency certification to take the diving certification. So it turns out that the emergency certification is still very useful!

translation.zh: 烂片分很多种，让你能在电影院里酣然入睡的算一种，让你看完后义愤填膺的也算一种，《四海》对观众来说就像是峨眉山上的猴子，它能用无数种方式来点燃你的怒火。
translation.en: There are many types of terrible films; some make you sleep soundly in the cinema, some make you angry after watching it; Only Fools Rush In is like monkeys on Mount Emei; it can ignite your anger in countless ways.
translation.source: 烂片分很多种，让你能在电影院里酣然入睡的算一种，让你看完后义愤填膺的也算一种，《四海》对观众来说就像是峨眉山上的猴子，它能用无数种方式来点燃你的怒火。
translation.medium: There are many types of movies, and falling asleep in the cinema is one of them. Watching a movie that makes you angry afterward is also one of them. "The Four Seas" is like a monkey on Mount Emei, it can ignite your anger in countless ways.
translation.reference: There are many types of terrible films; some make you sleep soundly in the cinema, some make you angry after watching it; Only Fools Rush In is like monkeys on Mount Emei; it can ignite your anger in countless ways.

translation.en: In addition to the plots, the theme of the film is even more terrible, or you can say there is no theme in the film; it’s just a horrible monster that is stitched together.
translation.source: 除了情节外，更糟糕的是电影的主旨，或者说这电影根本没有主旨，就是一个面目可憎的缝合怪。
translation.medium: Apart from the plot, what's even worse is the theme of the movie, or rather, this movie has no theme at all, it's just a grotesque Frankenstein's monster.
translation.reference: In addition to the plots, the theme of the film is even more terrible, or you can say there is no theme in the film; it’s just a horrible monster that is stitched together.

translation.zh: 影片开头你会以为他想拍个喜剧片，20多分钟后你猜它也许是个励志片，看一半时你觉得它可能是个想体现小镇青年生存不易的剧情片，看完后你就压根也不知道自己究竟看了个啥，随之而来的是对自己深深的怀疑，大过年的为什么要跑到电影院去欣赏大便。
translation.en: In the beginning of the film, you may think he wants to make a comedy; after twenty minutes, you may guess it’s an inspiration film; after a half of it, you may think it’s a drama showcasing the hardship of a small town boy; after you watch all of it, you don’t even know what you have watched; what follows is deep doubt in yourself; why would you go to the cinema to watch a piece of shit during the Spring Festival?
translation.source: 影片开头你会以为他想拍个喜剧片，20多分钟后你猜它也许是个励志片，看一半时你觉得它可能是个想体现小镇青年生存不易的剧情片，看完后你就压根也不知道自己究竟看了个啥，随之而来的是对自己深深的怀疑，大过年的为什么要跑到电影院去欣赏大便。
translation.medium: At the beginning of the video, you will think he wants to make a comedy film. After 20 minutes, you may guess it's a motivational film. Halfway through, you may think it's a drama that portrays the struggles of young people in a small town. By the end, you won't know what you've watched, and you will be filled with doubts. Why did you go to the cinema to watch a movie about taking a dump on New Year's Day?
translation.reference: In the beginning of the film, you may think he wants to make a comedy; after twenty minutes, you may guess it’s an inspiration film; after a half of it, you may think it’s a drama showcasing the hardship of a small town boy; after you watch all of it, you don’t even know what you have watched; what follows is deep doubt in yourself; why would you go to the cinema to watch a piece of shit during the Spring Festival?

translation.zh: 对于大部分人来说其实也都非常熟悉各类电影的套路了，比如你要想拍摩托车手，那就励志＋喜剧然后告诉观众一个有天赋的菜鸟是如何一步步走向成功的。
translation.en: Most people are familiar with the routines of various films; for example, if you want to make a film about a biker, then make it an inspiration + comedy to tell the audience how a talented rookie achieves success step by step.
translation.source: 对于大部分人来说其实也都非常熟悉各类电影的套路了，比如你要想拍摩托车手，那就励志＋喜剧然后告诉观众一个有天赋的菜鸟是如何一步步走向成功的。
translation.medium: For most people, it's actually quite familiar with various types of movie clichés. For example, if you want to make a motorcycle stuntman, you can use inspiration + comedy to tell the audience how a talented chef became successful step by step.
translation.reference: Most people are familiar with the routines of various films; for example, if you want to make a film about a biker, then make it an inspiration + comedy to tell the audience how a talented rookie achieves success step by step.

translation.zh: 如果你想拍爱情片，那你就老老实实讲喜欢骑摩托的小镇青年和服务员妹子之间的恩怨纠葛。
translation.en: If you want to make a love film, just tell the story about a small town boy who loves to ride motorcycle and a girl who works as a waitress.
translation.source: 如果你想拍爱情片，那你就老老实实讲喜欢骑摩托的小镇青年和服务员妹子之间的恩怨纠葛。
translation.medium: If you want to make a romantic movie, then you should talk about the love between a motorcycle-riding young man from a small town and a waitress.
translation.reference: If you want to make a love film, just tell the story about a small town boy who loves to ride motorcycle and a girl who works as a waitress.

translation.zh: 如果你想反映现实，那最起码你的情节不能出现和正常世界相悖的东西。
translation.en: If you want to reflect reality, then the plot should not have anything that is contradictory to the normal world.
translation.source: 如果你想反映现实，那最起码你的情节不能出现和正常世界相悖的东西。
translation.medium: If you want to reflect reality, at least your plot shouldn't contain things that contradict the normal world.
translation.reference: If you want to reflect reality, then the plot should not have anything that is contradictory to the normal world.

translation.zh: （比如尹正演的那个新摩托刚被烧了，然后还能唱歌的角色），就不能去开一些连肯尼迪看了都遭不住的脑洞。
translation.en: (Such as the character played by Yin Zheng who sang after his new motorcycle was just burned ) please don’t think about ideas that are ridiculous.
translation.source: （比如尹正演的那个新摩托刚被烧了，然后还能唱歌的角色），就不能去开一些连肯尼迪看了都遭不住的脑洞。
translation.medium: For example, the character played by Yan Jieyuan in the new motorcycle movie that was just burned and can still sing, you can't go open some brain holes that even Kennedy couldn't resist.
translation.reference: (Such as the character played by Yin Zheng who sang after his new motorcycle was just burned ) please don’t think about ideas that are ridiculous.

translation.zh: 至于女主明明不是弱智可在某些方面表现的就像个5岁小孩，我真不知道这是演技的原因还是导演的要求。
translation.en: As for why the female leading role acts like a five-year-old child when she is not retarded at all, I really don’t know if there is problem with her acting or it was demanded by the director.
translation.source: 至于女主明明不是弱智可在某些方面表现的就像个5岁小孩，我真不知道这是演技的原因还是导演的要求。
translation.medium: As for the female lead, she is not a weak-minded person who can only show some childish behavior in certain aspects, like a 5-year-old child. I really don't know if this is due to her acting skills or the director's requirements.
translation.reference: As for why the female leading role acts like a five-year-old child when she is not retarded at all, I really don’t know if there is problem with her acting or it was demanded by the director.

translation.zh: 还有一点我也挺想不明白，韩寒作为一个赛车手为什么这么热衷于在他自己的电影里添加撞车情节？
translation.en: And one more thing I don’t understand is why Han Han as a racer is so keen on adding the plot of car crash in his films?
translation.source: 还有一点我也挺想不明白，韩寒作为一个赛车手为什么这么热衷于在他自己的电影里添加撞车情节？
translation.medium: There's one thing I also don't understand, why is Lee Hanyu so passionate about adding a collision scene in his own movie?
translation.reference: And one more thing I don’t understand is why Han Han as a racer is so keen on adding the plot of car crash in his films?

translation.zh: 这样的电影安排在春节档里，难道是为了给观众添堵吗？
translation.en: Is such a film being arranged in the Spring Festival season to humiliate the audience?
translation.source: 这样的电影安排在春节档里，难道是为了给观众添堵吗？
translation.medium: Is it to give the audience a headache by scheduling such a movie during the Spring Festival holiday?
translation.reference: Is such a film being arranged in the Spring Festival season to humiliate the audience?

translation.zh: 郑州宜欣是国内混凝土检查井模块砖机设备，检查井砌块机械，井壁墙体模块机械专业的生产厂家，从半自动到全自动化生产线。
translation.en: Zhengzhou Yixin is a specialized manufacturer of concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, inspection shaft building block machinery and shaft wall module equipment, with semi-automatic and automatic production lines.
translation.source: 郑州宜欣是国内混凝土检查井模块砖机设备，检查井砌块机械，井壁墙体模块机械专业的生产厂家，从半自动到全自动化生产线。
translation.medium: Zhengzhou Yiheng is a domestic manufacturer of modular inspection well equipment, including inspection well block machines and inspection well wall body module machines. It is a professional manufacturer of mechanical equipment for inspection wells, from semi-automatic to fully automatic production lines.
translation.reference: Zhengzhou Yixin is a specialized manufacturer of concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, inspection shaft building block machinery and shaft wall module equipment, with semi-automatic and automatic production lines.

translation.zh: 通过多年的实践和开发，现具备了质量过硬，主要生产液压式、移动式、全自动化检查井系列设备及配套装置。
translation.en: Based on practice and development of many years, it is engaged in production of high quality hydraulic type, mobile type and automatic inspection shaft series of equipment and supporting devices.
translation.source: 通过多年的实践和开发，现具备了质量过硬，主要生产液压式、移动式、全自动化检查井系列设备及配套装置。
translation.medium: Through years of practice and development, we now have the ability to produce high-quality equipment, mainly producing hydraulic, mobile, and fully automatic inspection equipment and accompanying devices.
translation.reference: Based on practice and development of many years, it is engaged in production of high quality hydraulic type, mobile type and automatic inspection shaft series of equipment and supporting devices.

translation.zh: 检查井混凝土模块生产加工设备 郑州井壁砖模块设备的特点及优势:
translation.en: Inspection shaft concrete module production and processing equipment, the characteristics and advantages of Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment
translation.source: 检查井混凝土模块生产加工设备 郑州井壁砖模块设备的特点及优势:
translation.medium: Check the production and processing equipment for concrete blocks and brick molds: The characteristics and advantages of the equipment for producing and processing brick molds in Zhengzhou.
translation.reference: Inspection shaft concrete module production and processing equipment, the characteristics and advantages of Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment

translation.zh: 宜欣检查井砌块砖机设备广泛适用于煤、热、水、电、气等市政地下构筑物的新型砌筑材料。
translation.en: Yixin inspection shaft module brick equipment is widely applied in new-type masonry materials for municipal underground structures for coal, heating, electricity and gas.
translation.source: 宜欣检查井砌块砖机设备广泛适用于煤、热、水、电、气等市政地下构筑物的新型砌筑材料。
translation.medium: The new type of construction material for underground infrastructure such as coal, heat, water, electricity, gas, etc. is widely applicable to the inspection of tunnel lining blocks and brick-making equipment.
translation.reference: Yixin inspection shaft module brick equipment is widely applied in new-type masonry materials for municipal underground structures for coal, heating, electricity and gas.

translation.zh: 如：排水、储水设施的各类检查井、雨水口、方沟、化粪池及小型构筑物、桥梁翼墙等。
translation.en: Foe example: various types of inspection shafts, gutter inlets, box drains, septic tanks, small-sized structures and wing walls of bridges for drainage and water storage facilities.
translation.source: 如：排水、储水设施的各类检查井、雨水口、方沟、化粪池及小型构筑物、桥梁翼墙等。
translation.medium: Such as: inspection wells for drainage and storage facilities, rainwater outlets, trenches, sewage treatment pools and small constructional structures, wing walls of bridges, etc.
translation.reference: Foe example: various types of inspection shafts, gutter inlets, box drains, septic tanks, small-sized structures and wing walls of bridges for drainage and water storage facilities.

translation.zh: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
translation.en: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.
translation.source: 使用混凝土模块筑建检查井的优势在于模块的上下左右四周均为凹凸槽结构，组合砌筑形成链锁。
translation.medium: The advantage of using precast concrete modules to build inspection wells is that the upper and lower, left and right sides of the module are all recessed groove structures, which are combined to form a chain.
translation.reference: The advantage of building inspection shafts using concrete modules is that the four sides of the modules are of concave groove structures, which are built to form chain locks.

translation.zh: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
translation.en: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.
translation.source: 井壁墙体抗剪力远优于平摩擦砌体的砌筑形式。
translation.medium: The wall body of a well has a far better anti-cutting performance than the cast-in-place construction form of a plain surface.
translation.reference: The shearing resistance of the shaft wall is far better than the masonry form of the flat friction of the brickwork.

translation.zh: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
translation.en: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.
translation.source: 模块为中空结构，组合砌筑后纵向孔孔相通，横向孔孔相贯，孔芯浇注后，形成现浇混凝土网状结构，起到了二次补强和防水作用。
translation.medium: The module is a hollow structure, composed of which is connected by vertical and horizontal holes. After the holes are filled with concrete, it forms a net-like structure of reinforced concrete, which plays a role of secondary reinforcement and waterproofing.
translation.reference: The modules are of hollow structure, with connected holes vertically and interpenetrated horizontally; the cast-in-place concrete mesh structure is formed after pouring of the cores of holes, playing the role of secondary reinforcement and waterproof.

translation.zh: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
translation.en: The joint bar grooves are equipped for modules vertically and horizontally; the horizontal and vertical joint bars can improve the overall strength of the structure.
translation.source: 模块纵横均设有插筋槽，横向卧筋、纵向插筋相应提高结构整体强度。
translation.medium: The module is designed with through-hole slots on both the longitudinal and transverse directions, which enhances the overall structural strength in both the longitudinal and transverse directions.
translation.reference: The joint bar grooves are equipped for modules vertically and horizontally; the horizontal and vertical joint bars can improve the overall strength of the structure.

translation.zh: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
translation.en: In addition, phenomena such as collapse, sink or water leakage are rare in the inspection shafts and pumping shafts laid with concrete inspection shaft modules, with stable mechanical performance in shaft wall modules, easy operation and standard forming size.
translation.source: 另外使用混凝土检查井模块砌筑出来的检查井、排水井不容易出现坍塌，下沉，漏水等现象，井壁墙体模块机械性能稳定，操作简单，成形尺寸标准。
translation.medium: In addition, the inspection well and drainage well made of reinforced concrete are less likely to experience collapses, sinking, leaks, etc., and the wall body module has good mechanical performance, simple operation, and standardized dimensions.
translation.reference: In addition, phenomena such as collapse, sink or water leakage are rare in the inspection shafts and pumping shafts laid with concrete inspection shaft modules, with stable mechanical performance in shaft wall modules, easy operation and standard forming size.

translation.zh: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备智能控制配备数据输入、输出装置一键通触摸式液晶显示监控机械操作全部过程，实现理想的人机对话、自动分析比料、密度运转、安全逻辑控制及故障诊断系统。
translation.en: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment can automatically control the input and output of the configured data, and the one-key contact crystal display can monitor all the process of mechanical operation to realize ideal man-machine dialogue, automatic analysis on materials, density operation, safety logic control and fault diagnosis system.
translation.source: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备智能控制配备数据输入、输出装置一键通触摸式液晶显示监控机械操作全部过程，实现理想的人机对话、自动分析比料、密度运转、安全逻辑控制及故障诊断系统。
translation.medium: The concrete inspection well module brick machine equipment intelligent control system is equipped with data input and output devices, which can monitor the entire process of mechanical operation through a touch-sensitive liquid crystal display. The system realizes the ideal human-machine dialogue, automatic batching of materials, density control during transportation, safety logic control, and fault diagnosis system.
translation.reference: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment can automatically control the input and output of the configured data, and the one-key contact crystal display can monitor all the process of mechanical operation to realize ideal man-machine dialogue, automatic analysis on materials, density operation, safety logic control and fault diagnosis system.

translation.zh: 井壁墙体模块机械液压系统采用单缸液压、输送，双缸液压、输送。
translation.en: Single-cylinder and double-cylinder hydraulic pressure and transportation are adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical and hydraulic system.
translation.source: 井壁墙体模块机械液压系统采用单缸液压、输送，双缸液压、输送。
translation.medium: The mechanical hydraulic system of the cavity wall body adopts single-cylinder hydraulic, transmission, and double-cylinder hydraulic, transmission.
translation.reference: Single-cylinder and double-cylinder hydraulic pressure and transportation are adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical and hydraulic system.

translation.zh: 独立的液压集成站，避免了由于主机振动对液压系统的影响，从而保证液压系统工作的可靠性。
translation.en: The independent hydraulic integration station is utilized to avoid the influences on the hydraulic system caused by vibration of the master so as to ensure reliability of the operation of the hydraulic system.
translation.source: 独立的液压集成站，避免了由于主机振动对液压系统的影响，从而保证液压系统工作的可靠性。
translation.medium: An independent hydraulic integration station, avoiding the influence of mainframe vibration on the hydraulic system, thereby ensuring the reliability of the hydraulic system.
translation.reference: The independent hydraulic integration station is utilized to avoid the influences on the hydraulic system caused by vibration of the master so as to ensure reliability of the operation of the hydraulic system.

translation.zh: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备布料箱行进模箱脱模上升，储料箱门关闭，自动输送托板，全部由液压系统独立完成，从而达到减少机械的磨损和维修。
translation.en: In the concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, the fabric box proceeding box de-molds and lifts, the storage box door closes, and the supporting plate is transported automatically, all of which are independently completed by the hydraulic system so as to reduce mechanical abrasion and times of repair.
translation.source: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备布料箱行进模箱脱模上升，储料箱门关闭，自动输送托板，全部由液压系统独立完成，从而达到减少机械的磨损和维修。
translation.medium: The concrete inspection pit module brick machine equipment briquetting box conveying module lifting up, storing material box door closed, automatic feeding tray, all completed by hydraulic system independently, thus achieving the purpose of reducing mechanical wear and maintenance.
translation.reference: In the concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment, the fabric box proceeding box de-molds and lifts, the storage box door closes, and the supporting plate is transported automatically, all of which are independently completed by the hydraulic system so as to reduce mechanical abrasion and times of repair.

translation.zh: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备采用进口电脑、电器，密封件液压件，准保设备综合性能稳定可靠。
translation.en: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment is composed by imported computer and appliances, as well as sealing elements and hydraulic element to ensure stable and reliable comprehensive performance.
translation.source: 混凝土检查井模块砖机设备采用进口电脑、电器，密封件液压件，准保设备综合性能稳定可靠。
translation.medium: The concrete inspection well drilling equipment adopts imported computer, electrical appliances, sealing components, hydraulic components, and overall performance is stable and reliable.
translation.reference: The concrete inspection shaft module brick equipment is composed by imported computer and appliances, as well as sealing elements and hydraulic element to ensure stable and reliable comprehensive performance.

translation.zh: 井壁墙体模块机械激振平台采用整体板钢，台面线切割合模无焊接点，使填料箱自由摆动导向，充分减少机械磨损。
translation.en: The integral steel plate is adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical vibration platform, with no welding points of wire-electrode cutting mold closing of mesa, so that the stuffing box can swing and orient freely to greatly reduce mechanical abrasion.
translation.source: 井壁墙体模块机械激振平台采用整体板钢，台面线切割合模无焊接点，使填料箱自由摆动导向，充分减少机械磨损。
translation.medium: The mechanical vibration platform for the cavity wall body adopts a whole plate of steel, and the cutting of the platform surface is connected without welding, so that the filler box can be freely moved and the mechanical wear is fully reduced.
translation.reference: The integral steel plate is adopted for the shaft wall module mechanical vibration platform, with no welding points of wire-electrode cutting mold closing of mesa, so that the stuffing box can swing and orient freely to greatly reduce mechanical abrasion.

translation.zh: 使模具负荷减少、填料并二合一加密振幅，采用一体化、全同步，台振、模振，确保达到振实效果。
translation.en: It reduces loads of molds and reinforces vibration; integrated and full synchronization are adopted for vibration of the platform and the molds to ensure the vibration effect.
translation.source: 使模具负荷减少、填料并二合一加密振幅，采用一体化、全同步，台振、模振，确保达到振实效果。
translation.medium: To reduce the molding load, fill the material, and achieve two-in-one vibration synchronization, a unified and synchronous design is adopted, which ensures that the vibration effect is achieved.
translation.reference: It reduces loads of molds and reinforces vibration; integrated and full synchronization are adopted for vibration of the platform and the molds to ensure the vibration effect.

translation.zh: 井壁墙体模块机械激振机械、电脑自动控制振幅根据原料性价比调节振幅，无磨损制动，从而延长使用寿命，降低成本。
translation.en: The shaft wall module mechanical excitation machinery and the computer automatically control the vibration range according to the cost performance of raw materials, leading to no abrasion brake; in this way, it extends the service life and reduces the cost.
translation.source: 井壁墙体模块机械激振机械、电脑自动控制振幅根据原料性价比调节振幅，无磨损制动，从而延长使用寿命，降低成本。
translation.medium: The mechanical vibration of the wall body module is controlled by a mechanical vibration machine and a computer automatic control system. The vibration amplitude is adjusted according to the material price ratio, without wear and tear, thus extending the service life and reducing the cost.
translation.reference: The shaft wall module mechanical excitation machinery and the computer automatically control the vibration range according to the cost performance of raw materials, leading to no abrasion brake; in this way, it extends the service life and reduces the cost.

translation.zh: 井壁墙体模块机械自动控制和手动控制双重功能。
translation.en: The shaft wall module machinery is equipped with dual functions, i.e., automatic control and manual control.
translation.source: 井壁墙体模块机械自动控制和手动控制双重功能。
translation.medium: The wall body module has both mechanical automatic control and manual control functions.
translation.reference: The shaft wall module machinery is equipped with dual functions, i.e., automatic control and manual control.

translation.zh: 郑州井壁砖模块设备，除了可以生产检查井砌块，还可以生产各种标砖，空心砖，马路花砖。
translation.en: Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment can be used for producing not only inspection shaft building blocks but also various types of standard bricks, hollow bricks and road tiling.
translation.source: 郑州井壁砖模块设备，除了可以生产检查井砌块，还可以生产各种标砖，空心砖，马路花砖。

translation.reference: Zhengzhou shaft wall brick module equipment can be used for producing not only inspection shaft building blocks but also various types of standard bricks, hollow bricks and road tiling.

translation.zh: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
translation.en: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 重庆中职学校试点现代学徒制 入学即是企业准员工-新华网
translation.medium: Chongqing Vocational School Launches Trial of Modern Apprenticeship System, Entrance Guarantees Employment - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Modern apprenticeship system is tried in secondary vocational schools in Chongqing, and students are qualified employees-to-be after entrance - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
translation.en: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.
translation.source: 昨天，记者从市教委获悉，今年起，我市将在60所中职学校试点“现代学徒制”人才培养模式，接受试点培养的学生同时具备学徒身份，招生录入后将被试点企业预录为单位员工。
translation.medium: Yesterday, reporters from the local education bureau learned that starting this year, our city will pilot "modern apprenticeship" talent cultivation mode in 60 vocational schools, and students who participate in the pilot will have both the status of apprentices and the status of students. After being admitted, they will be pre-recruited by the pilot enterprises as employees.
translation.reference: It was learned from the Municipal Commission of Education yesterday that our city will start to implement “modern apprenticeship system” in 60 secondary vocational schools from this year, and the students participating in the program have the identity of apprenticeship at the same time, who will be pre-recruited as employees of the experimental units after being enrolled.

translation.zh: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
translation.en: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.
translation.source: 市教委要求，规范中职学校招生录取和企业用工程序，明确学徒的中职学校学生和企业准员工双重身份，按照双向选择原则，学徒、学校和企业签订三方协议，对于年满16周岁未达到18周岁的学徒，须由学徒、监护人、学校和企业四方签订协议，确定各方权益及学徒在岗培养的具体岗位、教学内容、权益保障等。
translation.medium: The municipal education committee requires that the admission and recruitment of vocational schools be standardized, and that the engineering programs for enterprises be clarified. The dual identity of vocational school students and enterprise trainees should be clearly defined, and the principle of mutual selection should be followed. The students, schools, and enterprises should sign a tripartite agreement, and for students who are 16 years old and have not yet reached 18 years of age, the agreement must be signed by the students, their guardians, the schools, and the enterprises. The agreement should clarify the rights and obligations of each party, as well as the specific job positions, teaching content, and benefits guaranteed to the trainees during on-the-job training.
translation.reference: According to the requirements of the Municipal Commission of Education, it is necessary to standardize the enrollment procedure of secondary vocational schools and the enterprise employment procedure, specify the dual identities of the students as both students of secondary vocational schools and employees-to-be of enterprises; according to the two-way selection principle, three-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, schools and enterprises; for apprentices from the age of 16 to 18 years old, four-party agreement shall be signed by apprentices, guardians, schools and enterprises, to determine the rights and interests of all parties as well as specific posts, teaching content, protection of rights and interests, etc.

translation.zh: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
translation.en: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.
translation.source: 鼓励试点学校采用现代学徒制形式与合作企业联合开展企业员工岗前培训和转岗培训。
translation.medium: Encourage pilot schools to adopt modern apprenticeship-style forms and cooperate with enterprises to conduct pre-employment training and job transfer training for employees.
translation.reference: Experimental unit schools are encouraged to adopt the modern apprenticeship system and work with cooperative enterprises to carry out pre-job training and post-shift training for employees.

translation.zh: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
translation.en: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.
translation.source: 试点学校要改革人才培养模式。
translation.medium: Trial schools should reform their talent cultivation mode.
translation.reference: Experimental unit schools shall carry out reform on talent cultivation model.

translation.zh: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
translation.en: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.
translation.source: 校企共同设计人才培养方案，共同制订专业教学标准、课程标准、岗位标准、企业师傅标准、质量监控标准及相应实施方案。
translation.medium: The school and enterprises jointly design talent training plans, jointly formulate professional teaching standards, course standards, job standards, enterprise teacher standards, quality control standards, and corresponding implementation plans.
translation.reference: Experimental unit schools and enterprises shall work together to design talent training plan and jointly formulate professional teaching standard, curriculum standard, post standard, enterprise master standard, quality monitoring standard and corresponding implementation plan.

translation.zh: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
translation.en: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.
translation.source: 试点以培养学制为一个试点周期，学生在企业的实习时间根据专业人才培养方案确定，顶岗实习一般为6个月。
translation.medium: Trial period aims to cultivate the curriculum, and students determine the internship time in the enterprise according to the professional talent cultivation plan during the internship period. The top internship generally lasts for 6 months.
translation.reference: The experimental unit schools take each training program as a period for experiment, and the time of internship of students in enterprises shall be determined according to professional talent training plan; in-post internship is generally 6 months.

translation.zh: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
translation.en: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.
translation.source: 在企业实践应实施企业班组化管理模式，根据不同专业的特点，1个师傅可带2～5个徒弟，组成学习小组，确保学生熟练掌握每个轮训岗位所需的技能。
translation.medium: In practical business, implement the enterprise-based team management mode, according to the characteristics of different professions, one teacher can lead 2-5 apprentices to form a learning group, ensuring that students master the skills required for each round of on-the-job training.
translation.reference: Enterprise working group management mode shall be implemented during enterprise practices; according to features of different majors, one master can teach 2 to 5 apprentices, and learning groups can be formed to ensure that students can master the skills required for each post of training in rotation.

translation.zh: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
translation.en: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.
translation.source: 根据安排，从2016年起到2019年8月，我市分三批确定60个市级中职现代学徒制试点，每个试点人数在50人左右，总共培养3000名左右学生（学徒 ） 。
translation.medium: According to the arrangement, from 2016 to August 2019, our city has determined 60 municipal-level modern apprenticeship trial points, with each trial point having about 50 people, and a total of about 3,000 students (apprentices) were trained.
translation.reference: According to the arrangement, the 60 municipal modern apprenticeship system experimental units will be determined in three batches from 2016 to August, 2019, with about 50 apprentices in each experiment unit, and a total of around 3000 students (apprentices) will be trained.

translation.zh: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
translation.en: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.
translation.source: 按照先试点再推行，由点到面逐步推进的原则，探索建立校企联合招生、联合培养、一体化育人的长效机制，切实提升学生岗位技能，提高学生对口就业率和就业质量。
translation.medium: According to the principle of starting from the pilot and gradually expanding from the point to the surface, explore the long-term mechanism of building a school-enterprise joint recruitment, joint training, and integrated cultivation of talents, and effectively enhance students' job skills and improve their employment rate and job quality.
translation.reference: According to the principle of experimental units first and implementation later, and gradual advancement from point to area, the long-term mechanism of joint recruitment by schools and enterprises, joint training and integrated training shall be explored and established, so as to fundamentally improve the job skills of students and improve the rate of employment fitting students’ major, as well as the quality of employment quality of students.

translation.zh: 我的 App 显示已送达，但我还没收到
translation.en: My App says it’s delivered, but I haven’t received it.
translation.source: 我的 App 显示已送达，但我还没收到
translation.medium: My app shows that it has been delivered, but I haven't received it yet.
translation.reference: My App says it’s delivered, but I haven’t received it.

translation.zh: 刚刚叫了个外卖，我不知道挂在了门口
translation.en: I just ordered food and I didn’t know it was hung on the door handle.
translation.source: 刚刚叫了个外卖，我不知道挂在了门口
translation.medium: I just called a delivery person, and I don't know if they're still at the door.
translation.reference: I just ordered food and I didn’t know it was hung on the door handle.

translation.zh: 然后叫重送
translation.en: and ask for a re-delivery
translation.source: 然后叫重送
translation.medium: Then call again.
translation.reference: and ask for a re-delivery

translation.zh: 我住在上水，为何订单会在海辉花园
translation.en: I live in Shangshui, and why is the order in Haihui Garden?
translation.source: 我住在上水，为何订单会在海辉花园
translation.medium: Why would my order be delivered to Heng Hui Flower Garden in Tsuen Wan?
translation.reference: I live in Shangshui, and why is the order in Haihui Garden?

translation.zh: 地址弄错了吗
translation.en: Is the address wrong?
translation.source: 地址弄错了吗
translation.medium: Did you make a mistake with the address?
translation.reference: Is the address wrong?

translation.zh: 这款吸尘器考虑很久了，最后狠心割草，吸尘效果不错，家里粉尘明显少多了，就是单手拿有点沉；湿拖有待改善，来回脱会有尘痕；总体还是很满意的
translation.en: I’ve been paying attention to this vacuum cleaner for a long time, and finally decided to buy it; with good dust collecting function, there is much less dust at home, but it is a litter heavier when being held with a single hand; the wet mopping function shall be further improved, for there are traces of dust when mopping with it back and forth; generally speaking, it is satisfactory.
translation.source: 这款吸尘器考虑很久了，最后狠心割草，吸尘效果不错，家里粉尘明显少多了，就是单手拿有点沉；湿拖有待改善，来回脱会有尘痕；总体还是很满意的
translation.medium: This vacuum cleaner has been considered for a long time, and finally made a tough decision. The suction effect is not bad, and there is obviously less dust in the house. However, it is a bit heavy when held with one hand; the wet mop needs to be improved, as it keeps slipping and leaving dust marks; overall, I am still very satisfied.
translation.reference: I’ve been paying attention to this vacuum cleaner for a long time, and finally decided to buy it; with good dust collecting function, there is much less dust at home, but it is a litter heavier when being held with a single hand; the wet mopping function shall be further improved, for there are traces of dust when mopping with it back and forth; generally speaking, it is satisfactory.

translation.zh: 料理机挺沉的，看着高大上，适合我这种厨房小白，孩子说比我自己炒的好吃，做过两荤两素，糖醋排骨尤为好吃，时间久点，其他用时很短，噪音很小，不用担心炒糊，也不用担心不会做了！
translation.en: The food processer is heavy and looks luxurious, suitable for beginners in kitchen like me, and my child said the dishes cooked by the food processer were more delicious than what I cooked; I cooked two meat dishes and two vegetable dishes with it, and the sweet and sour ribs were especially delicious although they took longer time; it cooked the other dishes with less time and very small noises; I’ll never worry about over cooking or not capable of cooking certain dishes!
translation.source: 料理机挺沉的，看着高大上，适合我这种厨房小白，孩子说比我自己炒的好吃，做过两荤两素，糖醋排骨尤为好吃，时间久点，其他用时很短，噪音很小，不用担心炒糊，也不用担心不会做了！
translation.medium: The wok is very deep, looking up at it, it is suitable for my small kitchen, the child said that it tastes better than what I cooked myself, I have made two dishes with meat and vegetables, braised pork with sugar and vinegar is particularly delicious, it takes a long time, other dishes are very short, the noise is very small, you don't have to worry about making a mess, and you don't have to worry about not being able to make it!
translation.reference: The food processer is heavy and looks luxurious, suitable for beginners in kitchen like me, and my child said the dishes cooked by the food processer were more delicious than what I cooked; I cooked two meat dishes and two vegetable dishes with it, and the sweet and sour ribs were especially delicious although they took longer time; it cooked the other dishes with less time and very small noises; I’ll never worry about over cooking or not capable of cooking certain dishes!

translation.zh: 收到货，中午迫不及待炒了三个菜，真是科技改变生活，火候和调料的把控**精准，菜的口感直接升级为大厨级别，不错，对于不善于下厨的**是神器，推荐购买！
translation.en: I cooked three dishes with it at noon as soon as I received it; science and technology can really change our life; the duration of heating and the seasoning were controlled in an accurate way, and the dishes were really delicious; it is really a magic tool for new hands in the kitchen, and I strongly recommend it!
translation.source: 收到货，中午迫不及待炒了三个菜，真是科技改变生活，火候和调料的把控**精准，菜的口感直接升级为大厨级别，不错，对于不善于下厨的**是神器，推荐购买！
translation.medium: Received. I had lunch at noon, and three dishes were cooked in a hurry. It's really amazing how technology has changed our lives. The temperature and seasoning control is precise, and the taste of the dishes is directly upgraded to the level of a professional chef. It's great, especially for those who are not good at cooking. It's a godsend, and I highly recommend purchasing it!
translation.reference: I cooked three dishes with it at noon as soon as I received it; science and technology can really change our life; the duration of heating and the seasoning were controlled in an accurate way, and the dishes were really delicious; it is really a magic tool for new hands in the kitchen, and I strongly recommend it!

translation.zh: 我给厨房又添置了新成员。
translation.en: I’ve added a new member to my kitchen.
translation.source: 我给厨房又添置了新成员。
translation.medium: I added a new member to the kitchen.
translation.reference: I’ve added a new member to my kitchen.

translation.zh: 智能料理机，自动调控火候、自动翻炒的那种。
translation.en: A smart food processor, which can control the duration of heating as well as stir and fry automatically.
translation.source: 智能料理机，自动调控火候、自动翻炒的那种。
translation.medium: Intelligent kitchen appliance, automatically controlling the fire, and that kind of automatic flipping.
translation.reference: A smart food processor, which can control the duration of heating as well as stir and fry automatically.

translation.zh: 再也不用害怕被热油烫到，再也不用害怕控制不好火候把菜炒焦或者夹生了。
translation.en: I’ll never worry about getting hot oil on my skin, or getting burnt or half-cooked dishes due to lack of control of the heating.
translation.source: 再也不用害怕被热油烫到，再也不用害怕控制不好火候把菜炒焦或者夹生了。
translation.medium: No longer afraid of being splashed with hot oil, no longer afraid of not being able to control the fire temperature and overcooking or burning the food.
translation.reference: I’ll never worry about getting hot oil on my skin, or getting burnt or half-cooked dishes due to lack of control of the heating.

translation.zh: 炒出来的的菜比我弄得好吃多了，番茄炒蛋都炒得特别入味，鸡蛋口感特别好。
translation.en: The dishes cooked by the food processor are much more delicious than what I cook; the fried eggs with tomatoes are really tasty, with especially good texture of the eggs.
translation.source: 炒出来的的菜比我弄得好吃多了，番茄炒蛋都炒得特别入味，鸡蛋口感特别好。
translation.medium: The dishes that came out of the pot tasted better than what I made, the stir-fried tomatoes and eggs were particularly delicious, and the texture of the fried eggs was particularly good.
translation.reference: The dishes cooked by the food processor are much more delicious than what I cook; the fried eggs with tomatoes are really tasty, with especially good texture of the eggs.

translation.zh: 这个锅买得好值。
translation.en: The pot is worth the money.
translation.source: 这个锅买得好值。
translation.medium: This pot is worth buying.
translation.reference: The pot is worth the money.

translation.zh: 东西不错，值得购买，非常好
translation.en: The product is good, worth buying, really nice.
translation.source: 东西不错，值得购买，非常好
translation.medium: The product is of high quality, worth buying, and excellent.
translation.reference: The product is good, worth buying, really nice.

translation.zh: 整体很好，很清晰，跟描述的一致。
translation.en: Overall, it’s good, clear, and the same as described.
translation.source: 整体很好，很清晰，跟描述的一致。
translation.medium: The overall impression is good, very clear, consistent with the description.
translation.reference: Overall, it’s good, clear, and the same as described.

translation.zh: 值得拥有。
translation.en: It is worth buying.
translation.source: 值得拥有。
translation.medium: Worth having.
translation.reference: It is worth buying.

translation.zh: 客服也非常好。
translation.en: Customer service is very good.
translation.source: 客服也非常好。
translation.medium: The customer service is also very good.
translation.reference: Customer service is very good.

translation.zh: 屏幕大，清楚，眼睛不累，暂没发现其他异常
translation.en: The big and clear screen is friendly to my eyes, and no abnormality has been detected so far.
translation.source: 屏幕大，清楚，眼睛不累，暂没发现其他异常
translation.medium: The screen is large, clear, and does not strain the eyes. I haven't found any other abnormalities.
translation.reference: The big and clear screen is friendly to my eyes, and no abnormality has been detected so far.

translation.zh: 比现在主流的显示器厚了不少，还有就是边框宽了点，边框和屏幕的缝隙有点大，不过屏幕显示效果不错，配件齐全
translation.en: It’s much thicker than the mainstream monitors at present, and the frame is a little bit wide; the gap between the frame and the screen is a little bit large; but the display effect is good and the accessories are complete.
translation.source: 比现在主流的显示器厚了不少，还有就是边框宽了点，边框和屏幕的缝隙有点大，不过屏幕显示效果不错，配件齐全
translation.medium: The display is thicker than the mainstream one now, and there is also a wider bezel. The gap between the bezel and the screen is a bit large, but the screen display effect is not bad, and the accessories are complete.
translation.reference: It’s much thicker than the mainstream monitors at present, and the frame is a little bit wide; the gap between the frame and the screen is a little bit large; but the display effect is good and the accessories are complete.

translation.zh: 物流速度快！
translation.en: Shipping is fast!
translation.source: 物流速度快！
translation.medium: Logistics speed is fast!
translation.reference: Shipping is fast!

translation.zh: 商家服务态度好！
translation.en: The seller has great service attitude!
translation.source: 商家服务态度好！
translation.medium: The service attitude of the shop is good!
translation.reference: The seller has great service attitude!

translation.zh: 用了一段时间，质量不错，屏幕分辨率也很清晰。
translation.en: I’ve used it for some time; it is of high quality, with clear screen resolution.
translation.source: 用了一段时间，质量不错，屏幕分辨率也很清晰。
translation.medium: After using it for a while, the quality is good, and the screen resolution is also very clear.
translation.reference: I’ve used it for some time; it is of high quality, with clear screen resolution.

translation.zh: 炒股非常棒，一分4，太完美了
translation.en: It’s perfect for speculating on the stock market, and one screen can be split into four, perfect!
translation.source: 炒股非常棒，一分4，太完美了
translation.medium: 炒股非常棒，一分4，太完美了
translation.reference: It’s perfect for speculating on the stock market, and one screen can be split into four, perfect!

translation.zh: 物流快，东西好，买的第二台，的确是好东西，显示画面高质量，不因为屏幕大而失真，接口全。
translation.en: Fast shipping, good product; it’s the second one I’ve bought and it is indeed good with high quality screen display and no distortion due to the large screen; the interfaces are complete as well.
translation.source: 物流快，东西好，买的第二台，的确是好东西，显示画面高质量，不因为屏幕大而失真，接口全。
translation.medium: The logistics is fast, the goods are good, the second purchase is definitely a good thing, the display screen is of high quality and does not lose its clarity even with a larger screen, and the interface is perfect.
translation.reference: Fast shipping, good product; it’s the second one I’ve bought and it is indeed good with high quality screen display and no distortion due to the large screen; the interfaces are complete as well.

translation.zh: 感观不错，色彩还原好，质量可以！
translation.en: Nice perception, good color rendition performance and high quality!
translation.source: 感观不错，色彩还原好，质量可以！
translation.medium: The visual effect is good, the color reproduction is excellent, and the quality is great!
translation.reference: Nice perception, good color rendition performance and high quality!

translation.zh: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
translation.en: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet
translation.source: 中国儿童中心将举办系列活动让孩子“高科技”过“六一 ” - 新华网
translation.medium: China Children's Center to Hold Series of Activities to Help Kids "Go High-Tech" for the Mid-Autumn Festival - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities to let children celebrate “Children’s Day” with high technology – Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.
translation.source: 新华社北京５月２０日电（黄小希 周珊珊）记者２０日从中国儿童中心获悉，５月２８日至６月１日“六一”儿童节前后，中国儿童中心计划将举办儿童创客体验、儿童视觉艺术节、亲子书香嘉年华等一系列活动，让孩子们在前沿科技的魅力中度过“六一 ” 。
translation.medium: According to a report from China Children's Center on May 20, the China Children's Center plans to hold a series of activities, including children's creative experience, children's visual art festival, and parent-child book fair, during the period from May 28 to June 1, just before the "Children's Day" on June 1.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on May 20 (journalists: Huang Xiaoxi and Zhou Shanshan) According to China Children’s Center on May 20, from May 28 to June 1, before and on the “Children’s Day”, China Children’s Center will hold a series of activities such as Children as Makers, Children’s Visual Art Festival and the Carnival of Parent-Child Reading, to let children celebrate Children’s Day while immersing themselves in the charisma of cutting-edge technologies.

translation.zh: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
translation.en: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.
translation.source: 据了解，中国儿童中心今年“六一”儿童节期间举办的活动包括“爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华、首届儿童视觉艺术节 、 “ 书香嘉年华”活动 、 “ 全家爱阅读”绘本系列活动等。
translation.medium: According to understanding, the China Children's Center held activities during the "Six One" Children's Day this year, including the "Love Home, Create Cool" Children's Future Learning Carnival, the first Children's Visual Arts Festival, the "Book Fragrance Carnival" activity, and the "All-Family Reading" Picture Book Series Activity."
translation.reference: It is understood that the activities held during the “Children’s Day” by China Children’s Center this year include the “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning, the first children’s visual art festival, the “Book Carnival” event and the “Whole Family Loves Reading” Picture Book Reading activity.

translation.zh: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
translation.en: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.
translation.source: 中国儿童中心副主任李忠明在２０日举行的２０１６年“六一”儿童节媒体通气会上介绍说 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华是今年中国儿童中心庆“六一”的重点活动。
translation.medium: The vice director of the China Children's Center, Li Zhongming, introduced at the 2016 "June 1" Children's Day media conference held on the 20th that "Love Home Creates Cool" is the focus of children's future learning activities in this year's China Children's Center.
translation.reference: According to the introduction from Li Zhongming, Deputy Director of China Children’s Center, at the 2016 “Children’s Day” media exchange meeting held on May 20, “Cool Maker Loves Family” carnival of children’s future learning is a key activity held by China Children’s Center for “Children’s Day”.

translation.zh: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
translation.en: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.
translation.source: 活动着眼于将社会创新与家庭个人创意有机结合，通过儿童和家庭参与体验各种创新教育活动，让创新实践成为大众家庭的文化基因，让“动手做”成为广大家庭新的学习和生活方式。
translation.medium: The activity aims to integrate social innovation with family and personal creativity, and to achieve this by engaging children and families in various innovative educational activities. The goal is to make creative practice a cultural gene in the mass family, and to make "doing it yourself" a new way of learning and living for the broad family.
translation.reference: The activity focuses on combining social innovation and family and personal creativity; the activity makes innovative practices a cultural gene of the public by letting children and their families experience various innovative and educational activities, to make “do-it-yourself” as a new way of learning and living of families.

translation.zh: 据悉 ， “ 爱家创酷”儿童未来学习嘉年华包括“豆果创客”体验活动、老牛儿童探索馆周年庆暨“探索全家爱 童萌过六一”活动、ＶＲ全民体验计划 、 “ 创客部落”互动工作坊等几十项前沿科技体验内容。
