translation.reference: Biden said in the closing speech that a dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.

translation.zh: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
translation.en: He also said that the second global “Summit for Democracy” was scheduled to be held next year.
translation.source: 他也表示，计划明年召开第二届全球“民主峰会 ” 。
translation.medium: He also expressed that he plans to hold the second Global "Democracy Summit" next year.
translation.reference: He also said that the second global “Summit for Democracy” was scheduled to be held next year.

translation.zh: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
translation.en: Tang Feng, representative of Taiwan government and member of the administrative council, and Luo Guancong, Hong Kong democracy and human rights activist who is currently in exile in the UK, made speeches at the summit on the second day.
translation.source: 台湾政府代表、政务委员唐凤和目前流亡英国的香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪也在第二天的峰会上发言。
translation.medium: Taiwan's government representative and vice minister Tang Wenyi, as well as Hong Kong's democracy activist and currently in exile in the UK, Ronny Tong, also spoke on the second day of the summit.
translation.reference: Tang Feng, representative of Taiwan government and member of the administrative council, and Luo Guancong, Hong Kong democracy and human rights activist who is currently in exile in the UK, made speeches at the summit on the second day.

translation.zh: 拜登说 ： “ 我们知道摆在我们面前的工作是多么的艰巨。
translation.en: Biden said, “We know that we are facing arduous tasks.
translation.source: 拜登说 ： “ 我们知道摆在我们面前的工作是多么的艰巨。
translation.medium: Biden said, "We know how difficult the work is that is placed before us."
translation.reference: Biden said, “We know that we are facing arduous tasks.

translation.zh: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。
translation.en: But we also know that we can meet the challenges, just as I mentioned before and as what this Summit stands for, the world of democracy is everywhere.
translation.source: 但我们也知道，我们可以迎接挑战，因为我以前说过，正如这次峰会所表明的，民主世界无处不在。
translation.medium: But we also know that we can face challenges, because as I mentioned before, this conference has shown that democratic civilization is everywhere.
translation.reference: But we also know that we can meet the challenges, just as I mentioned before and as what this Summit stands for, the world of democracy is everywhere.

translation.zh: 专制政权永远无法熄灭自由的微火，它在全世界和世界各地人们的心中燃烧 。 ”
translation.en: A dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.”
translation.source: 专制政权永远无法熄灭自由的微火，它在全世界和世界各地人们的心中燃烧 。 ”
translation.medium: Dictatorship can never extinguish the spark of freedom, for it burns in the hearts of people all over the world and in every corner of the globe.
translation.reference: A dictatorship can never extinguish the flame of liberty that burns in the hearts of people around the world.”

translation.zh: 拜登还表示，捍卫民主需要整个社会的共同努力。
translation.en: Biden also said that joint efforts from the whole society were required to defend democracy.
translation.source: 拜登还表示，捍卫民主需要整个社会的共同努力。
translation.medium: Biden also stated that defending democracy requires the collective effort of the entire society.
translation.reference: Biden also said that joint efforts from the whole society were required to defend democracy.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 ”
translation.en: He said, “as leaders of governments, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms, realize transparent accountability governance, so as to be better equipped to resist the buffer and impact of dictatorship as well as people who bluntly pursue power in front of public benefits.”
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 ”
translation.medium: He said, "As the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the barriers of democracy, promote reforms, achieve transparency in accountability governance, and more effectively resist the buffer and impact of authoritarianism, as well as those who openly seek power at the expense of public interests."
translation.reference: He said, “as leaders of governments, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms, realize transparent accountability governance, so as to be better equipped to resist the buffer and impact of dictatorship as well as people who bluntly pursue power in front of public benefits.”

translation.zh: “民主峰会”第二天的主题分别是捍卫人权，巩固民主与对抗威权，以及反击数字威权主义与肯定民主价值。
translation.en: The themes on the second day of the “Summit for Democracy” were strengthening human rights, consolidating democracy and fighting against authoritarians, as well as fighting against digital authoritarianism and affirming the values of democracy.
translation.source: “民主峰会”第二天的主题分别是捍卫人权，巩固民主与对抗威权，以及反击数字威权主义与肯定民主价值。
translation.medium: The theme of the second day of the "Democracy Summit" was to defend human rights, consolidate democracy and resist authoritarianism, as well as to counter digital authoritarianism and affirm the value of democracy.
translation.reference: The themes on the second day of the “Summit for Democracy” were strengthening human rights, consolidating democracy and fighting against authoritarians, as well as fighting against digital authoritarianism and affirming the values of democracy.

translation.zh: 这一天恰逢“国际人权日 ” 。
translation.en: That day happened to be “International Human Rights Day”.
translation.source: 这一天恰逢“国际人权日 ” 。
translation.medium: Today is International Human Rights Day.
translation.reference: That day happened to be “International Human Rights Day”.

translation.zh: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯在当天的开场讲话中也表示，民主事业在全球面临挑战，特别是新兴数字技术带来的挑战。
translation.en: Guterres, the Secretary General of the United Nations, said in the opening speech on that day that the democracy was facing challenges globally, especially those brought by emerging digital technologies.
translation.source: 联合国秘书长古特雷斯在当天的开场讲话中也表示，民主事业在全球面临挑战，特别是新兴数字技术带来的挑战。
translation.medium: United Nations Secretary-General Kofi Annan also expressed in his opening speech today that democracy is facing challenges globally, especially the challenges posed by new digital technologies.
translation.reference: Guterres, the Secretary General of the United Nations, said in the opening speech on that day that the democracy was facing challenges globally, especially those brought by emerging digital technologies.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 现在是重申共同价值观和立场以及民主韧性的时候了。
translation.en: He said, “It’s the time to reiterate the common values, standpoint, as well as the tenacity of democracy.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 现在是重申共同价值观和立场以及民主韧性的时候了。
translation.medium: He said: "Now is the time to reiterate our shared values and principles, as well as our democratic resilience."
translation.reference: He said, “It’s the time to reiterate the common values, standpoint, as well as the tenacity of democracy.

translation.zh: 这需要深化社会对话，解决不平等问题，打击腐败，更新社会契约，为优质教育投资，并扩大妇女和女童的机会。
translation.en: Social dialogue needs to be deepened to solve the problem of inequality, fight against corruption, update social contracts, invest in high-quality education, and provide more opportunities for women and girls.
translation.source: 这需要深化社会对话，解决不平等问题，打击腐败，更新社会契约，为优质教育投资，并扩大妇女和女童的机会。
translation.medium: This requires deepening social dialogue, solving issues of inequality, striking corruption, updating social contracts, investing in quality education, and expanding opportunities for women and girls.
translation.reference: Social dialogue needs to be deepened to solve the problem of inequality, fight against corruption, update social contracts, invest in high-quality education, and provide more opportunities for women and girls.

translation.zh: 这也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具 。 ”
translation.en: This also requires us to condemn populism, nativism and extremism of all forms, including making use of all the tools provided by technical revolutions.”
translation.source: 这也需要坚决谴责一切形式的民粹主义、本土主义和极端主义，包括利用技术革命所提供的所有工具 。 ”
translation.medium: This also requires resolute condemnation of all forms of populism, localism, and extremism, including the use of all tools provided by technological revolution.
translation.reference: This also requires us to condemn populism, nativism and extremism of all forms, including making use of all the tools provided by technical revolutions.”

translation.zh: 香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪通过预先录制的视频对峰会发表讲话，提醒与会者持续关注香港和维吾尔族和藏族等中国少数民族的人权状况。
translation.en: Luo Guancong, democracy and human rights activist from Hong Kong, gave a speech at the summit through a pre-recorded video, to remind conferees to continuously pay attention to the human rights situation of Hong Kong and ethnic minorities in China including Uygur ethnic group and the Tibetans.
translation.source: 香港民主人权活动人士罗冠聪通过预先录制的视频对峰会发表讲话，提醒与会者持续关注香港和维吾尔族和藏族等中国少数民族的人权状况。
translation.medium: Hong Kong democracy activist Joshua Wong delivered a pre-recorded speech at the conference, reminding attendees to continue to pay attention to the human rights situation in Hong Kong and other minority ethnic groups in China, such as the Uighurs and Tibetans.
translation.reference: Luo Guancong, democracy and human rights activist from Hong Kong, gave a speech at the summit through a pre-recorded video, to remind conferees to continuously pay attention to the human rights situation of Hong Kong and ethnic minorities in China including Uygur ethnic group and the Tibetans.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 长期以来，世界一直接受中国的崛起，却没有建立一个机制来对其进行问责。
translation.en: He said, “For a long time, the world has always accepted the rising of China; however, no mechanism has been established for accountability.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 长期以来，世界一直接受中国的崛起，却没有建立一个机制来对其进行问责。
translation.medium: He said: "For a long time, the world has been under the influence of China's rise, but there has been no mechanism in place to hold it accountable."
translation.reference: He said, “For a long time, the world has always accepted the rising of China; however, no mechanism has been established for accountability.

translation.zh: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。
translation.en: This is the reason why there must be cooperation between politicians and civil society leaders.
translation.source: 这就是为什么政治人物和民间社会领导人必须合作。
translation.medium: This is why political leaders and civil society leaders must collaborate.
translation.reference: This is the reason why there must be cooperation between politicians and civil society leaders.

translation.zh: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的一切（资源）来确保民主的复兴是我们的首要任务 。 ”
translation.en: We have to ensure that we will use all (the resources) we have to make the renaissance of democracy our primary task.”
translation.source: 我们必须利用我们所拥有的一切（资源）来确保民主的复兴是我们的首要任务 。 ”
translation.medium: "We must use all our resources to ensure the resurgence of democracy is our top priority."
translation.reference: We have to ensure that we will use all (the resources) we have to make the renaissance of democracy our primary task.”

translation.zh: 罗冠聪也呼吁自由世界团结起来对抗中共的威胁。
translation.en: Luo Guancong also called on the free world to unite together and fight against the threats from the Communist Party of China.
translation.source: 罗冠聪也呼吁自由世界团结起来对抗中共的威胁。
translation.medium: Luo Guanqing also called for the unity of the free world to resist the threat of the CCP.
translation.reference: Luo Guancong also called on the free world to unite together and fight against the threats from the Communist Party of China.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 也许你们中的一些人害怕惹恼习近平总书记，也许你们中的一些人不想失去中国市场，也许你们中的一些人没有认识到（中共）对我们民主价值观的威胁。
translation.en: He said, “Some of you may be afraid of offend General Secretary Xi Jinping, some of you may not want to lose the Chinese market, and some of you may not realize the threat (of the Communist Party of China) to our democratic values.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 也许你们中的一些人害怕惹恼习近平总书记，也许你们中的一些人不想失去中国市场，也许你们中的一些人没有认识到（中共）对我们民主价值观的威胁。
translation.medium: He said: "Maybe some people in your group are afraid of offending Xi Jinping, maybe some people in your group don't want to lose the Chinese market, and maybe some people in your group don't understand (the threat of the Communist Party of China) to our democratic values."
translation.reference: He said, “Some of you may be afraid of offend General Secretary Xi Jinping, some of you may not want to lose the Chinese market, and some of you may not realize the threat (of the Communist Party of China) to our democratic values.

translation.zh: 而这就是我们失败的原因。
translation.en: And this is the reason why we failed.
translation.source: 而这就是我们失败的原因。
translation.medium: And that is why we failed.
translation.reference: And this is the reason why we failed.

translation.zh: 这也是我们必须改变的原因 。 ”
translation.en: This is also the reason why we must make changes.”
translation.source: 这也是我们必须改变的原因 。 ”
translation.medium: "This is also one of the reasons we must change."
translation.reference: This is also the reason why we must make changes.”

translation.zh: 台湾行政院政务委员唐凤在出席“打击数字独裁主义，肯定民主价值”的圆桌讨论中，通过视频发布《国家声明 》 ， 强调台湾站在对抗专制和威权的最前线。
translation.en: When attending the round table discussion on “Striking digital authoritarianism and affirming the value of democracy”, Tang Feng, member of the administrative council of Taiwan, issued Country Declaration with a video to emphasize that Taiwan is on the forefront of fighting against dictatorship and authoritarianism.
translation.source: 台湾行政院政务委员唐凤在出席“打击数字独裁主义，肯定民主价值”的圆桌讨论中，通过视频发布《国家声明 》 ， 强调台湾站在对抗专制和威权的最前线。
translation.medium: The Executive Yuan's Vice Minister Tang Feng attended a roundtable discussion on "Cracking Down on Digital Authoritarianism and Affirming the Value of Democracy" and released a national statement through a video, emphasizing that Taiwan stands on the front line of resisting dictatorship and tyranny.
translation.reference: When attending the round table discussion on “Striking digital authoritarianism and affirming the value of democracy”, Tang Feng, member of the administrative council of Taiwan, issued Country Declaration with a video to emphasize that Taiwan is on the forefront of fighting against dictatorship and authoritarianism.

translation.zh: 他也分享了如何通过信息透明与构建互信来抗击新冠疫情的经验。
translation.en: He also shared experience on how to fight against COVID-19 epidemic with transparent information and the construction of mutual trust.
translation.source: 他也分享了如何通过信息透明与构建互信来抗击新冠疫情的经验。
translation.medium: He also shared how information transparency and building trust can be used to combat the COVID-19 pandemic.
translation.reference: He also shared experience on how to fight against COVID-19 epidemic with transparent information and the construction of mutual trust.

translation.zh: 他说 ： “ 在台湾的民主方兴未艾之际，我们始终坚定站在全球对抗威权主义的最前线，更在促进全球自由、民主和人权上，扮演领导角色。
translation.en: He said, “As democracy in Taiwan is still making progress, we shall always stand on the forefront of fighting against the authoritarianism of the whole world, and shall play the leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy and human rights.
translation.source: 他说 ： “ 在台湾的民主方兴未艾之际，我们始终坚定站在全球对抗威权主义的最前线，更在促进全球自由、民主和人权上，扮演领导角色。
translation.medium: He said: "While democracy is flourishing in Taiwan, we have always stood firm on the front line of resisting authoritarianism globally, and played a leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy, and human rights."
translation.reference: He said, “As democracy in Taiwan is still making progress, we shall always stand on the forefront of fighting against the authoritarianism of the whole world, and shall play the leading role in promoting global freedom, democracy and human rights.

translation.zh: 于疫情期间，各地的威权政府以公共卫生和集体利益为名，合理化侵犯人权的行为，全球民主呈现倒退的迹象。
translation.en: During the epidemic, authoritarian governments from all over the world rationalize human rights violations in the name of public health and collective interests, leading to retrogress in global democracy.
translation.source: 于疫情期间，各地的威权政府以公共卫生和集体利益为名，合理化侵犯人权的行为，全球民主呈现倒退的迹象。
translation.medium: During the pandemic, authoritarian regimes in various regions have justified their violations of human rights in the name of public health and collective interests, while democracy around the world is showing signs of regression.
translation.reference: During the epidemic, authoritarian governments from all over the world rationalize human rights violations in the name of public health and collective interests, leading to retrogress in global democracy.

translation.zh: 然而在台湾，我们不必封城就能控制疫情，不必下架就能战胜假信息 。 ”
translation.en: However, in Taiwan, we can control the epidemic without putting cities on lockdown, and we can defeat false information without removing it.”
translation.source: 然而在台湾，我们不必封城就能控制疫情，不必下架就能战胜假信息 。 ”
translation.medium: "But in Taiwan, we don't have to close the city to control the epidemic, and we don't have to censor the internet to win the battle against false information."
translation.reference: However, in Taiwan, we can control the epidemic without putting cities on lockdown, and we can defeat false information without removing it.”

translation.zh: 就在“民主峰会”第二天日程进行的同时，美国财政部宣布对被认定严重侵犯人权的中国、朝鲜等几个国家的15名个人、10个实体依法实施制裁，同时对一家被认定利用监视技术协助侵犯人权的中国公司实施投资限制。
translation.en: On the second day of the “Summit for Democracy”, Treasury Department of United States announced it would implement legal sanctions on 15 individuals and 10 entities in several countries including China and North Korea which were identified as having severely infringed on human rights; at the same time, it would implement investment restriction on a Chinese company which was identified as assisting in infringing on human rights by utilizing surveillance techniques.
translation.source: 就在“民主峰会”第二天日程进行的同时，美国财政部宣布对被认定严重侵犯人权的中国、朝鲜等几个国家的15名个人、10个实体依法实施制裁，同时对一家被认定利用监视技术协助侵犯人权的中国公司实施投资限制。
translation.medium: At the same time as the second day of the "Democracy Summit" schedule, the US Treasury announced the implementation of sanctions against 15 individuals and 10 entities from China, North Korea, and other countries, as well as the implementation of investment restrictions on a Chinese company that has been determined to use surveillance technology to assist in the violation of human rights.
translation.reference: On the second day of the “Summit for Democracy”, Treasury Department of United States announced it would implement legal sanctions on 15 individuals and 10 entities in several countries including China and North Korea which were identified as having severely infringed on human rights; at the same time, it would implement investment restriction on a Chinese company which was identified as assisting in infringing on human rights by utilizing surveillance techniques.

translation.zh: 已经拍照并上传给你们了
translation.en: I have take a photo and submitted to you.
translation.source: 已经拍照并上传给你们了
translation.medium: I have taken the photo and uploaded it for you.
translation.reference: I have take a photo and submitted to you.

translation.zh: 我知道呀。
translation.en: I know that.
translation.source: 我知道呀。
translation.medium: I know.
translation.reference: I know that.

translation.zh: 但餐厅不知道为什么不断推迟送货时间
translation.en: But I don’t know why the restaurant kept putting off the delivery time.
translation.source: 但餐厅不知道为什么不断推迟送货时间
translation.medium: "But the restaurant didn't know why the delivery time was constantly being pushed back."
translation.reference: But I don’t know why the restaurant kept putting off the delivery time.

translation.zh: 原来要 #NUMBER#
translation.en: It was originally #NUMBER#.
translation.source: 原来要 #NUMBER#
translation.medium: Originally, I was going to #NUMBER#
translation.reference: It was originally #NUMBER#.

translation.zh: 那总之我不叫了
translation.en: Anyway, I won’t do it.
translation.source: 那总之我不叫了
translation.medium: So, in short, I don't call anymore.
translation.reference: Anyway, I won’t do it.

translation.zh: 不吃了
translation.en: I’m good now.
translation.source: 不吃了
translation.medium: I am not hungry.
translation.reference: I’m good now.

translation.zh: 我一定会投诉
translation.en: I will definitely make a complaint.
translation.source: 我一定会投诉
translation.medium: I will definitely complain.
translation.reference: I will definitely make a complaint.

translation.zh: 你送不到，怎么不早点讲啊
translation.en: Why didn’t you say it earlier if you couldn’t deliver it?
translation.source: 你送不到，怎么不早点讲啊
translation.medium: Why don't you talk earlier if you can't send it?
translation.reference: Why didn’t you say it earlier if you couldn’t deliver it?

translation.zh: 等你那么久
translation.en: I’ve waited so long for you.
translation.source: 等你那么久
translation.medium: Waiting for you so long
translation.reference: I’ve waited so long for you.

translation.zh: 没有，我没有收到 call
translation.en: No, I didn’t receive the call.
translation.source: 没有，我没有收到 call
translation.medium: No, I haven't received a call.
translation.reference: No, I didn’t receive the call.

translation.zh: 请通知他再送到我们公司
translation.en: Please notify him to send it to our company again.
translation.source: 请通知他再送到我们公司
translation.medium: Please notify him to send it to our company.
translation.reference: Please notify him to send it to our company again.

translation.zh: 我不想再等 #NUMBER# 分钟
translation.en: I don’t want to wait another #NUMBER# minutes.
translation.source: 我不想再等 #NUMBER# 分钟
translation.medium: I don't want to wait #NUMBER# minutes
translation.reference: I don’t want to wait another #NUMBER# minutes.

translation.zh: 一个餐等了一个半小时
translation.en: I’ve waited one and a half hours for one meal.
translation.source: 一个餐等了一个半小时
translation.medium: A meal has been waiting for half an hour.
translation.reference: I’ve waited one and a half hours for one meal.

translation.zh: #PRS_ORG# 都未送到
translation.en: #PRS_ORG# is not delivered.
translation.source: #PRS_ORG# 都未送到
translation.medium: #PRS\_ORG# has not been sent yet.
translation.reference: #PRS_ORG# is not delivered.

translation.zh: 我想取消订单
translation.en: I want to cancel the order.
translation.source: 我想取消订单
translation.medium: I want to cancel the order.
translation.reference: I want to cancel the order.

translation.zh: 为什么不给取消
translation.en: Why can’t I cancel it?
translation.source: 为什么不给取消
translation.medium: Why not give up?
translation.reference: Why can’t I cancel it?

translation.zh: 你好，餐厅送来的口水鸡是生的
translation.en: Hi, the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce delivered from the restaurant is raw.
translation.source: 你好，餐厅送来的口水鸡是生的
translation.medium: Hello, the fried chicken sent from the restaurant is fresh.
translation.reference: Hi, the Poached Chicken with Chili Sauce delivered from the restaurant is raw.

translation.zh: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
translation.en: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.
translation.source: 想尝试一下网球，但又怕自己坚持不下去，所以想先找个差不多的价格练手 。
translation.medium: I want to try playing tennis, but I'm afraid I won't be able to stick with it, so I want to find a coach with a similar price range to practice with.
translation.reference: I wanted to try tennis, but I was afraid I couldn’t stick with it, so I thought I would just find one at a suitable price to practice with.

translation.zh: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
translation.en: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.
translation.source: 不友好，事实上，价格往往与友好程度成正比，如果不能分辨，那么贵的正常情况会比便宜的拍子友好，这类“入门拍”其实是工业垃圾。
translation.medium: In fact, price often corresponds to the level of friendliness, and if you can't tell the difference, then expensive normal situations will be more friendly than cheap ones. This kind of "entry-level shot" is actually industrial waste.
translation.reference: It was not friendly; in fact, the price is usually in proportional to the degree of friendliness; if you are not able to distinguish, then expensive ones usually are more friendly than cheaper ones, and the so called “entry-level” rackets are in fact industrial garbage.

translation.zh: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
translation.en: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.
translation.source: 它们强度很低，球打到拍子上面，振动非常大，硬球顶不住，高手都很难驾驭。
translation.medium: They have very low strength, and when the ball hits the racket, the vibration is very large. Even with a hard ball, it's difficult for top players to control it.
translation.reference: They are low in strength, and there will be too much vibration when the ball hits on it; it cannot withstand hard balls, and even professional cannot handle it.

translation.zh: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
translation.en: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.
translation.source: 它们存在的逻辑和潜台词是———网球这么难，知道你们学不会，也知道你们不舍得买贵的，搞个便宜货糊弄你们，你们玩儿两次，就不会再打了，这样这个拍子便宜，你也不心疼。
translation.medium: The logic and subtext of their existence is——- tennis is so difficult, you know you can't learn it, and you know you don't want to spend a lot of money on it, so we'll make something cheap and sloppy that you can play a couple of times and then forget about it. That way, this product is cheap, and you won't feel bad about it.
translation.reference: The logic and subtext of their existence is that tennis is so difficult, we know you can’t learn to play it, and we know you're not willing to buy expensive ones, so we make a cheap one to fool you; you won't play it again after using it once or twice; since the racket is cheap, you don't feel it's a waste.

translation.zh: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
translation.en: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.
translation.source: 等你真的能分辨好坏，说明你进步了，到时候再来我这里买贵的，我赚两次钱。
translation.medium: Wait until you can really distinguish between good and bad, then come back and buy my expensive things. I'll make twice as much money.
translation.reference: If you can tell the difference, it means you have made improvement; then you can come here to buy the expensive ones and I will make money twice.

translation.zh: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
translation.en: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?
translation.source: 建议花相似的价钱，买个二手好一点的球拍，选择prince、或者邓禄普的，这两个品牌足够没名气，所以好球拍也卖不上价钱，新拍500、600就很好了，二手的200块，拥有千元拍的享受不香吗？
translation.medium: I suggest spending a similar amount of money on a second-hand camera that is in good condition, and choose a brand like Prince or Teng Lei Pu. These two brands are not very well-known, so you can get a good camera at a lower price. A new camera costs around 500-600, while a second-hand one costs around 200. Wouldn't it be nice to enjoy the benefits of a thousand-yuan camera?
translation.reference: I recommend you to spend the same amount of money on a better-quality second hand racket such as prince or DUNLOP; these two brands are not famous, and so even if they are good, they are not expensive; you can get a new one with 500 or 600 yuan and a second hand one with 200 yuan; isn’t it nice to have a thousand yuan racket with only so little money?

translation.zh: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
translation.en: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.
translation.source: 对新手挺友好，但一过了新手阶段就鸡肋了，但大部分人，特别是女生，过不了新手阶段。
translation.medium: To newcomers, I am friendly, but once they pass the newcomer stage, they become arrogant. However, most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newcomer stage.
translation.reference: It’s friendly to newbies, but once you passed that stage, it will become not so useful; but most people, especially girls, cannot pass the newbie stage.

translation.zh: 订单已多次延迟送货时间
translation.en: The delivery time of the order has been put off multiple times.
translation.source: 订单已多次延迟送货时间
translation.medium: Order has been delayed multiple times for delivery.
translation.reference: The delivery time of the order has been put off multiple times.

translation.zh: 请问可以帮忙跟进一下吗？
translation.en: Could you help follow up on it?
translation.source: 请问可以帮忙跟进一下吗？
translation.medium: May I ask if you can help me follow up?
translation.reference: Could you help follow up on it?

translation.zh: 推迟
translation.en: Delayed.
translation.source: 推迟
translation.medium: Delay
translation.reference: Delayed.

translation.zh: 谢谢
translation.en: Thank you.
translation.source: 谢谢
translation.medium: Thank you.
translation.reference: Thank you.

translation.zh: 就是说，其实我已经有 credit 了？
translation.en: That is to say, I actually already have credit?

translation.zh: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
translation.en: Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural elementary school teachers of music, PE and fine art in three years - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 江西３年内将培训万名乡村小学音体美教师-新华网
translation.medium: Jiangxi plans to train 10,000 rural primary school music teachers within the next three years - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Jiangxi will train 10,000 rural elementary school teachers of music, PE and fine art in three years - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanchang on May 22 (journalist: Chen Yushan): According to Ministry of Education of Jiangxi, in order to strengthen the supportability for teachers of subjects that are in short supply and realize balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, Jiangxi province planned to train 1 music teacher, 1 art teacher and 1 PE teacher who are qualified for each elementary school in rural areas of the whole province (villages, towns and below) in three years since 2016; a total of 10 thousand teachers will be trained.
translation.source: 新华社南昌５月２２日电（记者陈毓珊）记者近日从江西省教育厅获悉，为增强紧缺学科教师队伍保障能力，实现乡村义务教育均衡发展，自２０１６年起，江西省规划用３年时间为全省乡村（乡镇及以下）每所小学培训合格的音乐、美术、体育教师各１名，共计１万名。
translation.medium: According to a report from the Xinhua News Agency in Nanjing on May 22nd, a journalist recently learned from the Education Department of Jiangxi Province that in order to strengthen the guarantee capacity of teacher teams in shortage subjects and achieve balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, starting from 2016, Jiangxi Province plans to train 1,000 music, art, and sports teachers for rural (village and below) primary schools over the next three years, with each school having one trained teacher in each subject.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Nanchang on May 22 (journalist: Chen Yushan): According to Ministry of Education of Jiangxi, in order to strengthen the supportability for teachers of subjects that are in short supply and realize balanced development of compulsory education in rural areas, Jiangxi province planned to train 1 music teacher, 1 art teacher and 1 PE teacher who are qualified for each elementary school in rural areas of the whole province (villages, towns and below) in three years since 2016; a total of 10 thousand teachers will be trained.

translation.zh: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
translation.en: It is understood that the training objects this time are teachers of other subjects under 45 years old with basic knowledge or talent of music, art and PE in rural primary schools in Jiangxi and can work as music, art or PE teachers at the same time.
translation.source: 据了解，这次培训对象为江西全省乡村小学４５岁以下具有音乐、美术、体育学科知识基础或才能，能兼任音乐、美术、体育课程的其他学科教师。
translation.medium: According to understanding, this training object is for rural primary schools in Jiangxi Province with music, art, and physical education knowledge and skills, and can serve as other subject teachers for music, art, and physical education.
translation.reference: It is understood that the training objects this time are teachers of other subjects under 45 years old with basic knowledge or talent of music, art and PE in rural primary schools in Jiangxi and can work as music, art or PE teachers at the same time.

translation.zh: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
translation.en: Through training, they can master basic knowledge and teaching skills of the subjects of music, PE and art, and update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability and self-development ability; a team of music, PE and art teachers who are good at many subjects and specialize in one will be constructed to relieve the problem of lack of music, PE and art teachers in rural schools.
translation.source: 通过培训，使他们掌握音体美学科教学的基本知识和教学技能，更新教学思想和观念，掌握现代教学方法，提高学科教学能力、活动设计能力、校园文化能力及自我发展能力，建设一支一专多能的音体美教师队伍，缓解乡村音体美教师缺乏的问题。
translation.medium: Through training, they will master the basic knowledge and teaching skills of voice aesthetics, update their teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve their subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability, and self-development ability, build a team of multi-skilled voice aesthetics teachers, and solve the problem of insufficient number of rural voice aesthetics teachers.
translation.reference: Through training, they can master basic knowledge and teaching skills of the subjects of music, PE and art, and update teaching ideas and concepts, master modern teaching methods, improve subject teaching ability, activity design ability, campus cultural ability and self-development ability; a team of music, PE and art teachers who are good at many subjects and specialize in one will be constructed to relieve the problem of lack of music, PE and art teachers in rural schools.

translation.zh: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
translation.en: In order to ensure training quality and effect, Jiangxi plans to train 1 music, 1 art and 1 PE trainers for each elementary school in 100 counties (cities and districts) in Jiangxi, with a total of 300 trainers, to comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design and organization ability, training ability, network research workshop construction ability, so as to teach, demonstrate, guide and supervise.
translation.source: 为确保培训质量和效果，江西还规划为全省１００个县（市、区）小学音乐、美术、体育各培训１名，共计３００名培训者，全面提升他们的教学示范引领能力、教研活动设计组织能力、施训能力、网络研修工作坊建设能力，起到教授、示范、指导、监督的作用。
translation.medium: To ensure the quality and effectiveness of training, Jiangxi plans to provide 100 counties (cities, districts) with one trainer each in music, art, and sports, a total of 300 trainers, and comprehensively enhance their teaching demonstration leading ability, curriculum design and organization ability, teaching ability, and network training workshop construction ability, playing the role of teaching, demonstrating, guiding, and supervising.
translation.reference: In order to ensure training quality and effect, Jiangxi plans to train 1 music, 1 art and 1 PE trainers for each elementary school in 100 counties (cities and districts) in Jiangxi, with a total of 300 trainers, to comprehensively improve their teaching demonstration leading ability, teaching research activity design and organization ability, training ability, network research workshop construction ability, so as to teach, demonstrate, guide and supervise.

translation.zh: 推荐理由:深层清洁皮肤，帮你洗掉皮肤上的灰尘和油光，细致毛孔，并且可以全效滋养肌肤，有效保湿去斑，能改善皮肤暗黄及色斑状况，坚持使用能帮助提升肌肤的提升自我修护能力，帮助肌肤恢复紧致。
translation.en: Recommendation: It deeply cleans the skin, helps you wash away the dust and oily on your skin, refines the pores, fully nourishes the skin, effectively moisturizes and removes freckles, improves the skin’s darkness, yellowness and blemishes, and keeping using it will help improve your skin’s self-healing ability and help your skin return to its tight state.
translation.source: 推荐理由:深层清洁皮肤，帮你洗掉皮肤上的灰尘和油光，细致毛孔，并且可以全效滋养肌肤，有效保湿去斑，能改善皮肤暗黄及色斑状况，坚持使用能帮助提升肌肤的提升自我修护能力，帮助肌肤恢复紧致。
translation.medium: Recommendation: Deep cleansing of the skin, helping to remove dirt and oil residue on the skin surface, enlarging pores, and can effectively nourish and moisturize the skin. It can also effectively whiten and brighten the skin, improve the condition of hyperpigmentation and age spots, and enhance the self-repair ability of the skin. Continuous use can help improve the skin's texture and elasticity.
translation.reference: Recommendation: It deeply cleans the skin, helps you wash away the dust and oily on your skin, refines the pores, fully nourishes the skin, effectively moisturizes and removes freckles, improves the skin’s darkness, yellowness and blemishes, and keeping using it will help improve your skin’s self-healing ability and help your skin return to its tight state.

translation.source: 该款保质期（年）4年，产品产地浙江湖州，是否为特殊用途化妆品否，功效舒缓镇静，功效美白，净含量（mL/g）套装，功效补水，适合肤质任何肤质，功效保湿，产品包装有外盒，功效细致毛孔，功效深层清洁， 目前已有22万+人评价 ，获得了98%的好评率 ，评价其用着舒服，比较高档，装得挺好 。

Its effects include soothing and calming, whitening, and moisturizing. The net weight (mL/g) is in the package, and it is suitable for all skin types. The packaging has an outer box, and it is suitable for fine pores and deep cleansing. Currently, there are over 220,000+ reviews, with a 98% approval rate. Users praise its comfortable use, high-end feel, and stylish packaging.

translation.zh: 推荐理由:深层清洁毛孔污垢，软化老化角质，提拉紧致肌肤，淡化面部细纹，柔软丰盈面部，保湿的同时可以改善肤质，防止小皱纹的发生，适合任何肤质，温和不油腻。
translation.en: Recommendation: It can deeply clean the dirt in pores, exfoliate skin, lift and tighten skin, fade facial fine lines, soften and enrich facial skin, moisturize skin while improving skin quality and preventing small wrinkles at the same time; it is mild and not greasy, suitable for any skin type.
translation.source: 推荐理由:深层清洁毛孔污垢，软化老化角质，提拉紧致肌肤，淡化面部细纹，柔软丰盈面部，保湿的同时可以改善肤质，防止小皱纹的发生，适合任何肤质，温和不油腻。
translation.medium: Recommendation: Deep cleansing of pores and dirt, softening of aging keratin, lifting of sagging skin, fading of fine lines, moisturizing and improving skin texture, preventing the occurrence of wrinkles, suitable for all skin types, mild and non-greasy.
translation.reference: Recommendation: It can deeply clean the dirt in pores, exfoliate skin, lift and tighten skin, fade facial fine lines, soften and enrich facial skin, moisturize skin while improving skin quality and preventing small wrinkles at the same time; it is mild and not greasy, suitable for any skin type.

translation.zh: Hello，訂的餐还要多久才送到
translation.en: Hello, how much longer will the ordered food arrive?
translation.source: Hello，訂的餐还要多久才送到
translation.medium: Hello，how long will the ordered food take to arrive?
translation.reference: Hello, how much longer will the ordered food arrive?

translation.zh: 人家已收工
translation.en: They have wrapped up.
translation.source: 人家已收工
translation.medium: The work has been done at their place.
translation.reference: They have wrapped up.

translation.zh: 您的骑手电话是 #PHONENUMBER#，名字叫#NAME#
translation.en: The number and name of your delivery person is #PHONENUMBER# and #NAME#.
translation.source: 您的骑手电话是 #PHONENUMBER#，名字叫#NAME#
translation.medium: Your riding companion is #PHONENUMBER#, named #NAME#.
translation.reference: The number and name of your delivery person is #PHONENUMBER# and #NAME#.

translation.zh: 麻烦你给个合理交代
translation.en: Please offer me a reasonable solution.
translation.source: 麻烦你给个合理交代
translation.medium: Please give me a reasonable explanation.
translation.reference: Please offer me a reasonable solution.

translation.zh: 可以，但您的骑手很有问题，麻烦好好处理
translation.en: Sure, but your delivery person has some issue that needs to be dealt with.
translation.source: 可以，但您的骑手很有问题，麻烦好好处理
translation.medium: Sure, but your co-pilot has some problems, please handle it well.
translation.reference: Sure, but your delivery person has some issue that needs to be dealt with.

translation.zh: 能否先查下是否还在路上？如果可以，送到就最好
translation.en: Could you check if it’s still on the road first? If that’s okay, just deliver it.
translation.source: 能否先查下是否还在路上？如果可以，送到就最好
translation.medium: Can you check if they are still on the road? If possible, send them to the hospital as soon as possible.
translation.reference: Could you check if it’s still on the road first? If that’s okay, just deliver it.

translation.zh: OK，如果真没有，就返还订餐的钱
translation.en: OK, if there is really not, please return the money for the order.

translation.medium: OK, if there's none, just return the deposit for the reservation.
translation.reference: OK, if there is really not, please return the money for the order.

translation.zh: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
translation.en: Actually, there are many tricks for slightly overweight girls to match their clothes.
translation.source: 其实对于身体微胖的女孩子穿衣搭配的讲究很多。
translation.medium: In fact, there are many discussions about what to wear for girls who are overweight.
translation.reference: Actually, there are many tricks for slightly overweight girls to match their clothes.

translation.zh: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.
translation.source: 身体胖的女孩穿的裙子不能太短或太长，长度差不多在膝盖，刚好能盖住大腿胖的地方即可。
translation.medium: The skirt of a fat girl should not be too short or too long. The length difference should be around the knee, just enough to cover the fat thighs.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls shall wear skirts not too long or too short; they shall be of the length at around the knees, just covering the fat part of the thighs.

translation.zh: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
translation.en: The fat thighs will be shown if the skirt is too short.
translation.source: 裙子过短就会把腿上的肥胖显露出来。
translation.medium: If the skirt is too short, it will reveal the fat on the thighs.
translation.reference: The fat thighs will be shown if the skirt is too short.

translation.zh: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
translation.en: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.
translation.source: 过长就会给人矮而胖的感觉。
translation.medium: If you walk too long, it will give you a feeling of being short and fat.
translation.reference: Skirts that are too long will make you look short and fat.

translation.zh: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
translation.en: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.
translation.source: 如果穿出分出上中下三段来，就显得你自然增高了，就是上身、裙和长筒袜用不同的颜色，看上去就会产生一种修长的感觉 。
translation.medium: If you wear a skirt that is longer in the front and shorter in the back, it will make you appear taller. This is because the upper body, skirt, and long-sleeved shirt are all in different colors, which will create a sense of length.
translation.reference: If you are dressed in three sections, upper, middle and lower, you will naturally look taller; that is, use different colors for upper body, skirt and stockings, and you will look taller and slimmer.

translation.zh: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
translation.en: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.
translation.source: 其实很多深色系的衣服是微胖女孩子们的标配（这一点作者深有体会），深颜色也是掩盖你身体胖的好方法，高贵典雅的黑色短裙也是微胖女孩的首选。
translation.medium: Actually, many dark-colored clothes are the standard attire for chubby girls (a point the author feels deeply). Dark colors are also a good way to conceal your body fat, and high-class black short skirts are the first choice for chubby girls.
translation.reference: In fact, a lot of darker color clothes are what slightly overweight girls all have, which the author deeply agrees; dark colors are good methods to cover fatness of your bodies; in addition, noble and elegant black short shirts are best choices for slightly overweight girls.

translation.zh: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
translation.en: You will look slimmer in dark clothes, especially black short skirts.
translation.source: 穿上深颜色的衣服，特别是黑色的短裙，会让人觉得你瘦一些。
translation.medium: Wearing deep-colored clothing, especially a black short skirt, can make you look thinner.
translation.reference: You will look slimmer in dark clothes, especially black short skirts.

translation.zh: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
translation.en: Wear stockings and low-key shoes if your calves are fat.
translation.source: 如果小腿很胖，你的袜子和鞋不要穿得太让人注意。
translation.medium: If your legs are fat, don't wear your socks and shoes too tightly.
translation.reference: Wear stockings and low-key shoes if your calves are fat.

translation.zh: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
translation.en: The more common the better; the color shouldn’t be too bright.
translation.source: 越大众化越好，颜色也不要太鲜艳了。
translation.medium: The more people like it, the better it is. The color should not be too bright either.
translation.reference: The more common the better; the color shouldn’t be too bright.

translation.zh: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
translation.en: In case people will notice your legs and feet and think you’re fat.
translation.source: 以免人们对你的腿部和脚部注意时，让人得到肥胖的感觉。
translation.medium: To avoid people paying attention to your legs and feet, make people feel fat.
translation.reference: In case people will notice your legs and feet and think you’re fat.

translation.zh: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.
translation.source: 对于微微稍胖的女孩子一定要讲就好穿衣搭配的诀窍。
translation.medium: For girls who are slightly overweight, it is necessary to teach them how to dress appropriately.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls shall master the tricks for clothing matching.

translation.zh: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.
translation.source: 微胖女孩千万不要穿紧身的短裙，另外上衣不要过短或者塞在裙子里，会让人看了很不舒服，如果腿粗的话，要穿黑色的长筒袜或者网格袜(细格子的那种哦)，选择质地柔软的印花喇叭裙，搭配一件荡领的上衣，可以很好的掩盖胖女孩的不足。
translation.medium: Don't let the fat girl wear tight short skirts. Also, don't wear a top that is too short or stuffed inside the skirt, which will make people feel very uncomfortable. If you have thick legs, wear a black long-sleeved t-shirt or a mesh t-shirt (with a fine grid pattern), choose a soft and comfortable printed dress, and match it with a cardigan-style top that can well cover the fat girl's shortcomings.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls shall never wear close-fitting short skirts and the upper outer garment shall not be too short or tucked inside the skirt, which seem strange; slightly overweight girls with thicker legs shall wear black stockings or mesh stockings (thin meshes), a flare skirt with print pattern and soft texture, and a loose-collar upper outer garment to cover the defects of the body.

translation.zh: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。
translation.en: Of course, there are some skills for slightly overweight girls to wear short skirts.
translation.source: 当然了，微胖的女孩儿在穿短裙上也是有讲究的。
translation.medium: Of course, girls who are overweight should also pay attention to what they wear when they wear short skirts.
translation.reference: Of course, there are some skills for slightly overweight girls to wear short skirts.

translation.zh: 胖女孩穿短裙，应该选择与短裙的颜色一致的上衣，这样会使你胖胖的身材有增加高度的效果。
translation.en: When slightly overweight girls wear short skirts, they shall choose upper outer garment with the same color as the short skirt, so as to make them look taller.
translation.source: 胖女孩穿短裙，应该选择与短裙的颜色一致的上衣，这样会使你胖胖的身材有增加高度的效果。
translation.medium: A fat girl wearing a short skirt should choose a top that matches the color of the skirt, which will make her look taller.
translation.reference: When slightly overweight girls wear short skirts, they shall choose upper outer garment with the same color as the short skirt, so as to make them look taller.

translation.zh: 短裙搭配高跟鞋，可以让你的双腿显得更为修长，这可是夏季最IN的搭配喔!
translation.en: Wearing skirt with a pair of high heels will make your legs seem slimmer and longer, which is the most fashionable outfit in summer!
translation.source: 短裙搭配高跟鞋，可以让你的双腿显得更为修长，这可是夏季最IN的搭配喔!
translation.medium: Short skirts can be paired with high-heeled shoes to make your legs look even more slender. This is the hottest summer match-up, isn't it?
translation.reference: Wearing skirt with a pair of high heels will make your legs seem slimmer and longer, which is the most fashionable outfit in summer!

translation.zh: 如果你是上身胖，但腿很瘦的MM，推荐选择华丽感的连衣短裙。
translation.en: Girls with fat upper body and slim legs shall choose short dress of luxurious style.
translation.source: 如果你是上身胖，但腿很瘦的MM，推荐选择华丽感的连衣短裙。
translation.medium: If you are an MM who is overweight on the upper body but has skinny legs, I recommend choosing a stylish midi dress.
translation.reference: Girls with fat upper body and slim legs shall choose short dress of luxurious style.

translation.zh: 不但能遮住大肚皮，更能展现你的优点。
translation.en: It can not only cover the fat stomach, but also show your advantages.
translation.source: 不但能遮住大肚皮，更能展现你的优点。
translation.medium: Not only can it block the big belly, but it can also showcase your strengths.
translation.reference: It can not only cover the fat stomach, but also show your advantages.

translation.zh: A字短裙会很显瘦，比较适合胖女孩，上衣要选择紧身一些的，形成层次感会更显瘦。
translation.en: A-line skirt makes people seem slimmer and is suitable for fat girls; it’s better to choose tight-fitting upper outer garment so as to form a sense of layers and make you look slimmer.
translation.source: A字短裙会很显瘦，比较适合胖女孩，上衣要选择紧身一些的，形成层次感会更显瘦。
translation.medium: A-line skirts are very slimming, especially suitable for chubby girls. When choosing a top, it's best to choose something that is tight-fitting, which will create a layered effect and make you look even slimmer.
translation.reference: A-line skirt makes people seem slimmer and is suitable for fat girls; it’s better to choose tight-fitting upper outer garment so as to form a sense of layers and make you look slimmer.

translation.zh: 简简单单白T恤搭配短裙，胖MM也可以尝试。
translation.en: Fat girls can also try simple white T-shirt with short skirt.
translation.source: 简简单单白T恤搭配短裙，胖MM也可以尝试。
translation.medium: Wear a simple white T-shirt with a short skirt, even MM can try it.
translation.reference: Fat girls can also try simple white T-shirt with short skirt.

translation.zh: 微胖的女孩也是能够穿出时尚感的。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls can be fashionable.
translation.source: 微胖的女孩也是能够穿出时尚感的。
translation.medium: Even a thin girl can also dress in a stylish way.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls can be fashionable.

translation.zh: 只要能够掌握好穿衣搭配的法则那么微胖的女孩子们也会是万众瞩目的焦点。
translation.en: Slightly overweight girls can be the focus of attention as long as they master the clothing matching rules.
translation.source: 只要能够掌握好穿衣搭配的法则那么微胖的女孩子们也会是万众瞩目的焦点。
translation.medium: As long as you can master the rules of dressing up, then even thin girls will become the focus of everyone's attention.
translation.reference: Slightly overweight girls can be the focus of attention as long as they master the clothing matching rules.

translation.zh: 在穿衣搭配方面上有了改变后，在生活中也要多运动，争取早一天脱离微胖女生的标签吧😄
translation.en: In addition to changes in matching outfits, slightly overweight girls need to do more exercises, and hopefully you will remove the label of slightly overweight girls sooner😄
translation.source: 在穿衣搭配方面上有了改变后，在生活中也要多运动，争取早一天脱离微胖女生的标签吧😄
translation.medium: After making changes in clothing coordination, in life, you should also exercise more, and try to get rid of the label of "micro-obese woman" earlier in the morning 😄
translation.reference: In addition to changes in matching outfits, slightly overweight girls need to do more exercises, and hopefully you will remove the label of slightly overweight girls sooner😄

translation.zh: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
translation.en: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.
translation.source: 第十八届“世界饮料创新奖”（World Beverage Innovation Awards）是FoodBev Media与德国纽伦堡国际啤酒、酿酒及饮料工业展览会（Brau Beviale）联合举办的奖项。
translation.medium: The "World Beverage Innovation Awards" (WBIA) is a jointly organized award by FoodBev Media and the German New Berlin International Brewing, Distilling and Beverage Industry Exhibition (Brau Beviale).
translation.reference: The 18th “World Beverage Innovation Awards” is an award jointly held by FoodBev Media and Brau Beviale.

translation.zh: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
translation.en: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.
translation.source: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
translation.medium: 吸引了来自25个国家、22个不同品类的279个作品参赛。
translation.reference: It attracted 279 works from 25 countries and 22 categories to participate in the competition.

translation.zh: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
translation.en: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).
translation.source: 10月15日，决赛入围者名单公布，最终获奖者名单将于11月11日（英国夏令时）线上公布。
translation.medium: On October 15th, the list of finalists will be announced. The final winners list will be announced online on November 11th (British summer time).
translation.reference: On October 15th, the list of the finalists was published, and the final list of winners will be published online on November 11 (BST).

translation.zh: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
translation.en: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.
translation.source: 我们看到，元气森林的LP28无糖酸奶入围最佳乳饮料奖，伊利安慕希的“GOGO武汉”营销入围最佳营销活动，百事可乐和人民日报新媒体合作的包装还入围最佳包装设计/标签奖。
translation.medium: We see that the LP28 no-sugar yogurt from Yuan Qi Forest has been shortlisted for the Best Dairy Beverage award, "GOGO Wuhan" marketing campaign by Ilian has been shortlisted for the Best Marketing Activity award, and the packaging collaboration between Hundred Joy and People's Daily Online Media has been shortlisted for the Best Packaging Design/Label award.
translation.reference: We have seen that Genki Forest’s LP28 sugar-free yoghurt was shortlisted for the Award of Best Milk Drink; the marketing of “GOGO Wuhan” of Yili AMBROSIAL was shortlisted for the Award of Best Marketing Activity; the packaging jointly designed by Pepsi and the new media of People’s Daily was shortlisted for the Award of Best Packaging Design/Label.

translation.zh: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
translation.en: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.
translation.source: FoodBev Media高级市场营销总监Laura Nettle表示：我们很高兴与Brau Beviale一起庆祝年度世界饮料创新奖的第18年。
translation.medium: Laura Nettle, senior marketing manager of FoodBev Media, said, "We are delighted to celebrate the 18th annual World Beverage Innovation Awards with Brau Beviale."
translation.reference: Laura Nettle, senior marketing director of Foodbev Media, said, “we are pleased to celebrate the 18th year of the annual world beverage innovation award with Brau beviale”.

translation.zh: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
translation.en: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.
translation.source: 从新口味、新概念和新功能到品牌、包装和制造，随着行业不断以更可持续的方式进行创新，我们看到了饮料行业的趋势。
translation.medium: From new flavors, new concepts, and new functions to branding, packaging, and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we see the trends in the beverage industry.
translation.reference: From new tastes, new concepts, new functions to brands, packaging and manufacturing, as the industry continues to innovate in a more sustainable way, we have seen the trends of the beverage industry.

translation.zh: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
translation.en: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.
translation.source: 世界饮料创新奖表彰了全球饮料行业新老品牌今年最具雄心的新产品和新发展。
translation.medium: The World Beverage Innovation Award honored the most ambitious new products and developments in the global beverage industry this year.
translation.reference: The world beverage innovation award recognizes the most ambitious new products and developments of new and old brands in the global beverage industry this year.

translation.zh: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
translation.en: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.
translation.source: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化成新的瓶子。
translation.medium: The technology developed by Ardagh Group can recycle 100% of the used glass bottles and transform them into new bottles.
translation.reference: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass into new bottles.

translation.zh: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。
translation.en: The packaging of the bagged water in the box is 100% recyclable, which can reduce packaging by 66% and carbon emission by 97%.
translation.source: 箱中袋装水，其包装盒采用100％可回收利用，可减少包装66％，减少碳排放97％。

translation.reference: The packaging of the bagged water in the box is 100% recyclable, which can reduce packaging by 66% and carbon emission by 97%.

translation.zh: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
translation.en: Latcub is 100% biodegradable; it uses less paper, and does not use glue or tape that is harmful to the environment.
translation.source: LatCub是100％可生物降解，使用更少的纸，并且不使用对环境有害的胶水或胶带。
translation.medium: LatCub is 100% biodegradable, uses less paper, and does not use harmful adhesives or binders to the environment.
translation.reference: Latcub is 100% biodegradable; it uses less paper, and does not use glue or tape that is harmful to the environment.

translation.zh: Ardagh Group开发的技术，可以将100％的回收玻璃重新熔化制成新的瓶子。
translation.en: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.

translation.medium: The technology developed by Ardagh Group can recycle 100% of the used glass and melt it into new bottles.
translation.reference: Technology developed by Ardagh Group can melt 100% of recycled glass and make them into new bottles.

translation.zh: 新华全媒+丨北京青少年冰球联赛助燃冬奥热情-新华网
translation.en: XInhua All Media+丨Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey League fueled the enthusiasm for the Winter Olympics - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 新华全媒+丨北京青少年冰球联赛助燃冬奥热情-新华网
translation.medium: The Beijing Youth Ice Hockey League ignites the passion for winter sports in the 2022 Winter Olympics - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: XInhua All Media+丨Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey League fueled the enthusiasm for the Winter Olympics - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 12月11日，北京梦想ING队球员庞尧天（中）在比赛中射门。
translation.en: Pang Yaotian (the one in the middle), a player of Beijing Dream ING team, was shooting in the game on December 11.
translation.source: 12月11日，北京梦想ING队球员庞尧天（中）在比赛中射门。
translation.medium: On December 11th, Chinese Dreaming ING team soccer player Pan Yao Tian (middle) scored a goal in the game.
translation.reference: Pang Yaotian (the one in the middle), a player of Beijing Dream ING team, was shooting in the game on December 11.

translation.zh: 当日，2021-2022赛季北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛在北京各大冰场继续角逐。
translation.en: On the same day, Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Club League of 2021-2022 season continued in various ice ranks in Beijing.
translation.source: 当日，2021-2022赛季北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛在北京各大冰场继续角逐。
translation.medium: On the day, the 2021-2022 season of the Beijing Youth Ice Hockey League continued to compete in various ice rinks in Beijing.
translation.reference: On the same day, Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Club League of 2021-2022 season continued in various ice ranks in Beijing.

translation.zh: 本届联赛分为常规赛与季后赛，参赛运动员年龄段为U6至U18，组别设置分为竞技组与选拔组，共吸引全市256支代表队的近3600名球员参加。
translation.en: The league was divided into the regular season and the post season, with athletes from U6 to U18; they were divided into competitive group and the selection group; nearly 3,600 athletes from 256 teams of the whole city participated in the league.
translation.source: 本届联赛分为常规赛与季后赛，参赛运动员年龄段为U6至U18，组别设置分为竞技组与选拔组，共吸引全市256支代表队的近3600名球员参加。
translation.medium: The league is divided into regular season and playoffs. The age range of participating athletes is from U6 to U18. The competition is divided into competitive group and selection group, with a total of 256 representative teams from all over the city, attracting nearly 3,600 players to participate.
translation.reference: The league was divided into the regular season and the post season, with athletes from U6 to U18; they were divided into competitive group and the selection group; nearly 3,600 athletes from 256 teams of the whole city participated in the league.

translation.zh: 北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛经过十余年的发展，现已成为北京青少年冰球爱好者切磋技术、广交球友的平台，并为北京市青少年冰球队和青年队输送优秀球员。
translation.en: After development for more than 10 years, Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Club League has been a platform for Beijing teenage ice hockey lovers to hone skills and make friends; in addition, it has provided Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Team and Youth Team with excellent players.
translation.source: 北京市青少年冰球俱乐部联赛经过十余年的发展，现已成为北京青少年冰球爱好者切磋技术、广交球友的平台，并为北京市青少年冰球队和青年队输送优秀球员。
translation.medium: After more than ten years of development, the Beijing Youth Ice Hockey Club League has become a platform for Beijing youth ice hockey enthusiasts to hone their skills and make friends, and has produced outstanding players for the Beijing Youth Ice Hockey Team and the Youth Team.
translation.reference: After development for more than 10 years, Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Club League has been a platform for Beijing teenage ice hockey lovers to hone skills and make friends; in addition, it has provided Beijing Teenager Ice Hockey Team and Youth Team with excellent players.

translation.zh: 联赛发挥赛事对北京青少年冰球运动的带动作用，助燃冬奥冰球热情，为后冬奥时期北京冰球运动发展打下基础。
translation.en: The league has promoted Ice Hockey among teenagers in Beijing, fueled the enthusiasm for Ice Hockey in Winter Olympics and laid a basis for the development of Ice Hockey in Beijing for the post Winter Olympics period.
translation.source: 联赛发挥赛事对北京青少年冰球运动的带动作用，助燃冬奥冰球热情，为后冬奥时期北京冰球运动发展打下基础。
translation.medium: The league competition has a stimulating effect on the development of ice hockey among Beijing youth. It ignites enthusiasm for the Winter Olympics ice hockey event, and lays a foundation for the development of ice hockey in Beijing during the post-Winter Olympics period.
translation.reference: The league has promoted Ice Hockey among teenagers in Beijing, fueled the enthusiasm for Ice Hockey in Winter Olympics and laid a basis for the development of Ice Hockey in Beijing for the post Winter Olympics period.

translation.zh: 女孩当箭靶为姐姐募捐 : " 想到是皮肉伤也就还好 " - 新华网
translation.en: Girl raises donations for elder sister by acting a target, saying “It’s ok since they are only flesh wounds” - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 女孩当箭靶为姐姐募捐 : " 想到是皮肉伤也就还好 " - 新华网
translation.medium: "Girl takes arrow as target for sister's fundraising: 'Thinking about it hurts, but it's still better than nothing' - Xinhua Net"
translation.reference: Girl raises donations for elder sister by acting a target, saying “It’s ok since they are only flesh wounds” - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样。
translation.en: A girl stood in front of a big plank, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou.
translation.source: 杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样。
translation.medium: A girl stands in front of a large wooden board in Wulin Square, Hangzhou. The board has the words "human targets, ten yuan per arrow" written on it.
translation.reference: A girl stood in front of a big plank, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou.

translation.zh: 昨日上午，一则“杭州女孩甘当‘箭靶’为姐募捐”的照片刷爆朋友圈。
translation.en: Yesterday morning, a picture of “a girl in Hangzhou raises donation for her elder sister by acting as a target” went viral all over WeChat.
translation.source: 昨日上午，一则“杭州女孩甘当‘箭靶’为姐募捐”的照片刷爆朋友圈。
translation.medium: Yesterday morning, a photo of a "Hangzhou girl willing to be a 'target' for her sister's fundraising" went viral on social media.
translation.reference: Yesterday morning, a picture of “a girl in Hangzhou raises donation for her elder sister by acting as a target” went viral all over WeChat.

translation.zh: 照片显示，杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块比人略高的大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样，示意路人付款后可使用弓箭射击。
translation.en: A picture shows a girl standing in front of a plank slightly higher than a person, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, indicating that people can shoot with a bow and arrows after making the payment.
translation.source: 照片显示，杭州武林广场一女孩站在一块比人略高的大木板前头，木板上写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”字样，示意路人付款后可使用弓箭射击。
translation.medium: The photo shows a girl standing in front of a tall wooden board in Hangzhou Wulin Square. The board has the words "human targets, 10 yuan per arrow" written on it, indicating that after paying the fee, people can use bows and arrows to shoot.
translation.reference: A picture shows a girl standing in front of a plank slightly higher than a person, which writes “human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, indicating that people can shoot with a bow and arrows after making the payment.

translation.zh: 该行为引发网友热议。
translation.en: The behavior was discussed heatedly by people on the Internet.
translation.source: 该行为引发网友热议。
translation.medium: This behavior sparked heated discussions among netizens.
translation.reference: The behavior was discussed heatedly by people on the Internet.

translation.zh: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。
translation.en: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that it was confirmed by the police that the girl did this in order to raise donations for her elder sister; however, this behavior should not be advocated, and the girl left from the local police station yesterday after being warned.
translation.source: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人向新京报记者证实，警方确认该女孩为姐姐募捐才做出这样的过激举动，但这种行为并不值得提倡，经告诫后，该女孩昨日已经离开当地派出所。
translation.medium: Last night, the Hangzhou Municipal Public Security Bureau's Xihu Branch issued a statement to reporters from Newsgd.com, confirming that the police identified the girl as the sister who solicited donations and made such an extreme move. However, such behavior is not worthy of promotion, and after being reminded, the girl left the local police station the day before.
translation.reference: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that it was confirmed by the police that the girl did this in order to raise donations for her elder sister; however, this behavior should not be advocated, and the girl left from the local police station yesterday after being warned.

translation.zh: 女孩街头“箭靶”募捐被告诫
translation.en: The girl who raised donations by acting as a target on the street was warned
translation.source: 女孩街头“箭靶”募捐被告诫
translation.medium: Girl on the street with a "target" for donations
translation.reference: The girl who raised donations by acting as a target on the street was warned

translation.zh: 网传图片中，一位长发女孩呈“个”字型站在一块大木板前，木板上用黑色墨水写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”的字样，她身前另一块木板上写有其银行账号与微信、支付宝账号等。
translation.en: In the picture appeared on the Internet, a girl with long hair was standing with her arms spread out in front of a big plank which writes human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” in black ink at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, and there was another plank in front of her which has the bank account, WeChat account and Alipay account on it.
translation.source: 网传图片中，一位长发女孩呈“个”字型站在一块大木板前，木板上用黑色墨水写有“人肉靶子，十元一箭”的字样，她身前另一块木板上写有其银行账号与微信、支付宝账号等。
translation.medium: A picture circulating on the internet shows a girl with long hair standing in the shape of a "character" in front of a large wooden board with the words "human target, 10 yuan per arrow" written in black ink on it. Another wooden board next to her has her bank account number, WeChat, and Alipay account numbers written on it.
translation.reference: In the picture appeared on the Internet, a girl with long hair was standing with her arms spread out in front of a big plank which writes human target, 10 yuan for each arrow” in black ink at Wulin Square in Hangzhou, and there was another plank in front of her which has the bank account, WeChat account and Alipay account on it.

translation.zh: 该图片上网后引发争议。
translation.en: The picture was discussed heatedly after it was posted on the Internet.
translation.source: 该图片上网后引发争议。
translation.medium: The picture sparked controversy after it was posted online.
translation.reference: The picture was discussed heatedly after it was posted on the Internet.

translation.zh: 有网友认为，此举系“博眼球的乞讨行为 ” ， 也有不少网友对此表示同情。
translation.en: According to some netizens, this behavior is “begging behavior which aims to grab attention”, but many others show sympathy to her.
translation.source: 有网友认为，此举系“博眼球的乞讨行为 ” ， 也有不少网友对此表示同情。
translation.medium: Some netizens believe that this is a "begging behavior of the boss" and many netizens express sympathy.
translation.reference: According to some netizens, this behavior is “begging behavior which aims to grab attention”, but many others show sympathy to her.

translation.zh: “我们是23日上午10点左右巡逻到广场旁的时候发现的情况，当时围观群众已经不少了 。 ”
translation.en: “We found her at about 10:00 am on the 23rd when we went on the patrol around the square, and there were already lots of onlookers.”
translation.source: “我们是23日上午10点左右巡逻到广场旁的时候发现的情况，当时围观群众已经不少了 。 ”
translation.medium: “We discovered the situation around 10:00 on the 23rd when we patrolled to the square. At that time, there were already many people gathered there.”
translation.reference: “We found her at about 10:00 am on the 23rd when we went on the patrol around the square, and there were already lots of onlookers.”

translation.zh: 事发地附近的天水派出所民警接受当地媒体采访时称，摆摊的女孩子共有两名，均为20岁左右，打扮得青春靓丽。
translation.en: According to what the police officer of the Tianshui Police Station near the site told the local media, there were two young and beautiful girls in early 20s who set up a stall.
translation.source: 事发地附近的天水派出所民警接受当地媒体采访时称，摆摊的女孩子共有两名，均为20岁左右，打扮得青春靓丽。
translation.medium: According to the local police station in the vicinity of the incident, the two female vendors involved in the incident were both around 20 years old and dressed in a youthful and beautiful manner.
translation.reference: According to what the police officer of the Tianshui Police Station near the site told the local media, there were two young and beautiful girls in early 20s who set up a stall.

translation.zh: 其中，做“人肉靶子”的女孩一直在哭，求路人玩一下这个游戏；另一女孩在边上帮着吆喝，说自己这个朋友的姐姐得了白血病，现在急需手术费，请大家帮忙。
translation.en: The girl acting as the “human target” kept crying, begging onlookers to play this game; the other girl was calling for attention on the side, saying that the elder sister of her friend suffered from leukemia and is in urgent need of operation fee, and asking onlookers to help her friend.
translation.source: 其中，做“人肉靶子”的女孩一直在哭，求路人玩一下这个游戏；另一女孩在边上帮着吆喝，说自己这个朋友的姐姐得了白血病，现在急需手术费，请大家帮忙。
translation.medium: Among them, the girl who was used as a "human target" was crying and begging passersby to play this game; another girl was standing on the side, shouting and asking for help, saying that her friend's sister had leukemia and needed urgent surgical funds.
translation.reference: The girl acting as the “human target” kept crying, begging onlookers to play this game; the other girl was calling for attention on the side, saying that the elder sister of her friend suffered from leukemia and is in urgent need of operation fee, and asking onlookers to help her friend.

translation.zh: “我们与贵州当地警方取得联系，了解到该女孩是在为姐姐白血病治疗募捐 。 ”
translation.en: “We have gained contact with the police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was raising donations for her elder sister who suffered from leukemia.”
translation.source: “我们与贵州当地警方取得联系，了解到该女孩是在为姐姐白血病治疗募捐 。 ”
translation.medium: “We have contacted local police in Yunnan Province and learned that the girl was collecting donations for her sister's leukemia treatment.”
translation.reference: “We have gained contact with the police in Guizhou and learned that the girl was raising donations for her elder sister who suffered from leukemia.”

translation.zh: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为吉佳丽，为姐姐吉佳艳募捐。
translation.en: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that this girl is named Ji Jiali, and she was raising donations for Ji Jiayan, her elder sister.
translation.source: 昨晚，杭州市公安局下城分局宣传负责人告诉新京报记者，这名女孩名为吉佳丽，为姐姐吉佳艳募捐。
translation.medium: Last night, the Hangzhou Municipal Public Security Bureau's Xiacheng Branch Propaganda Department told a reporter from the New China News that the girl's name was Jingjie and she was collecting donations for her sister Jingjia.
translation.reference: Yesterday night, the person in charge of publicity at Xiacheng sub-bureau of Hangzhou Public Security Bureau confirmed to the journalist of the Beijing News that this girl is named Ji Jiali, and she was raising donations for Ji Jiayan, her elder sister.

translation.zh: 但由于治疗仍需要30余万费用，一时想不到好的办法募捐，才做出了这种行为。
translation.en: Since more than 300 thousand yuan was still required for treatment, Ji Jiali did this because she had no better way.
translation.source: 但由于治疗仍需要30余万费用，一时想不到好的办法募捐，才做出了这种行为。
translation.medium: But because the treatment still needs more than 300,000 yuan in expenses, I couldn't think of a good way to raise funds at the moment, so I made this decision.
translation.reference: Since more than 300 thousand yuan was still required for treatment, Ji Jiali did this because she had no better way.

translation.zh: 他说，全过程中，两个女孩一个当靶子，一个负责打下手，但并未参与其中，全过程中未发现有人射箭，只是有人围观并拍了照片发到了微博上。
translation.en: He told the journalist that one of the two girls acted as human target, and the other girl acted as an assistant and was not involved; nobody was found to have shot arrows during the whole process, and some onlookers only took pictures and posted them on Weibo.
translation.source: 他说，全过程中，两个女孩一个当靶子，一个负责打下手，但并未参与其中，全过程中未发现有人射箭，只是有人围观并拍了照片发到了微博上。
translation.medium: He said that during the whole process, one girl was the target and the other was responsible for shooting, but neither of them participated in it. There was no one shooting during the whole process, but there were people watching and taking pictures and uploading them to Weibo.
translation.reference: He told the journalist that one of the two girls acted as human target, and the other girl acted as an assistant and was not involved; nobody was found to have shot arrows during the whole process, and some onlookers only took pictures and posted them on Weibo.

translation.zh: 后警方经治安部门鉴定，使用的弓箭不属管制范畴。
translation.en: Later, the police sent it to the public security department and identified that the bows and arrows used were not under control.
translation.source: 后警方经治安部门鉴定，使用的弓箭不属管制范畴。
translation.medium: After the police identified the type of bow and arrow used, it was determined that it was not subject to control within the scope of the relevant regulations.
translation.reference: Later, the police sent it to the public security department and identified that the bows and arrows used were not under control.

translation.zh: 该负责人表示 ， “ 不提倡采取这种博眼球募捐方式 ” 。
translation.en: According to the person in charge, “raising donations by grabbing attention is not advocated”.
translation.source: 该负责人表示 ， “ 不提倡采取这种博眼球募捐方式 ” 。
translation.medium: The person in charge said, "We do not encourage the use of this method of collecting donations."
translation.reference: According to the person in charge, “raising donations by grabbing attention is not advocated”.

translation.zh: 经派出所民警告诫后，她已经离开派出所。
translation.en: She left from the police station after being warned by the police.
translation.source: 经派出所民警告诫后，她已经离开派出所。
translation.medium: After being warned by the local police, she has already left the police station.
translation.reference: She left from the police station after being warned by the police.

My chicken is all high-frame rate and stable, which is very smooth, and LOL is not even in the picture. CSGO is also easily won, and most three-A games can be played smoothly.

It's definitely a worthwhile purchase, and I think it's also suitable for girls.

translation.reference: I bought it for my son, and he said it’s pretty good.

translation.reference: Not bad, the image quality for playing games is really nice.

translation.zh: 2021年什么最火？
translation.en: What is the hottest thing in 2021?
translation.source: 2021年什么最火？
translation.medium: What was the hottest thing in 2021?
translation.reference: What is the hottest thing in 2021?

translation.zh: 无疑是东京奥运会。
translation.en: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.source: 无疑是东京奥运会。
translation.medium: Without doubt, it is the Tokyo Olympics.
translation.reference: It was none other than the Tokyo Olympics.

translation.zh: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
translation.en: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
translation.source: 您以为只有奥运健儿才能拿奖吗？
