translation.medium: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?
translation.reference: Do you think only Olympic athletes can win awards?

translation.zh: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
translation.en: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.
translation.source: 前段时间有篇《快看！项目经理可冲击金牌的奥运项目》文章很火，里面提到项目经理们在很多项目上，绝对是可以一马当先，无人能匹： 搬砖、出差、熬夜是项目经理的日常，救火、背锅、道歉更是不在话下。
translation.medium: There was an article in the past that was very hot, called "Can project managers win Olympic gold?", which mentioned that project managers can definitely take the lead in many projects, and no one can catch up: moving bricks, going on business trips, staying up late is the daily routine of project managers, and rescuing, carrying buckets, and apologizing are not even mentioned.
translation.reference: Recently, there is an article titled Look! An article titled Olympic Disciplines in Which Project Managers Can Win Gold Medals was viral, and it mentioned that project managers can be the foremost and unmatched in many disciplines, such as working arduously, going on business trips, and staying up late, the everyday work of project manager, and handling emergency, taking the blame and apologizing are nothing difficult at all.

translation.zh: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
translation.en: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.
translation.source: 看似玩笑调侃的一篇文章，却也道出了项目经理们的日常辛酸，背后代表的是对当前项目管理工作的力不从心。
translation.medium: A seemingly humorous article, but it also reveals the daily hardships faced by project managers, and behind it lies a lack of confidence in the current project management work.
translation.reference: A seemingly joking article also tells the bitterness of their daily work, and the hidden message is their insufficient energy to handle the current project management work.

translation.zh: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
translation.en: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.
translation.source: 而从事项目管理工作的人员，也渐渐选择通过一些行动来让自己摆脱工作中的困境。
translation.medium: And personnel who engage in project management also gradually choose to take action to get out of the dilemmas they encounter in their work.
translation.reference: People engaged in project management also gradually choose to get rid of the predicament in work by taking certain actions.

translation.zh: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
translation.en: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.
translation.source: 从每年攀升的PMP（国际认证的项目管理专业人士资格）报名人数来看，越来越多的项目管理从业人员通过学习来提升自己的项目管理能力。
translation.medium: According to the number of PMP (Project Management Professional, an internationally recognized certification for project management professionals) registration, an increasing number of project management professionals are improving their project management skills through learning.
translation.reference: Judging from the increasing number of PMP (internationally certified project management professional qualification) applicants each year, increasing project management practitioners improve their project management ability through learning.

translation.zh: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
translation.en: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.
translation.source: 据《中国项目管理二十年发展报告(1999-2019)》称：截止到2019年9月，全国累计PMP®报考人数近60万人次，通过PMP®认证人数约42万人，有效持证人数约30万人, 占全球PMP®持证总量的31.2%。
translation.medium: According to the "20 Years of Project Management Development in China (1999-2019)" report, as of September 2019, the total number of PMP® exam candidates in China was nearly 600,000, with about 420,000 passing the exam and about 300,000 obtaining valid certificates, accounting for 31.2% of the global PMP® certificate holders.
translation.reference: According to the 20-year Development Report on China’s Project Management (1999-2019), as of September 2019, the national PMP ® applicants totals 600,000, with 420,000 passed the PMP ® certification, and the number of valid certificate holders are about 300,000, accounting for 31.2% of the total number of certificates of PMP ® in the world.

translation.zh: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
translation.en: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.
translation.source: 近10年PMP持证人数逐年递增，这说明越来越多的项目管理者意识到：靠简单照搬以往“老经验”来做事已不可取，瞬息万变的工作环境让我们知道一个要学会，站在科学巨人的肩膀上去探索前行的道路。
translation.medium: In the past 10 years, the number of PMP certified individuals has been increasing annually, which indicates that an increasing number of project managers have realized that relying solely on past "experience" to do things is no longer effective. The rapidly changing work environment has made us realize that we need to learn how to explore new paths while standing on the shoulders of scientific giants.
translation.reference: In the past ten years, the number of people holding PMP certificates keeps increasing, which indicates that more and more project managers realize it is no longer advisable to do things by simply copying “past experience”; the rapidly changing working environment tells us that we should learn to stand on the shoulders of scientific giants and explore the way forward.

translation.zh: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
translation.en: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?
translation.source: 然而，考了PMP就能保证项目管理工作畅通无阻了吗？
translation.medium: But does passing the PMP exam guarantee that project management work will run smoothly?
translation.reference: However, can you ensure the smooth proceeding of project management work after passing the PMP test?

translation.zh: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
translation.en: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.
translation.source: 很多项目管理初学者表示，通过学习PMP/IPMP等相关课程，可以系统性地掌握项目管理的十大领域和五大过程组等相关知识点，但真正进行项目管理工作的时候却还是一头雾水。
translation.medium: Many project management beginners express that by studying PMP/IPMP courses, they can systematically master the ten major domains and five process groups of project management, but when it comes to actually performing project management work, it is still a headache.
translation.reference: Many beginners of project management say that by learning courses of PMP/IPMP, they can systematically master knowledge points such as the ten fields and five major process groups of project management, but they are still confused when they are actually engaged in project management work.

translation.zh: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
translation.en: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...
translation.source: 很多项目经理常常反馈以下问题： 项目管理认知不到位，单纯依靠个人经验，空有项目管理理论，不知如何实践； 缺乏系统的项目管理流程制度支撑，工作中无法落地，项目预估不准，把控度灵敏度差，项目一拖再拖； 成员分工不明确、团队中的“老油条”不知如何应对 跨部门协助沟通不顺畅，项目难以推进 ……
translation.medium: Many project managers often report the following problems: Insufficient project management knowledge, relying solely on personal experience, lacking project management theories, and not knowing how to practice; Lack of systematic project management procedures and support, unable to implement in work, project estimation inaccurate, control and sensitivity poor, project delaying again and again; Team members' roles are not clearly defined, and how to deal with "old oil sticks" in the team is unclear; Cross-departmental cooperation is not smooth, and the project is difficult to advance.
translation.reference: Many project managers often reflect the following problems: project management awareness is not sufficient, relying solely on personal experience, and there is only project management theories and no ideas about how to practice them; lack of support of systematic project management process and system, unable to actually implement the work, inaccurate project estimation, poor sensitivity of control, and project being delayed again and again; the members’ division of labor is not clear, there’s no way to handle the “sophisticated ones” in the team, communication is not smooth between departments, and it is difficult to push the project forward...

translation.zh: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
translation.en: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.
translation.source: 因此，专注产品创新与研发管理领域十余载，已帮助众多优秀的企业培养了大批的产品经理、项目经理等研发关键人才，并获得了 “中国企业研发管理人才培训示范基地”等荣誉称号的中天华夏咨询带着《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程来了。
translation.medium: Therefore, focusing on product innovation and R&D management for over ten years, I have helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of product managers, project managers, and other R&D key talents. We have also won the honorary title of "China's Enterprise R&D Management Talent Training Base" and brought the online course "Research and Development Project Manager Training" with us.
translation.reference: Therefore, ZTCHINA, which has been focusing on the field of product innovation and R&D of management for more than ten years and helped many excellent enterprises cultivate a large number of key R&D talents such as product managers and project managers, and won the honorary title of “China Enterprise R&D and Management Talents Training Demonstration Base”, presents the online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp.

translation.zh: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
translation.en: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.
translation.source: 《研发项目经理特训营》线上课程 这是一种线上碎片化学习的方式，结合了众多研发型企业的实战案例、工具和方法，帮助您掌握项目经理必备知识及标准动作，走上自身项目管理的进阶之路。
translation.medium: The "Research and Development Project Manager Training Camp" online course is a way of learning through fragmented online modules. It combines numerous practical cases, tools, and methods from various research and development-oriented enterprises to help you master the essential knowledge and standard actions required for project management, and embark on the advanced path of project management for yourself.
translation.reference: The online course R&D Project Manager Special Training Camp is an online fragmented learning method, which combines the practical cases, tools and methods of many research and development type enterprises to help you master the necessary knowledge and standard actions of project managers, and embark on the advancing journey of project management on your own.

translation.zh: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
translation.en: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.
translation.source: 这也是一次让企业用更低的成本和更少的投入，促进项目经理的培养进程，为企业带来高效运作结果的机会。
translation.medium: This is an opportunity for enterprises to promote the development of project managers with lower costs and fewer investments, and achieve efficient operation results.
translation.reference: This is also an opportunity for enterprises to promote the training process of project managers and bring efficient operation results to enterprises with less cost and investment.

translation.zh: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
translation.en: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.
translation.source: 口说无凭，可以先看看其他学员怎么评价这门课程： 这门课程不仅是由中天华夏专家团队（原华为研发管理团队），结合国际先进的项目管理方法论和众多知名企业真实业务场景，对课程内容进行深入浅出的专业讲解。
translation.medium: Talk is cheap, let's take a look at what other students have to say about this course: This course is not only taught by the expert team of Zhongtian Huaxia (formerly from Huawei R&D management team), but also combines international advanced project management theories and numerous real business scenarios of well-known enterprises to provide in-depth and practical explanations of the course content.
translation.reference: That’s all my own introduction, and you may see how other students evaluate this course: This course is not only a professional explanation of the course content in simple terms by the ZTCHINA expert team (former Huawei R&D management team), combining international advanced project management methodology and real business scenarios of many well-known enterprises.

translation.zh: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
translation.en: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.
translation.source: 更是会提供科学实用的管理工具与方法，丰富的模板表单，帮助学员在课后将学习的内容转化运用于具体工作。
translation.medium: It will provide practical management tools and methods, rich templates and forms, to help students convert the knowledge learned in class into practical applications in their work after the class.
translation.reference: It also provides scientific and practical management tools and methods as well as rich template forms to help students transform and apply the content into specific work after class.

translation.zh: 一个虾饺订单只有一个？
translation.en: Is there only one shrimp dumpling in the order?
translation.source: 一个虾饺订单只有一个？
translation.medium: Is there only one shrimp dumpling order?
translation.reference: Is there only one shrimp dumpling in the order?

translation.zh: 为什么抄手有 6 个？
translation.en: Why are there six wontons？
translation.source: 为什么抄手有 6 个？
translation.medium: Why do hands have 6 fingers?
translation.reference: Why are there six wontons？

translation.zh: 捷信“双十二”前夕向消费者倡导理性消费 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
translation.en: Home Credit advocated rational consumption to consumers before the “Double Twelve” sale - Economic Observer - a professional financial news website
translation.source: 捷信“双十二”前夕向消费者倡导理性消费 - 经济观察网 － 专业财经新闻网站
translation.medium: JD.com "Double 12" eve urged consumers to practice rational consumption - Economic Observer Net - Professional financial and economic news website
translation.reference: Home Credit advocated rational consumption to consumers before the “Double Twelve” sale - Economic Observer - a professional financial news website

translation.zh: 今年“双十一”狂欢节全国网络支付业务交易金额达到1.77万亿元，相较往年再创新高。
translation.en: During the “Double Eleven” festival this year, the amount of national online payment business transaction reached 1.77 trillion yuan, creating a new high when compared with that of previous years.
translation.source: 今年“双十一”狂欢节全国网络支付业务交易金额达到1.77万亿元，相较往年再创新高。
translation.medium: The total transaction amount of China's online payment industry on "Double 11" this year reached 1.77 trillion yuan, setting a new high compared to previous years.
translation.reference: During the “Double Eleven” festival this year, the amount of national online payment business transaction reached 1.77 trillion yuan, creating a new high when compared with that of previous years.

translation.zh: 花样繁多的满减红包，抓人眼球的直播带货再一次让消费者大呼获益，这股消费热潮一方面让人感叹国民消费力愈发强劲，另一方面也不得不冷静下来思考消费主义对社会以及当代主流消费群体的影响。
translation.en: Various kinds of coupons and the eye-catching live-streaming sales once again make consumers feel they’ve gained benefits; this spending spree makes people feel amazed at the increasingly strong spending power of citizens; on the other hand, people need to calm down and think about the influences of consumerism on society and modern mainstream consumer groups.
translation.source: 花样繁多的满减红包，抓人眼球的直播带货再一次让消费者大呼获益，这股消费热潮一方面让人感叹国民消费力愈发强劲，另一方面也不得不冷静下来思考消费主义对社会以及当代主流消费群体的影响。
translation.medium: The festive red envelopes are as varied as brocade, and the live broadcast of snatching people's eyes with commodities once again allows consumers to shout for joy and gain benefits. This wave of consumer enthusiasm not only makes people marvel at the strength of national consumption, but also forces us to calm down and think about the impact of consumerism on society and the contemporary mainstream consumer group.
translation.reference: Various kinds of coupons and the eye-catching live-streaming sales once again make consumers feel they’ve gained benefits; this spending spree makes people feel amazed at the increasingly strong spending power of citizens; on the other hand, people need to calm down and think about the influences of consumerism on society and modern mainstream consumer groups.

translation.zh: 在“双十二”到来前夕，捷信消费金融有限公司（以下简称“捷信 ” ） 发出理性消费倡导，提醒广大用户尤其是年轻人树立良好的消费意识与消费习惯，拒绝盲目消费与过度消费。
translation.en: Before the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit B.V. (hereinafter referred to as “Home Credit”) advocated rational consumption, reminding its users, especially young users, to develop good consumption awareness and habits, and reject blind and excessive consumption.
translation.source: 在“双十二”到来前夕，捷信消费金融有限公司（以下简称“捷信 ” ） 发出理性消费倡导，提醒广大用户尤其是年轻人树立良好的消费意识与消费习惯，拒绝盲目消费与过度消费。
translation.medium: Before the "Double 12" shopping festival, Jieshen Consumer Finance Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Jieshen") issued a rational consumption promotion, reminding the majority of users, especially young people, to establish a good consumption awareness and consumption habits, and reject blind consumption and excessive consumption.
translation.reference: Before the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit B.V. (hereinafter referred to as “Home Credit”) advocated rational consumption, reminding its users, especially young users, to develop good consumption awareness and habits, and reject blind and excessive consumption.

translation.zh: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。
translation.en: According to the Report of Survey Analysis on Financial Literacy of Consumers published by People’s Bank of China this year, the financial literacy index of national consumers is 66.81, increased by 2.04 compared with that of 2019.
translation.source: 据人民银行今年发布的《消费者金融素养调查分析报告》结果显示，全国消费者金融素养指数为66.81，与2019年相比，提高2.04。
translation.medium: According to the "Consumer Financial Literacy Survey and Analysis Report" released by the People's Bank of China this year, the national consumer financial literacy index was 66.81, which was higher than that in 2019 by 2.04.
translation.reference: According to the Report of Survey Analysis on Financial Literacy of Consumers published by People’s Bank of China this year, the financial literacy index of national consumers is 66.81, increased by 2.04 compared with that of 2019.

translation.zh: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。
translation.en: Generally speaking, citizens in our country have good performance on financial consumption; however, there are big differences in various aspects of financial behaviors and skills, and further improvement of popularization of basic financial knowledge shall be made.
translation.source: 总体上，我国居民在金融消费层面上的表现较好，但在金融行为和技能的不同方面体现出较大的差异性，还需要进一步提升基础金融知识水平。
translation.medium: Overall, the financial consumption performance of Chinese residents is relatively good, but there are still significant differences in financial behavior and skills, and there is a need to further improve the basic financial knowledge level.
translation.reference: Generally speaking, citizens in our country have good performance on financial consumption; however, there are big differences in various aspects of financial behaviors and skills, and further improvement of popularization of basic financial knowledge shall be made.

translation.zh: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。
translation.en: Level of financial literacy of senior citizens and young people is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects of financial education; according to the Report on Debt Status of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation has huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important means of consumption upgrading; 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half of them have no debt buildup; although there is a relatively rational consumption trend among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label of “excessive squander” put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption and consumption by following the trend, leading to excessive financial pressure and debt risks, and even resulting in increasing social problems; financial enterprises shall shoulder their social responsibilities and guide young consumers in a positive way.
translation.source: 老年人和青少年的金融素养水平相对较低 ， “ 一老一少”仍将是金融教育持续关注的重点对象；尼尔森发布的《中国年轻人负债状况报告》及央视财经发布的《2019-2020中国青年消费报告》显示，年轻一代具有巨大的消费潜力，信用消费成为消费升级重要途径，86.6%的年轻人都在使用信贷产品，近半数人没有债务累积，年轻一代虽然整体呈现理性消费趋势，虽与外界贴上的“过度挥霍”标签大相径庭，但部分年轻人的确存在过度消费、跟风消费行为，并因此产生了过大的财务压力和债务风险，甚至导致社会问题逐渐增加，金融企业应勇于承担社会责任，进行正向引导。
translation.medium: The financial literacy level of the elderly and young people is relatively low, and "one old and one young" will continue to be a focus of financial education. According to the "China Youth Credit Condition Report" released by Nielsen and the "2019-2020 China Youth Consumption Report" released by CCTV Finance, young people have a huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important way for them to upgrade their consumption, with 86.6% of young people using credit products. Nearly half of them do not have debt accumulation, but some young people still have excessive consumption and imitative consumption behavior, resulting in excessive financial pressure and debt risk, even leading to social problems. Financial institutions should take up their social responsibilities and actively guide in a positive direction.
translation.reference: Level of financial literacy of senior citizens and young people is relatively low, and they will still be the key objects of financial education; according to the Report on Debt Status of Chinese Young People issued by Nelson and the Report of Consumption of Chinese Young People from 2019 to 2020 issued by CTV Finance, the younger generation has huge consumption potential, and credit consumption has become an important means of consumption upgrading; 86.6% of young people are using credit products, and nearly half of them have no debt buildup; although there is a relatively rational consumption trend among the younger generation, which is drastically different from the label of “excessive squander” put on them by society, some young people indeed are involved in excessive consumption and consumption by following the trend, leading to excessive financial pressure and debt risks, and even resulting in increasing social problems; financial enterprises shall shoulder their social responsibilities and guide young consumers in a positive way.

translation.zh: 作为持牌消费金融机构，捷信一直致力于以优质、贴心的服务助力百姓构建自己的幸福生活，倡导消费者树立良好正确的消费观，并积极响应监管号召，以实际行动提升消费者尤其是年轻群体的理性消费意识。
translation.en: As a licensed consumer finance institution, Home Credit has always been engaged in helping citizens construct their own happy lives with high-quality and thoughtful services, advocating consumers to establish correct consumption view, and actively responding to the call of the supervision units so as to improve the rational consumption awareness of consumers, especially young consumers, with practical actions.
translation.source: 作为持牌消费金融机构，捷信一直致力于以优质、贴心的服务助力百姓构建自己的幸福生活，倡导消费者树立良好正确的消费观，并积极响应监管号召，以实际行动提升消费者尤其是年轻群体的理性消费意识。
translation.medium: As a licensed financial institution, JD.com has always been committed to providing high-quality and attentive services to the public to help them build a happy life, advocating for consumers to establish correct and healthy consumption habits, and actively responding to the call of supervision to improve the rational consumption awareness of consumers, especially the younger generation, through practical actions.
translation.reference: As a licensed consumer finance institution, Home Credit has always been engaged in helping citizens construct their own happy lives with high-quality and thoughtful services, advocating consumers to establish correct consumption view, and actively responding to the call of the supervision units so as to improve the rational consumption awareness of consumers, especially young consumers, with practical actions.

translation.zh: 在过去多年间，捷信不断针对包含大学生在内的青年群体开展全方位、多样化的金融知识普及活动，并通过与国内顶级院校合作发动创新实践大赛等多种形式潜移默化对年轻群体的消费需求进行合理引导,帮助其树立理性消费观念,合理规划消费需求,进而为其累积人生财富助力。
translation.en: In the past years, Home Credit has been holding comprehensive and diversified financial knowledge popularization activities aiming at young people, including university students; in addition, it has unconsciously offered reasonable guidance on the consumption demands of young groups by means such as cooperating with top universities in the country to host innovative practice competitions, so as to help students establish rational consumption concept and plan for consumption demands reasonably, and to assist them in accumulating life fortunes.
translation.source: 在过去多年间，捷信不断针对包含大学生在内的青年群体开展全方位、多样化的金融知识普及活动，并通过与国内顶级院校合作发动创新实践大赛等多种形式潜移默化对年轻群体的消费需求进行合理引导,帮助其树立理性消费观念,合理规划消费需求,进而为其累积人生财富助力。
translation.medium: Over the past few years, JD.com has continuously carried out comprehensive and diverse financial knowledge dissemination activities targeting young people, including college students, through various forms such as organizing innovative practice competitions in collaboration with top domestic universities, in order to quietly guide the consumption needs of young people and help them establish a rational consumption concept, plan their consumption needs reasonably, and ultimately assist them in accumulating wealth throughout their lives.
translation.reference: In the past years, Home Credit has been holding comprehensive and diversified financial knowledge popularization activities aiming at young people, including university students; in addition, it has unconsciously offered reasonable guidance on the consumption demands of young groups by means such as cooperating with top universities in the country to host innovative practice competitions, so as to help students establish rational consumption concept and plan for consumption demands reasonably, and to assist them in accumulating life fortunes.

translation.zh: 双十二到来之际，捷信提醒所有消费者朋友树立合理的消费意识和正确的金钱观，抵制盲目消费和过度消费，规避消费借贷误区，以免影响个人征信以及今后的经济生活。
translation.en: Upon the arriving of the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit reminds all consumers to establish rational consumption awareness and correct concept of money, resist blind and excessive consumption, and avoid forming misunderstanding of loan for consumption, in case it will impact personal credit investigation and economic life in the future.
translation.source: 双十二到来之际，捷信提醒所有消费者朋友树立合理的消费意识和正确的金钱观，抵制盲目消费和过度消费，规避消费借贷误区，以免影响个人征信以及今后的经济生活。
translation.medium: On the eve of Double 12, JD.com reminds all consumers to establish a reasonable consumption awareness and a correct money view, resist blind consumption and excessive consumption, avoid falling into the trap of consumption borrowing, so as not to affect personal credit and future economic life.
translation.reference: Upon the arriving of the “Double Twelve” sale, Home Credit reminds all consumers to establish rational consumption awareness and correct concept of money, resist blind and excessive consumption, and avoid forming misunderstanding of loan for consumption, in case it will impact personal credit investigation and economic life in the future.

translation.zh: 消费时一定要提前规划，量力而为按时还款。
translation.en: Be sure to plan in advance when making consumption, live beneath your means, and make repayment as schedule.
translation.source: 消费时一定要提前规划，量力而为按时还款。
translation.medium: When it comes to consumption, it is definitely necessary to plan in advance and pay on time.
translation.reference: Be sure to plan in advance when making consumption, live beneath your means, and make repayment as schedule.

translation.zh: 如果逾期，逾期记录将记录到个人信用报告中，可能会对日后买车、购房等经济生活造成不良影响。
translation.en: If it’s overdue, related overdue behavior will be recorded in personal credit report, which may lead to adverse influences on economic life such as buying a car or a house in the future.
translation.source: 如果逾期，逾期记录将记录到个人信用报告中，可能会对日后买车、购房等经济生活造成不良影响。
translation.medium: If overdue, overdue records will be recorded in the personal credit report, which may have a negative impact on future economic activities such as buying a car or buying a house.
translation.reference: If it’s overdue, related overdue behavior will be recorded in personal credit report, which may lead to adverse influences on economic life such as buying a car or a house in the future.

translation.zh: 与此同时，在享受金融产品和服务时，还应选择正规机构及渠道，并注意查验相关机构是否具备经营资质。
translation.en: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, be sure to choose authorized institutions and channels and check if related institutions have the qualification for operation.
translation.source: 与此同时，在享受金融产品和服务时，还应选择正规机构及渠道，并注意查验相关机构是否具备经营资质。
translation.medium: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, you should also choose regular institutions and channels, and pay attention to checking whether the relevant institution has the operating qualification.
translation.reference: At the same time, when enjoying financial products and services, be sure to choose authorized institutions and channels and check if related institutions have the qualification for operation.

translation.zh: 未来，捷信将一如既往凭借其成熟、可靠的消费金融体系和不断更新迭代的金融产品，为消费者带来更贴合需求和多元化的服务，不断助力大众提升金融知识水平，帮助消费者培养理性消费、适度借贷的理念，做消费者终生可信赖的消费金融伙伴。
translation.en: In the future, Home Credit will continue to provide consumers with diversified services fitting their demands with mature and reliable consumption finance systems and constantly upgraded financial products, so as to improve the public’s financial knowledge level and help consumers develop the concepts of rational consumption and taking out loans in moderation, and be a consumption finance partner which consumers can trust for a lifetime.
translation.source: 未来，捷信将一如既往凭借其成熟、可靠的消费金融体系和不断更新迭代的金融产品，为消费者带来更贴合需求和多元化的服务，不断助力大众提升金融知识水平，帮助消费者培养理性消费、适度借贷的理念，做消费者终生可信赖的消费金融伙伴。
translation.medium: In the future, JD.com will continue to rely on its mature and reliable consumption finance system and constantly updated financial products to provide consumers with more personalized and diversified services that meet their needs. JD.com will also continue to help improve the financial knowledge of the masses and assist consumers in developing the concept of rational consumption and moderate borrowing, becoming a reliable consumption finance partner for consumers throughout their lives.
translation.reference: In the future, Home Credit will continue to provide consumers with diversified services fitting their demands with mature and reliable consumption finance systems and constantly upgraded financial products, so as to improve the public’s financial knowledge level and help consumers develop the concepts of rational consumption and taking out loans in moderation, and be a consumption finance partner which consumers can trust for a lifetime.

translation.zh: 我不会去
translation.en: I won’t go.
translation.source: 我不会去
translation.medium: I won't go.
translation.reference: I won’t go.

translation.zh: 我是按送单
translation.en: I placed a delivery order.
translation.source: 我是按送单
translation.medium: I am an order taker.
translation.reference: I placed a delivery order.

translation.zh: 这 1 个小时从没有人联系我，这根本是网上诈骗
translation.en: No one contacted me during this one hour, and this is online fraud.
translation.source: 这 1 个小时从没有人联系我，这根本是网上诈骗
translation.medium: No one has contacted me for the past 1 hour, this is definitely online fraud.
translation.reference: No one contacted me during this one hour, and this is online fraud.

translation.zh: 你以为我第一次叫外卖？
translation.en: You think this is the first time that I have ordered food?
translation.source: 你以为我第一次叫外卖？
translation.medium: Do you think this is my first time ordering takeout?
translation.reference: You think this is the first time that I have ordered food?

translation.zh: 调查完，你就也是这么说的！我下单前，都 check 了地址好几次，才下的单
translation.en: You said that after the investigation! I checked the address multiple times before placing the order.
translation.source: 调查完，你就也是这么说的！我下单前，都 check 了地址好几次，才下的单
translation.medium: After the investigation, you are also saying this! Before I placed the order, I checked the address several times to make sure it was correct.
translation.reference: You said that after the investigation! I checked the address multiple times before placing the order.

translation.zh: 好的，谢谢！那是多少天？
translation.en: Okay, thank you! How many days?
translation.source: 好的，谢谢！那是多少天？
translation.medium: Okay, thank you! How many days is that?
translation.reference: Okay, thank you! How many days?

translation.zh: 越南人民报网 - 海湾合作委员会应对共同挑战
translation.en: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website - Gulf Cooperation Council tackle common challenges
translation.source: 越南人民报网 - 海湾合作委员会应对共同挑战
translation.medium: Vietnam News - The Gulf Cooperation Council should address common challenges
translation.reference: Vietnamese People’s Daily Website - Gulf Cooperation Council tackle common challenges

translation.zh: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
translation.en: The locations where Mohammed Bin Salman, the Saudi Arabia’s prince stayed include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait.
translation.source: 沙特王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼的停留站包括阿曼、阿拉伯联合酋长国（阿联酋 ） 、 卡塔尔、巴林和科威特。
translation.medium: The stopover station of Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman of Saudi Arabia includes Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain, and Kuwait.
translation.reference: The locations where Mohammed Bin Salman, the Saudi Arabia’s prince stayed include Oman, the United Arab Emirates (UAE), Qatar, Bahrain and Kuwait.

translation.zh: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
translation.en: It’s worth noting that it was the first time for Mohammed to visit Qatar since Saudi Arabia and the Arabian alliances imposed an embargo on Qatar in the middle of the year 2017 and led to the Gulf Diplomatic Crisis.
translation.source: 值得注意的是，这是自沙特阿拉伯及其阿拉伯盟友于 2017 年年中对卡塔尔实施禁运，导致海湾外交危机以来，穆罕默德王储首次访问卡塔尔。
translation.medium: It is worth noting that this is the first time since the Saudi-led Arab coalition imposed a ban on Qatar in 2017 that the crown prince of Saudi Arabia has visited Qatar.
translation.reference: It’s worth noting that it was the first time for Mohammed to visit Qatar since Saudi Arabia and the Arabian alliances imposed an embargo on Qatar in the middle of the year 2017 and led to the Gulf Diplomatic Crisis.

translation.zh: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
translation.en: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain and Egypt severed the diplomatic relations with Qatar and implemented a full embargo; they blamed Qatar for supporting terrorist organizations and keeping close relations with Iran.
translation.source: 在这场危机中，沙特阿拉伯、阿联酋、巴林和埃及断绝了与卡塔尔的外交关系，并对其实施全面禁运，指责卡塔尔支持恐怖组织，同时与伊朗有着密切关系。
translation.medium: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, and Egypt have severed diplomatic relations with Qatar and imposed a comprehensive embargo on it, accusing Qatar of supporting terrorist organizations and having close ties with Iran.
translation.reference: In this crisis, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Bahrain and Egypt severed the diplomatic relations with Qatar and implemented a full embargo; they blamed Qatar for supporting terrorist organizations and keeping close relations with Iran.

translation.zh: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
translation.en: Diplomatic tensions had a serious impact on the internal unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council, exerting a negative influence on economy of the countries and regions in that region.
translation.source: 外交紧张严重影响了海合会的内部团结，对该地区国家的经济产生了负面影响。
translation.medium: The tense international situation has severely affected the internal unity of the summit, and has had a negative impact on the economy of the countries in the region.
translation.reference: Diplomatic tensions had a serious impact on the internal unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council, exerting a negative influence on economy of the countries and regions in that region.

translation.zh: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
translation.en: The four Arabian countries blocked the land, sea and air routes to Qatar.
translation.source: 四个阿拉伯国家封锁了通往卡塔尔的陆海空路线。
translation.medium: Four Arab countries have blocked the land, sea and air routes leading to Qatar.
translation.reference: The four Arabian countries blocked the land, sea and air routes to Qatar.

translation.zh: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
translation.en: The crisis was only solved at the Gulf Cooperation Council Summit in January, 2021, when the gulf countries signed an agreement for “unity and stabilization” with the mediation by the U.S. and Kuwait.
translation.source: 这场危机仅在 2021 年 1 月的海湾合作委员会峰会上得到解决，各海湾国家签署了一项由美国和科威特调解迈向“团结与稳定”的协议。
translation.medium: This crisis was resolved only at the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) summit held in January 2021, where the countries of the Gulf signed an agreement mediated by the United States and Qatar towards "unity and stability."
translation.reference: The crisis was only solved at the Gulf Cooperation Council Summit in January, 2021, when the gulf countries signed an agreement for “unity and stabilization” with the mediation by the U.S. and Kuwait.

translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
translation.en: Saudi Arabia has reopened its boundary with Qatar.
translation.source: 沙特阿拉伯重新开放了与卡塔尔的边界。
translation.medium: Saudi Arabia has reopened its border with Qatar.
translation.reference: Saudi Arabia has reopened its boundary with Qatar.

translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
translation.en: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are taking the lead in recovering the relations with Qatar by appointing new ambassadors in Qatar.
translation.source: 沙特阿拉伯和埃及正在通过两国在卡塔尔任命了新大使率先努力恢复与卡塔尔的关系。
translation.medium: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are working to restore relations with Qatar through the appointment of new ambassadors.
translation.reference: Saudi Arabia and Egypt are taking the lead in recovering the relations with Qatar by appointing new ambassadors in Qatar.

translation.zh: 海湾阿拉伯国家化解分歧，以恢复与卡塔尔的关系出自于为各国的利益和地区稳定而必须团结起来的要求，旨在应对共同挑战。
translation.en: Arab countries in the gulf aimed to resolve divergence; and restoring relations with Qatar originates from the need to unite for the interests of all countries and regional stability, so as to cope with common challenges.
translation.source: 海湾阿拉伯国家化解分歧，以恢复与卡塔尔的关系出自于为各国的利益和地区稳定而必须团结起来的要求，旨在应对共同挑战。
translation.medium: The resolution of the Gulf crisis and the restoration of relations between Bahrain and Qatar are necessary to meet the common challenges faced by the countries of the region. This requires the unity of the countries for the benefit of their interests and the stability of the region.
translation.reference: Arab countries in the gulf aimed to resolve divergence; and restoring relations with Qatar originates from the need to unite for the interests of all countries and regional stability, so as to cope with common challenges.

translation.zh: 此次沙特王储访问阿曼期间，双方同意开通了两个海湾邻国间第一条直接陆路通道。
translation.en: During the period when the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia visited Oman, both parties agreed to open the first direct land road passage between the two neighboring countries in the gulf.
translation.source: 此次沙特王储访问阿曼期间，双方同意开通了两个海湾邻国间第一条直接陆路通道。
translation.medium: During the visit of Saudi Crown Prince to Oman, both sides agreed to open the first direct land route between the two Gulf countries.
translation.reference: During the period when the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia visited Oman, both parties agreed to open the first direct land road passage between the two neighboring countries in the gulf.

translation.zh: 连接两国长达725公里长的通道将为两国公民的出行和整合供应链提供便利条件。
translation.en: A passage of 725km connecting the two countries will provide convenience for the travel of citizens and integration of the supply chain of the two countries.
translation.source: 连接两国长达725公里长的通道将为两国公民的出行和整合供应链提供便利条件。
translation.medium: The 725-kilometer long corridor connecting the two countries will provide convenient conditions for the travel and supply chain integration of their citizens.
translation.reference: A passage of 725km connecting the two countries will provide convenience for the travel of citizens and integration of the supply chain of the two countries.

translation.zh: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 (PIF)将在阿曼投入50亿美元，两国企业签署了价值为300亿美元的13份合作谅解备忘录。
translation.en: The Public Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia (PIF) will invest 5 billion USD in Oman, and enterprises of the two countries have signed 13 memorandums of understanding of cooperation worth 30 billion USD.
translation.source: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 (PIF)将在阿曼投入50亿美元，两国企业签署了价值为300亿美元的13份合作谅解备忘录。
translation.medium: The Saudi Public Investment Fund (PIF) will invest 50 billion dollars in Oman, and 13 Memorandums of Understanding (MoUs) worth 300 billion dollars were signed between the two countries' companies.
translation.reference: The Public Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia (PIF) will invest 5 billion USD in Oman, and enterprises of the two countries have signed 13 memorandums of understanding of cooperation worth 30 billion USD.

translation.zh: 沙特王储对海湾国家访问之行恰逢伊朗与世界各大国就挽救名为《联合全面行动计划 》 （ JCPOA）的伊朗核协议 — — 一项海湾阿拉伯国家因认为无法解决与伊朗导弹问题而谴责的协议进行谈判。
translation.en: The travel of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia to gulf countries happened as the negotiation was ongoing between Iran and major countries about saving a nuclear deal named Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), an agreement condemned by the Arab Gulf countries as it’s believed it cannot solve the missile issue with Iran.
translation.source: 沙特王储对海湾国家访问之行恰逢伊朗与世界各大国就挽救名为《联合全面行动计划 》 （ JCPOA）的伊朗核协议 — — 一项海湾阿拉伯国家因认为无法解决与伊朗导弹问题而谴责的协议进行谈判。
translation.medium: Saudi Arabia's Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman's visit to the Gulf countries coincided with the negotiations between Iran and the world's major powers on the rescue plan called the "Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action" (JCPOA), which is an agreement that the Gulf countries have criticized because they believe it cannot solve the problem of Iran's missiles.
translation.reference: The travel of the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia to gulf countries happened as the negotiation was ongoing between Iran and major countries about saving a nuclear deal named Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA), an agreement condemned by the Arab Gulf countries as it’s believed it cannot solve the missile issue with Iran.

translation.zh: 各海湾国家一直将伊朗视为长期的“竞争对手 ” ， 并将伊朗的核计划视为对地区安全的“威胁 ” 。
translation.en: All gulf countries have always regarded Iran as the long-term “competitor” and regarded the nuclear program of Iran as a “threat” to regional security.
translation.source: 各海湾国家一直将伊朗视为长期的“竞争对手 ” ， 并将伊朗的核计划视为对地区安全的“威胁 ” 。
translation.medium: Each Gulf country has viewed Iran as a long-term "competitor" and seen Iran's nuclear program as a "threat" to regional security.
translation.reference: All gulf countries have always regarded Iran as the long-term “competitor” and regarded the nuclear program of Iran as a “threat” to regional security.

translation.zh: 各海湾国家认为，不解决伊朗导弹问题，不采取行动来遏制伊朗在该地区的活动是有缺陷的。
translation.en: According to the gulf countries, it is defective not to solve the problem of the guided missiles of Iran or not to take actions to curb the activities of Iran in this region.
translation.source: 各海湾国家认为，不解决伊朗导弹问题，不采取行动来遏制伊朗在该地区的活动是有缺陷的。
translation.medium: Each Gulf country believes that failing to solve the missile problem with Iran and not taking action to curb Iran's activities in the region is flawed.
translation.reference: According to the gulf countries, it is defective not to solve the problem of the guided missiles of Iran or not to take actions to curb the activities of Iran in this region.

translation.zh: 在各大国与伊朗核谈判未能满足各海湾国家愿望的背景下，沙特阿拉伯与伊朗进行了直接谈判。
translation.en: Under the backdrop where the nuclear negotiation between major countries and Iran was not able to meet the demand of the gulf countries, Saudi Arabia and Iran conducted a direct negotiation.
translation.source: 在各大国与伊朗核谈判未能满足各海湾国家愿望的背景下，沙特阿拉伯与伊朗进行了直接谈判。
translation.medium: In the absence of successful nuclear talks between major countries and Iran, Saudi Arabia and Iran directly negotiated.
translation.reference: Under the backdrop where the nuclear negotiation between major countries and Iran was not able to meet the demand of the gulf countries, Saudi Arabia and Iran conducted a direct negotiation.

translation.zh: 其目标是遏制该地区紧张局势的升级。
translation.en: The objective was to restrain the upgrading of the tense situations in this region.
translation.source: 其目标是遏制该地区紧张局势的升级。
translation.medium: Its objective is to suppress the tense situation in the region.
translation.reference: The objective was to restrain the upgrading of the tense situations in this region.

translation.zh: 这是减缓海湾合作委员会国家经济增长的因素之一。
translation.en: This is one of the factors that slow down the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.
translation.source: 这是减缓海湾合作委员会国家经济增长的因素之一。
translation.medium: This is one of the factors that contribute to the slowdown of the Gulf Cooperation Council's national economic growth.
translation.reference: This is one of the factors that slow down the economic growth of the Gulf Cooperation Council countries.

translation.zh: 即将举行的海合会峰会将是自从一些成员国与卡塔尔的争议结束以来海合会国家的首次峰会。
translation.en: The summit of the Gulf Cooperation Council to be held soon will be the first summit for countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council since the end of the dispute between some member countries and Qatar.
translation.source: 即将举行的海合会峰会将是自从一些成员国与卡塔尔的争议结束以来海合会国家的首次峰会。
translation.medium: The upcoming high-level meeting of the Cooperation Council for the Arab States of the Gulf (GCC) will be the first such meeting since some member countries ended their dispute with Qatar.
translation.reference: The summit of the Gulf Cooperation Council to be held soon will be the first summit for countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council since the end of the dispute between some member countries and Qatar.

translation.zh: 这是海湾合作委员会重新评估为促进恢复海合会统一作出贡献的外交成果的机会，同时提出各项措施，使其成员国充分合作，以应对共同挑战，为海湾国家的稳定与发展作出贡献。
translation.en: This is the opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to reassess the diplomatic achievements that have contributed to the restoration of the unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council; at the same time, various measures are being proposed to make the member countries cooperate sufficiently, so as to cope with common challenges and make contributions to stabilization and development of the gulf countries.
translation.source: 这是海湾合作委员会重新评估为促进恢复海合会统一作出贡献的外交成果的机会，同时提出各项措施，使其成员国充分合作，以应对共同挑战，为海湾国家的稳定与发展作出贡献。
translation.medium: This is an opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to re-evaluate the diplomatic achievements that promote the restoration of unity among its member states, while proposing various measures to enable its member states to fully cooperate in addressing common challenges and contributing to the stability and development of Gulf countries.
translation.reference: This is the opportunity for the Gulf Cooperation Council to reassess the diplomatic achievements that have contributed to the restoration of the unity of the Gulf Cooperation Council; at the same time, various measures are being proposed to make the member countries cooperate sufficiently, so as to cope with common challenges and make contributions to stabilization and development of the gulf countries.

translation.zh: 从 7 点到现在 9:30 都还没有送到，必须要退还订金及取消订单
translation.en: It hasn’t arrived since 7 o’clock and now it’s 9:30, and you must refund the deposit and cancel the order.
translation.source: 从 7 点到现在 9:30 都还没有送到，必须要退还订金及取消订单
translation.medium: The order has not been sent from 7:00 AM to now, 9:30 AM. I need to refund the deposit and cancel the order.
translation.reference: It hasn’t arrived since 7 o’clock and now it’s 9:30, and you must refund the deposit and cancel the order.

translation.zh: 好的
translation.en: OK.
translation.source: 好的
translation.medium: Good
translation.reference: OK.

translation.zh: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
translation.en: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!
translation.source: 号称新山区超跑排气声最大！
translation.medium: Claims to be the loudest exhaust sound in the new mountain area!
translation.reference: It is said to have the biggest exhaust noises of all supercars in Xinshan District!

translation.zh: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
translation.en: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!
translation.source: 这次我们团队为大家带来的这款车，是许多男人的梦想！
translation.medium: This car that our team has brought to everyone is the dream of many men!
translation.reference: The car that our team brings you now is the dream of many men!

translation.zh: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
translation.en: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!
translation.source: 它就是Lamborghini的旗舰超跑，Murcielago的换代车型 — Aventador LP700-4！
translation.medium: It is the flagship super sports car of Lamborghini, the replacement model of Murcielago - Aventador LP700-4!
translation.reference: It is Lamborghini’s flagship supercar and Murcielago’s next generation model, Aventador LP700-4!

translation.zh: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
translation.en: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?
translation.source: 要价马币近两百万，一年的路税马币十几千，四轮驱动，为什么叫LP700？
translation.medium: The price of this car is close to two million yuan, and the road tax for a year is tens of thousands of yuan. It has four wheels and is driven, so why is it called the LP700?
translation.reference: It is priced nearly 2 million MYR and pays a road tax of around a dozen thousand each year; it is a four-wheel drive; why is it called LP700?

translation.zh: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
translation.en: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?
translation.source: 因为拥有700匹的马力，你能想象有多快吗？
translation.medium: Because it has 700 horsepower, can you imagine how fast it is?
translation.reference: Because it has 700 horsepower; can you image how fast that is?

translation.zh: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
translation.en: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.
translation.source: 那算了小编也不知道，数据说0-100km/h加速只需要2.9秒，大概就是小编的myvi才要到30km/h的时候人家就到100km/h了，嗯。
translation.medium: So that means even the editor doesn't know, data shows that it only takes 2.9 seconds to accelerate from 0-100km/h. I guess that's why my friend's Myvi takes about 30 seconds to reach 30km/h, while their car has already reached 100km/h. Hmm.
translation.reference: Forget it, I don’t know, either; data says it takes only 2.9s to accelerate from 0 to 100km/h; when my myvi just reaches 30km/h, it is already at 100km/h, hum.

translation.zh: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
translation.en: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.
translation.source: 低矮的车身、嚣张的剪刀门、遍布车身四周的巨大进气口以及玻璃下一览无余的6.5 v12引擎，完美的诠释了兰博基尼的风格。
translation.medium: The low car body, flamboyant scissor doors, giant air intakes all around the car, and the 6.5 V12 engine under the glass that can be seen at a glance, perfectly interpreted the style of Lamborghini.
translation.reference: The low car body, extravagant scissor doors, huge air intakes all around the body and the 6.5 V12 engine transparent under the glass perfectly interpret the style of Lamborghini.

translation.zh: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
translation.en: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!
translation.source: 对于车款的说明不需要说太多，自己Google一下就好了，小编整理了一些Google不一定给的到的解说！
translation.medium: For car models, explanations don't need to be said too much. Just Google it yourself, and I have summarized some explanations that Google may not have given you.
translation.reference: The model doesn’t need much introduction; you can Google it yourself; I have prepared something Google won’t necessarily be able to provide!

translation.zh: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)
translation.en: It is too eye-catching; people look at it everywhere you go; it is uncomfortable! (It is actually sweet.)
translation.source: 太过备受瞩目，去到哪里大家都在看，很不自在！(其实有点爽)
translation.medium: Too much attention is drawn to it, everyone is looking at it, it's very uncomfortable! (Actually, it's quite refreshing)
translation.reference: It is too eye-catching; people look at it everywhere you go; it is uncomfortable! (It is actually sweet.)

translation.zh: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)
translation.en: Gas is around RM1 for 1km (the owner wouldn’t even care)
translation.source: 1km油钱在RM1左右 (车主根本不care)
translation.medium: 1km fuel cost around RM1 (car owner doesn't care at all)
translation.reference: Gas is around RM1 for 1km (the owner wouldn’t even care)

translation.zh: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
translation.en: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).
translation.source: 上下车的姿势要练习一下，不然会有点尴尬 (因为会爬不出车舱然后卡住一半)
translation.medium: Practice your posture when getting in and out of the car, otherwise it will be a bit awkward (because you will not be able to get out of the car comfortably)
translation.reference: You need to practice the posture of when you get in and out of the car or it may be a little awkward (because you might get stuck halfway and crawl out).

translation.zh: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
translation.en: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)
translation.source: 引擎声太大，下车后会顿时耳聋。(不过还是很爽)
translation.medium: The engine noise is too loud, and after getting off the car, I will suddenly have tinnitus (but it's still very refreshing).
translation.reference: The engine is so loud that you will turn deaf when you get out of the car. (But still, it’s sweet.)

translation.zh: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
translation.en: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!
translation.source: 车身太大，停在普通停车位会很窄，很怕被隔壁车开门的时候敲到！
translation.medium: The car body is too big, stopping at a regular parking space is very narrow, and I'm afraid I'll hit the door of the adjacent car when I open mine!
translation.reference: The car body is too big; it will be narrow for it to park at a normal parking space; you will worry that the neighboring car might hit it while opening the door!

translation.zh: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)
translation.en: You may get lonely because there is no rivalry on the road (I made it up; it has nothing to do with the car owners, haha.)
translation.source: 有点寂寞，因为路上没有对手 (小编自己讲的，跟车主无关，哈哈)
translation.medium: A bit lonely because there is no opponent on the road (laughs at himself, unrelated to the car owner, haha)
translation.reference: You may get lonely because there is no rivalry on the road (I made it up; it has nothing to do with the car owners, haha.)

translation.zh: 大家不要误会，这视频的超跑并没有要出售，抱歉！
translation.en: Don’t get me wrong; the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!
translation.source: 大家不要误会，这视频的超跑并没有要出售，抱歉！
translation.medium: Please don't misunderstand, the super-running in this video is not for sale, I apologize!
translation.reference: Don’t get me wrong; the supercar in this video is not for sale, sorry!

translation.zh: 想要为你的爱车拍摄视频的朋友，欢迎联系我们！
translation.en: Please contact us if you want to take a video for your car!
translation.source: 想要为你的爱车拍摄视频的朋友，欢迎联系我们！
translation.medium: If you want to shoot a video for your car, welcome to contact us!
translation.reference: Please contact us if you want to take a video for your car!

translation.zh: 更多你不知道的汽车资讯，就在 The Car Guide / 人民汽车志
translation.en: Know more about cars, come to The Car Guide.
translation.source: 更多你不知道的汽车资讯，就在 The Car Guide / 人民汽车志
translation.medium: Get more car information that you don't know, just in The Car Guide / People's Car Chronicle.
translation.reference: Know more about cars, come to The Car Guide.

translation.zh: 牽扯到价值千万的车祸！
translation.en: A car crash involving tens of millions!
translation.source: 牽扯到价值千万的车祸！
translation.medium: Involving an accident with a value of millions of dollars!
translation.reference: A car crash involving tens of millions!

translation.zh: Bugatti Chiron 与 Porsche 911 相信车友们都认识，Chiron 是全球最贵超跑之一，而 Porsche 911 的车价也是百万等级！
translation.en: I believe car fans all know Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911; Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the price of Porsche 911 is also over a million!
translation.source: Bugatti Chiron 与 Porsche 911 相信车友们都认识，Chiron 是全球最贵超跑之一，而 Porsche 911 的车价也是百万等级！
translation.medium: Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911 are both well-known to car enthusiasts. The Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the Porsche 911's car price is also in the million-dollar range!
translation.reference: I believe car fans all know Bugatti Chiron and Porsche 911; Chiron is one of the most expensive supercars in the world, and the price of Porsche 911 is also over a million!

translation.zh: 那日前，国外就在短短几分钟内撞掉了百万跑车 911 还有千万超跑 Chiron！
translation.en: Recently, a car crashed into a million-level sports car 911 and a tens-of-millions level super car Chiron in just a few minutes in a foreign country!
translation.source: 那日前，国外就在短短几分钟内撞掉了百万跑车 911 还有千万超跑 Chiron！
translation.medium: Just a few minutes ago, cars worth hundreds of millions of dollars were knocked down in foreign countries! The 911 and Chiron are still standing!
translation.reference: Recently, a car crashed into a million-level sports car 911 and a tens-of-millions level super car Chiron in just a few minutes in a foreign country!

translation.zh: 看结果，贵是有道理的！
translation.en: It seems from the result that there’s a reason why it is so expensive!
translation.source: 看结果，贵是有道理的！
translation.medium: See the result, it is reasonable!
translation.reference: It seems from the result that there’s a reason why it is so expensive!

translation.zh: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
translation.en: Let university spirit resonate with spirit of the times - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 让大学精神与时代精神同频共振-新华网
translation.medium: Let the university spirit resonate with the spirit of the times - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Let university spirit resonate with spirit of the times - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
translation.en: University spirit refers to a series of educational philosophy and pursuit of values an university accumulates in its long-term development; it is the soul of the university.
translation.source: 所谓大学精神，是指一所大学在发展过程中长期积淀形成的一系列办学理念和价值追求，是大学的灵魂所在。
translation.medium: The term "university spirit" refers to a set of long-term accumulated concepts and values pursued by a university during its development process, which is the soul of the university.
translation.reference: University spirit refers to a series of educational philosophy and pursuit of values an university accumulates in its long-term development; it is the soul of the university.

translation.zh: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
translation.en: Since ancient times, university spirit is indispensable in the development of politics, economy, culture, technology and society, as well as in the progress of a nation.
translation.source: 从古至今，大学精神对于政治、经济、文化、科技、社会的发展，乃至一个民族的进步均至关重要。
translation.medium: From ancient times to the present, the spirit of the university has been of great importance to the development of politics, economics, culture, technology, and society, and has played a crucial role in the progress of a nation.
translation.reference: Since ancient times, university spirit is indispensable in the development of politics, economy, culture, technology and society, as well as in the progress of a nation.

translation.zh: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
translation.en: Since the establishment of the first real university in the world, universities shoulder unique missions which are different from other social organizations; universities in our country emerged in times of national crisis; its spirit is heavily influenced by traditional culture and the change of times; it advocates the values of “benefiting the world with virtue, and governing the country with integrity” and the patriotic responsibility of “building a strong country by studying”.
translation.source: 从世界第一所现代意义上的大学诞生起，大学就肩负起不同于其他社会组织的独特使命，对于我国大学来说，兴起于民族危难之秋，其精神更是深受传统文化和时代变迁的影响，倡导“明德济世，修齐治平”的价值理念和“兴学强国”的爱国主义担当。
translation.medium: From the birth of the first modern university in the world, universities have borne a unique mission different from other social organizations. For China's universities, it emerged in the autumn of national crisis, and its spirit was deeply influenced by traditional culture and historical changes. It advocates the value concept of "cultivating virtue and benefiting the world" and the patriotic responsibility of "strengthening the country through education."
translation.reference: Since the establishment of the first real university in the world, universities shoulder unique missions which are different from other social organizations; universities in our country emerged in times of national crisis; its spirit is heavily influenced by traditional culture and the change of times; it advocates the values of “benefiting the world with virtue, and governing the country with integrity” and the patriotic responsibility of “building a strong country by studying”.

translation.zh: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
translation.en: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.
translation.source: 当前，高等教育信息化、国际化趋势日益明显，全球范围的教育竞争、科技竞争、人才竞争不断加剧，高等教育事业作为重要的“供给侧 ” ， 其结构性改革正面临前所未有的机遇和挑战。
translation.medium: Currently, the trend of informationization and internationalization in higher education is becoming increasingly evident, and the competition in education, technology, and talent is intensifying globally. As an important "supply-side" of higher education, its structural reform faces unprecedented opportunities and challenges.
translation.reference: At present, with the increasingly prominent trend of informatization and globalization of higher education, competition of education, science and technology, and talent across the world are continuously fiercer; higher education is an important “supply end”, and the structural reform of higher education is facing unprecedented opportunities and challenges.

translation.zh: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
translation.en: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.
translation.source: 尤其是《统筹推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设总体方案》的提出，在展示了我国从高等教育大国向高等教育强国迈进的信心和决心的同时，更是对大学发展提出了更高更新的要求。
translation.medium: Particularly in the proposal for "Coordinated Development of World-Class Universities and World-Class Disciplines", China has demonstrated its confidence and determination in advancing from a country with a strong higher education system to a country with a strong higher education sector, while also setting higher and more stringent requirements for university development.
translation.reference: Especially, the issuing of the General Plan for Coordinating and Promoting the Construction of the Global Top Universities and the Top Disciplines showcases the confidence and determination of our country in the transformation from a giant of higher education to a strong country of higher education; at the same time, it also puts forward higher and newer demands on development of universities.

translation.zh: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
translation.en: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?
translation.source: 如何在较短时间内努力跻身世界一流行列，在仍有一定差距的基础上加快建成若干所世界一流大学和一批世界一流学科，实现“弯道超车 ” ？
translation.medium: How can one strive to be ranked among the world's top universities in a relatively short period of time, while still maintaining a certain gap with them and accelerating the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines, achieving "overtaking" ?
translation.reference: How to ascend to the top in the world within a short time, and accelerate the construction of several world-class universities and a batch of world-class disciplines while there is still a gap, and “overtake on a bend”?

translation.zh: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
translation.en: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.
translation.source: 除了坚定目标自信、路径自信、能力自信，高校还应当充分发挥三种优势：一是后发优势，通过持续引进海外杰出学术人才，学习借鉴世界一流大学的先进经验，实现学术水平和办学质量的显著提升；二是文化优势，继承中华文明在五千年积淀的智慧内涵，弘扬发展优秀传统文化，以此来凝聚力量、塑造品牌、提升形象；三是制度优势，发挥社会主义国家的制度优越性，强化目标驱动，汇集共识合力，优化资源配置，为学校加速赶超世界先进水平提供可持续的坚实保障。
translation.medium: In addition to the confidence in goals, path, and ability, universities should also fully play three advantages: one is the advantage of being a latecomer, which can be achieved by continuously introducing outstanding academic talents from abroad and learning from the advanced experiences of world-class universities to significantly improve academic level and management quality; the second is the cultural advantage, which inherits the wisdom accumulated by Chinese civilization over the past 5,000 years and promotes the development of excellent traditional culture, thereby attracting power, shaping brand, and improving image; the third is the institutional advantage, which takes advantage of the institutional superiority of socialist countries and strengthens the driving force of goals, gathers consensus and resources, optimizes resource allocation, and provides sustainable support for universities to catch up with the advanced level of the world.
translation.reference: In addition to insisting on objective confidence, path confidence and ability confidence, universities and colleges shall also give full play to three advantages: the first one is the advantage of backwardness; through the continuous introduction of overseas outstanding academic talents and learning from the advanced experience of world-class universities, significantly improve the academic level and school running quality; the second one is the cultural advantage; inheriting the wisdom of the Chinese civilization accumulated for five thousand years and carrying forward excellent traditional culture, unify strength, build brand and improve image; the third one is system advantage; give play to the institutional advantages of socialist countries, strengthen objective driving, collect consensus and joining forces, optimize resource configuration, and provide sustainable and solid support for the university to speed up catching up with and surpassing the world advanced level.

translation.zh: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
translation.en: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.
translation.source: 特别要意识到，建设世界一流大学不可能千校一面，各个学校在发挥优势的同时，必须彰显个性和特色。
translation.medium: It is particularly important to recognize that building a world-class university cannot be achieved by simply replicating the same model across multiple campuses. Each school must find its own unique strengths and highlight its individuality and distinctiveness.
translation.reference: It shall be especially noted that in order to construct world-class universities, the universities shall manifest their uniqueness and their own characteristics at the same time of giving full play to its advantages.

translation.zh: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
translation.en: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.
translation.source: 办学特色既要有共性的中国特色，也要体现各自独特的目标定位、办学传统和资源禀赋。
translation.medium: The characteristic of education should have both common Chinese characteristics and unique characteristics of each school, including its goals, traditions, and resources.
translation.reference: Running an university has to possess the common Chinese characteristics and manifest unique objective positioning, school operation traditions and resource endowment.

translation.zh: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
translation.en: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 就浙江大学而言，我们在办学中注重突出三个方面的特色：一是突出创新创业人才培养特色，构建科教融合、校企结合的整合育人环境，形成全链条的创业教育生态系统；二是突出学科交叉会聚特色，推动学科体系的优化调整，营造学科交叉的制度环境，积极培育交叉新兴学科和标志性交叉成果；三是突出办学体系和社会服务特色，开展深度国际交流合作，加快形成泛浙大产学研合作体系。
translation.medium: For Zhejiang University, in terms of our education, we emphasize three aspects of distinctiveness: first, we focus on cultivating innovative and entrepreneurial talents, building an integrated educational environment that combines teaching and industry, and creating a comprehensive ecosystem for entrepreneurship education; second, we focus on interdisciplinary collaboration and clustering, promoting the optimization and adjustment of disciplinary systems, and fostering an institutional environment for interdisciplinary collaboration, actively cultivating emerging interdisciplinary fields and iconic interdisciplinary achievements; third, we focus on the management system and social service characteristics, deepening international exchange and cooperation, and accelerating the formation of a comprehensive research and production cooperation system with universities and enterprises in Zhejiang.
translation.reference: For Zhejiang University, three characteristics are emphasized in our operation: the first one is to highlight the special training of innovation and entrepreneurship talents: construct integrated teaching environment by combining science with education and combining schools and enterprises, and the full-chain entrepreneurship education ecological system; the second one is to highlight the feature of cross-discipline convergence: promote the optimization and adjustment of discipline system, build the environment of the cross-discipline system, and actively cultivate results of cross-discipline and emerging discipline research and landmark cross-discipline achievements; the third one is to highlight the school operation system and the social service features: carry out in-depth international exchanges and cooperation, and accelerate forming the industry-university research cooperation system of Zhejiang University.

translation.zh: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
translation.en: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.
translation.source: 在这个过程中，尤为重要的是，要始终坚守大学精神，让大学精神与时代精神同频共振。
translation.medium: Especially important in this process is to always adhere to the spirit of the university, so that the university spirit resonates with the spirit of the times.
translation.reference: In this process, it is especially important to always stick to the university spirit, and let it resonate with the spirit of the times.

translation.zh: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
translation.en: For Zhejiang University, the university motto of “seeking truth and making innovation”, the common values of “study diligently, cultivate morality, foster discernment, advocate honesty” and the principles of “harboring generosity like the ocean, seeking the truth while upholding morality, being brave enough to keep exploring, and building our country” constitute the newest expression system of the spirit of Zhejiang University.
translation.source: 对于浙江大学来说 ， “ 求是创新”校训 ， “ 勤学、修德、明辨、笃实”共同价值观以及“海纳江河、启真厚德、开物前民、树我邦国”共同构成了浙大精神的最新表述体系。
translation.medium: For Zhejiang University, the slogan "Seeking the truth and pursuing excellence" represents the core value of the university, and the values of "hard work, self-cultivation, discernment, and diligence" as well as "navigating the sea and the river, seeking the truth and pursuing excellence, opening up the future, and planting the foundations of the country" collectively constitute the latest expression system of Zhejiang University's spirit.
