translation.medium: Participants in the network continuing education program must pay tuition fees when they register. The standard fee for 30 hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan per person per year (including the standard continuing education textbook).
translation.reference: Cost engineers enrolling in online further education shall pay tuition to various management institutions when signing up; the standard in general is: the cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses is 300 yuan/person per year (including unified teaching materials for further education);

translation.zh: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
translation.en: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.
translation.source: 30学时选修课的费用为300元/人年。
translation.medium: The cost of selecting 30 credits per year is 300 yuan/person.
translation.reference: The cost of 30 class hours of elective courses is 300 yuan/person per year.

translation.zh: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
translation.en: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).
translation.source: 30学时必修课和30学时选修课的费用为600元/人年(含继续教育统一教材)。
translation.medium: The cost of 30 compulsory courses and 30 elective courses is 600 yuan per person per year (including textbooks for continuing education).
translation.reference: The cost of 30 class hours of compulsory courses and 30 class hours of elective courses is 600 yuan/person per year (including unified textbooks for further education).

translation.zh: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
translation.en: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;
translation.source: (一)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师网络继续教育学习，按在线学习课件记录的时间计算学时;
translation.medium: (1) Participate in the registration of the national standard price coordination or the registration of various provincial and departmental management institutions, and continue to learn online learning courses organized by the registered pricing engineering technician network. Record the time spent on the online learning courses according to the records of the online learning courses, and calculate the study time.
translation.reference: 1. Participate in the online further education of registered cost engineers organized by the China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and calculate the class hours according to the time recorded in the online learning courseware;

translation.zh: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
translation.en: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;
translation.source: (二)参加中价协或各省级和部门管理机构组织的注册造价工程师集中面授培训及各种类型的培训班、研讨会等，每半天可认定4个学时;
translation.medium: (2) Participate in the registration of engineering technicians organized by the national or provincial/departmental management institutions, and receive concentrated training and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. Each half-day can be recognized as 4 credits.
translation.reference: 2. Participate in the centralized face-to-face training of registered cost engineers and various types of training courses, seminars, etc. organized by China Cost Engineering Association or provincial and departmental management institutions, and 4 class hours can be recognized every half day;

translation.zh: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
translation.en: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;
translation.source: (三)参加中价协、各省级和部门造价工程师、造价员继续教育授课，每半天可认定10个学时;
translation.medium: (3) Participate in the national standard price negotiation, and continue to hold training courses for engineers and technicians in various provinces and departments. Each half-day can be recognized as 10 credits.
translation.reference: 3. Participate in courses of further education for cost engineers and cost personnel organized by China Cost Engineering Association, provinces and departments, and 10 class hours can be recognized every half day;

translation.zh: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
translation.en: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;
translation.source: (四)参加中价协和省级课题研究、行业标准编制、教材编写,每项每年认定30学时;
translation.medium: (4) Participate in national and provincial joint research projects, industry standard formulation, and textbook writing. Each item is recognized for 30 teaching hours per year.
translation.reference: 4. Participate in the research projects of China Cost Engineering Association and provincial projects, and the compilation of industry standards and textbooks; each item is recognized as 30 class hours per year;

translation.zh: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
translation.en: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;
translation.source: (六)参加全国造价工程师执业资格考试教材编写以及命题、审题、评卷，每年可认定30学时;
translation.medium: (6) Participate in the national pricing engineering technician qualification examination curriculum writing and item writing, evaluation and scoring, with a recognition of 30 academic hours per year.
translation.reference: 6. Participate in the compilation of teaching materials, setting questions, reviewing questions and evaluation of national cost engineer qualification examination, and it can be recognized as 30 class hours per year;

translation.zh: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
translation.en: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).
translation.source: (七)以个人署名且公开发表(以正式刊号为准)的工程造价相关专业论文、著作。
translation.medium: (7) To use a personal signature and publicly publish (with the official journal as evidence) engineering cost-related professional theses, works.
translation.reference: 7. Professional papers and works related to project cost with personal signature and which are published publicly (with official publication number).

translation.zh: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
translation.en: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;
translation.source: 出版著作每万字认定12学时;
translation.medium: 出版著作每万字认定12学时。
translation.reference: 12 class hours per 10,000 words of published works;

translation.zh: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
translation.en: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;
translation.source: 在国家级刊物上发表论文每千字认定8学时，在省级刊物上发表论文每千字认定5学时，在市级刊物上发表论文每千字认定3学时;
translation.medium: For articles published in national journals, each thousand words is equivalent to 8 academic hours, for articles published in provincial journals, each thousand words is equivalent to 5 academic hours, and for articles published in municipal journals, each thousand words is equivalent to 3 academic hours.
translation.reference: Every thousand words in papers published in national journals is recognized as 8 class hours, every thousand words in papers published in provincial journals is recognized as 5 class hours, and every thousand words in papers published in municipal journals is recognized as 3 class hours;

translation.zh: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
translation.en: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.
translation.source: (九)参加经中价协、各省级和部门管理机构、省级造价协会批准或授权的工程造价咨询企业组织的可以面向社会的公开培训(企业一般的管理和技能培训除外)，每半天可认定4个学时，每年最高可认定30学时。
translation.medium: (9) Participate in the training programs approved or authorized by the Ministry of Finance, the provincial and departmental management institutions, and the provincial construction price consultation associations. The engineering cost consulting enterprises that have been approved or authorized by these institutions can provide public training to society (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises). Each half-day can be recognized for 4 credits, and the maximum can be recognized for 30 credits per year.
translation.reference: 9. Participate in the public training (excluding the general management and skill training of enterprises) that can be open to the society which is approved by China Cost Engineering Association, provincial and departmental management institutions, and the Provincial Cost Association, or organized by authorized engineering cost consulting enterprise; 4 class hours can be recognized every half day, and at most 30 class hours can be recognized every year.

translation.zh: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
translation.en: Process of cost engineer online further education
translation.source: 造价工程师网络继续教育学习流程
translation.medium: The network-based continuing education learning process for cost engineers.
translation.reference: Process of cost engineer online further education

translation.zh: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
translation.en: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.
translation.source: 在注册机构收到费用后，学员身份随即开通，造价工程师即可凭着用户名和密码进入网络教育课堂学习。
translation.medium: After the registration institution receives the fees, the student's identity is immediately opened, and the construction engineer can enter the network education classroom to study with a user name and password.
translation.reference: After the registration institution receives the tuition, the student identity will be set up immediately, and cost engineers can enter the online education classroom with the user name and password.

translation.zh: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
translation.en: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.
translation.source: 学员通过点播课件、提问答疑、网上讨论等方式进行学习。
translation.medium: Students learn through online courses, asking and answering questions, and participating in online discussions.
translation.reference: Students learn through on-demand courseware, question answering, online discussion, etc.

translation.zh: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
translation.en: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.
translation.source: 如果忘记密码，登陆时出现用户名和密码不正确，不能登陆学习时，请学员与所属注册机构联系，注册机构可以协助修改学员的密码(但不能修改用户名)，使用其修改后的密码重新登陆。
translation.medium: If you forget your password, you will see an error message when you try to log in with your username and password, and you will not be able to log in. In this case, please contact your registration institution and ask them to help you modify your password (but they cannot modify your username). Use the modified password to log in again.
translation.reference: If you forget your password, and your user name and password are incorrect when logging in; if you can’t log in and study, please contact your registration institution, and they can help you change the password (but you can’t change your user name) and you can use the new password to log in again.

translation.reference: After seeing my wedding dress photos, I found that I could also have flattering photos.

translation.zh: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
translation.en: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 美亚裔团体投诉耶鲁等3所常春藤名校招生歧视-新华网
translation.medium: A Chinese-American group has filed a complaint with Yale University and three other Ivy League schools, alleging that they discriminate against Asian-American applicants in their admissions process - Xinhua Net.
translation.reference: Asian communities in the US complains about admission discrimination by Yale and two other Ivy League universities - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.
translation.source: 新华社华盛顿５月２３日电（记者徐剑梅）美国１３０多个亚裔团体２３日向美国教育部和司法部提交申诉，抗议３所常春藤名校 — — 耶鲁大学、布朗大学和达特茅斯学院在招生过程中歧视亚裔申请学生。
translation.medium: The Washington Post, May 23, 2013 (reporter Xue Jianmei) More than 130 Asian-American groups in the United States filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, protesting against three Ivy League schools - Harvard University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - for discriminating against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Washington on May 23 (journalist: Xu Jianmei): More than 130 Asian communities in the US submitted a complaint to the Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice in the US on May 23 to protest against the discrimination on Asian students in the enrollment of 3 Ivy League universities, Yale University, Brown University and Dartmouth College.

translation.zh: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
translation.en: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.
translation.source: 牵头发起申诉的亚裔教育联盟当天在华盛顿召开新闻发布会。
translation.medium: The Asian American Education Alliance, which initiated the lawsuit, held a press conference in Washington on the day of the trial.
translation.reference: Asian American Coalition for Education, who initiated the complaint, held a press conference in Washington on that day.

translation.zh: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
translation.en: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.
translation.source: 该团体主席赵宇空在发布会上说，过去１０年里，符合美国名校录取条件的亚裔申请人数量成倍增长，但在这３所美国名校中，亚裔所占比例基本维持在同一水平。
translation.medium: The chairman of this organization, Zhao Yuchun, said at the press conference that in the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American top universities has doubled, but the proportion of Asians in these three American top universities basically remains at the same level.
translation.reference: According to the speech made by Zhao Yukong, chairman of the group, during the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who met the admission qualification of famous universities in the US has doubled and redoubled; however, in these famous universities in the US, the proportion of Asian students basically maintained at the same level.

translation.zh: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
translation.en: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.
translation.source: 许多研究表明，这些高校在所谓“综合考量”的招生过程中 ， “ 长期持续性以及系统化地歧视亚裔申请学生 ” 。
translation.medium: Many studies have shown that in the so-called "holistic consideration" admission process of these top universities, "systematically and persistently discriminating against Asian applicants."
translation.reference: According to lots of research results, these universities “discriminated against Asian students in a long-term, continuous and systematic way” during the so-called “comprehensive consideration”of the admission process.

translation.zh: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
translation.en: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.
translation.source: 赵宇空介绍说，２０１４年桑德斯等学者的研究显示，在这３所高校里，相对申请者人数，亚裔在所有族裔中录取率最低。
translation.medium: Zhao Yuchun introduced that in 2014, Sanders et al. found that among the three universities, the acceptance rate for Asian applicants was the lowest among all ethnic groups.
translation.reference: As introduced by Zhao Yukong, according to research results of scholars such as Saunders in 2014, in these 3 universities, Asian students have the lowest acceptance rate among all the ethnic groups considering the number of applicants.

translation.zh: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
translation.en: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.
translation.source: 美国教育部的数据也显示，在所有常春藤盟校中，布朗大学和达特茅斯学院对亚裔学生的录取比例最低，耶鲁大学和布朗大学对亚裔申请学生实施了事实上的种族配额达２０年以上。
translation.medium: According to data from the US Department of Education, among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students. Yale University and Brown University have been implementing de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years.
translation.reference: Data from Department of Education of the US also indicates that among all the Ivy League Universities, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest acceptance rate of Asian students; Yale University and Brown University have been implementing racial quota of Asian applicants for more than 20 years.

translation.zh: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
translation.en: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.
translation.source: 赵宇空告诉新华社记者，他们期望提交申诉后，美国教育部、司法部能够展开调查，并在认定事实后采取措施阻止这些高校继续在招生中歧视亚裔。
translation.medium: Zhao Yuchen told a reporter from Xinhua News Agency that they hope that after submitting the complaint, the US Department of Education and the Department of Justice will launch an investigation and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in their admissions.
translation.reference: Zhao Yukong told the journalist of Xinhua News Agency that they wished that Ministry of Education and Ministry of Justice of the US could conduct investigation after they submitted the complaint, and take measures to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asian students in the admission process after identifying the facts.

translation.zh: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
translation.en: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.
translation.source: 他们也期望被投诉高校能够主动重视这一问题，改变对亚裔的招生政策。
translation.medium: They also hope that the university can proactively address this issue and change its admission policies towards Asian students.
translation.reference: They also wished that the universities being complained about could pay attention to this issue on their own initiative and change the recruitment policy for Asian students.

translation.zh: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
translation.en: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.
translation.source: 目前，被投诉的３所高校尚未作出回应。
translation.medium: Currently, the three schools that have been reported have not yet made a response.
translation.reference: The 3 universities being complained about have not responded yet.

translation.zh: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
translation.en: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.
translation.source: 亚裔教育联盟成立于２０１５年，当时曾投诉哈佛大学招生歧视，但美国教育部以程序理由未予受理。
translation.medium: The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015. At that time, it had filed a complaint with Harvard University about discrimination in admissions, but the U.S. Department of Education did not process the complaint.
translation.reference: Established in 2015, Asian American Coalition for Education once made a complaint against Harvard University about admission discrimination, but the US Ministry of Education did not accept the complaint on procedural grounds.

translation.zh: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
translation.en: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.
translation.source: 此次参与申诉的除美国华裔团体外，还包括美国印度裔、韩裔、日裔、巴基斯坦裔教育团体。
translation.medium: In addition to the Chinese-American organizations that participated in the lawsuit, the list also includes Indian-American, Korean-American, Japanese-American, and Pakistani-American educational organizations.
translation.reference: In addition to Asian groups in the US, the groups involved in the complaint also include Indian, Korean, Japanese Americans and Pakistani education groups in the US.

translation.zh: 需要餐具
translation.en: I need tableware.
translation.source: 需要餐具
translation.medium: Need utensils.
translation.reference: I need tableware.

translation.zh: 刚刚取消了订单
translation.en: I just canceled the order.
translation.source: 刚刚取消了订单
translation.medium: Just canceled an order.
translation.reference: I just canceled the order.

translation.zh: 为什么还是执行中
translation.en: Why is it still in progress?
translation.source: 为什么还是执行中
translation.medium: Why is it still executing?
translation.reference: Why is it still in progress?

translation.zh: 可以帮我查看有没有取消吗
translation.en: Can you check for me if it has been canceled?
translation.source: 可以帮我查看有没有取消吗
translation.medium: Can you help me check if there is any cancellation?
translation.reference: Can you check for me if it has been canceled?

translation.zh: 但我早上 5 点 9 分就已经下单啦
translation.en: But I placed the order at 5:9 in the morning.
translation.source: 但我早上 5 点 9 分就已经下单啦
translation.medium: But I placed the order at 5:9 this morning.
translation.reference: But I placed the order at 5:9 in the morning.

translation.zh: 那边是订餐热线，他们说什么都不知道
translation.en: That was the order hotline, and they said they didn’t know anything.
translation.source: 那边是订餐热线，他们说什么都不知道
translation.medium: "That's the reservation hotline. They don't know what they're saying."
translation.reference: That was the order hotline, and they said they didn’t know anything.

translation.zh: 有电话可以直接跟他们联系吗
translation.en: Is there a number I can call to contact them directly?
translation.source: 有电话可以直接跟他们联系吗
translation.medium: Is there a phone number that I can directly contact them with?
translation.reference: Is there a number I can call to contact them directly?

translation.zh: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
translation.en: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.
translation.source: 2020年9月，陆先生从房屋中介了解到一处位于浙江余姚丈亭镇的厂房，在多次现场看房后，陆先生决定购买该厂房。
translation.medium: In September 2020, Mr. Liu learned about a factory building located in Yongjia, Zhejiang, from a real estate agent. After visiting the site multiple times, Mr. Liu decided to purchase the factory building.
translation.reference: In September 2020, Mr. Lu learned about a plant located at Yuyao Zhangting Village in Zhejiang through an estate agent and decided to purchase it after seeing it on-site for a few times.

translation.zh: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
translation.en: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.
translation.source: 同年12月，陆先生就购买厂房的细节与房屋所有权人的家属林某进行磋商后，于当天通过银行转账汇款20万元作定金。
translation.medium: In December of the same year, Mr. Liu discussed the details of purchasing the factory with the relatives of the owner of the house, Ms. Lin, and paid a deposit of 200,000 yuan by transferring money through a bank.
translation.reference: In December of the same year, Mr. Lu negotiated with Lin, a family member of the house owner, about the details of the purchase of the plant, and remitted 200,000 yuan as a deposit by bank transfer on the same day.

translation.zh: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
translation.en: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”
translation.source: 林某在《厂房买卖定金收条》上作为收款人签名，其中载明，“若买方不想买此厂房，此定金归卖家，如卖方不愿意卖此厂房，定金将双倍返还卖方，双方约定一周内签订厂房买卖合同。”
translation.medium: Mr. Lin signed the "Factory Building Purchase and Sale Agreement" as the payee, and it was clearly stated that "If the buyer does not want to buy this factory building, the deposit will be returned to the seller. If the seller does not want to sell this factory building, the deposit will be returned to the buyer. Both parties agree to sign a factory building purchase and sale agreement within one week."
translation.reference: Lin signed as the payee on the Receipt of the Deposit for the Purchase and Sale of the Plant, which stated that if the buyer does not to buy the plant, the deposit belongs to the seller; if the seller does not want to sell the plant, the deposit will be returned to the seller in double; both parties agree to sign the plant purchase and sale contract within one week. ”

translation.zh: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
translation.en: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.
translation.source: 然而，之后双方因厂房出售范围、付款方式等主要合同条款未能形成一致意见，导致房屋买卖合同迟迟未能签订。
translation.medium: However, after both parties failed to reach a consensus on key contract terms such as the sales range and payment methods, the house purchase and sale contract was delayed indefinitely.
translation.reference: However, both parties failed to reach an agreement on the main items in the contract including the scope of the sale of the plant and method of payment, and as a result, they were delaying the signing of the plant purchase and sale contract.

translation.zh: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
translation.en: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.
translation.source: 考虑到双方未能就合同内容达成共识，几天后，林某将20万元定金退回给了陆先生。
translation.medium: Considering that the two parties were unable to reach an agreement on the contract terms, a few days later, Mr. Lin returned the 200,000 yuan deposit to Mr. Liu.
translation.reference: Considering they have not reached an agreement on the content of the contract, Lin returned the deposit of 200,000 to Mr. Lu a few days later.

translation.zh: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
translation.en: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.
translation.source: 好不容易看中的房子，定金交了，房款也准备好了，就差“临门一脚”签合同，卖方却不卖了，这让陆先生无奈又愤怒。
translation.medium: It's not easy to find a house that meets your requirements. After paying the deposit and preparing the purchase money, you just need to sign the contract, but the seller doesn't sell. This makes Mr. Liang feel helpless and angry.
translation.reference: Mr. Lu was helpless and angry because he had a hard time finding the plant, paid the deposit, prepared the payment and was waiting for the contract to be signed, but the seller didn’t want to sell it anymore.

translation.zh: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
translation.en: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.
translation.source: 为此，陆先生将林某起诉至余姚市人民法院。
translation.medium: Therefore, Mr. Liu will initiate a lawsuit against Mr. Lin at the Yueyang People's Court.
translation.reference: For this, Mr. Lu decided to sue Lin at the Yuyao People’s Court.

translation.zh: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
translation.en: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.
translation.source: 法院经审理认为，双方最终未能签订正式合同，不能仅归责于被告，应合理推定为磋商不成，故本案不应适用定金罚则，被告无需承担双倍返还定金的违约责任。
translation.medium: The court after examination believes that the two parties were unable to sign a formal contract and it cannot be solely blamed on the defendant. Therefore, this case should not apply the penalty of double return of the deposit, and the defendant does not need to bear the breach of contract liability for returning the deposit twice.
translation.reference: After the hearing, the court held that the two parties failing to sign a formal contract could not be attributed only to the defendant, but should be reasonably presumed that the negotiation failed; therefore, the deposit penalty should not be applied in this case, and the defendant should not bear the liability for breach of contract and return twice the deposit.

translation.zh: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
translation.en: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.
translation.source: 一审判决后，原告提起上诉。
translation.medium: After the first trial, the plaintiff appeals.
translation.reference: After the judgment of the first instance, the plaintiff appealed again.

translation.zh: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
translation.en: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.
translation.source: 近日，二审法院维持原判。
translation.medium: Recently, the second instance court upheld the original judgment.
translation.reference: Recently, the court of second instance upheld the original judgment.

translation.zh: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
translation.en: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.
translation.source: 【律师提醒】 在交易过程中要尽到必要的审慎注意义务。
translation.medium: [Legal Reminder] In the trading process, it is necessary to exercise caution and prudence.
translation.reference: [Reminder from attorney] In the process of trading, we should perform necessary duty of prudence.

translation.zh: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
translation.en: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.
translation.source: 在签订合同时，作为买方要尽到必要的审慎注意义务，比如，核实房屋所有权人信息、房屋是否被人占用等相关信息，并在合同中明确关于交付的具体时间、地点，以防履行合同时双方产生争议。
translation.medium: When signing a contract, as a buyer, you should fulfill your duty of prudence and conduct due diligence, such as verifying the property owner's information, whether the property is occupied, and other relevant information. It is also important to clearly specify the delivery time and location in the contract to avoid disputes between the parties when fulfilling the contract.
translation.reference: When signing the contract, the buyer should perform necessary duty of prudence, such as verifying the information of the house owner and whether the house is occupied, and specify the specific time and place of delivery in the contract, so as to prevent disputes between the two parties during the performance of the contract.

translation.zh: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
translation.en: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.
translation.source: （德国之声中文网 ） " 民主峰会"周五结束后，中国外交部发言人周六（12月11日）发表谈话表示，美国举办"领导人民主峰会 " ， 是"以意识形态划线，把民主工具化、武器化，假民主之名行反民主之实，煽动分裂对抗，转移国内矛盾 " 。
translation.medium: According to the German Voice of China website, after the "Democracy Summit" on Friday, the Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesperson spoke on Saturday (December 11th) and said that the United States held the "Leaders' Summit on Democracy" was "an attempt to use ideological lines to weaponize democracy and turn it into a tool for division and confrontation, using the name of democracy to cover up anti-democratic actions, and inciting splits and confrontations within the country."
translation.reference: (Deutsche Welle Chinese Website) After the “Democracy Summit” on Friday, the spokesperson of Foreign Ministry of China delivered a speech on Saturday (December 11), stating that the United States hosting the “Leaders’ Democracy Summit” to “make democracy tool-oriented and weapon-oriented based on ideology, to implement anti-democracy in the name of democracy, so as to incite division and confrontation and to shift domestic contradictions”.

translation.zh: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
translation.en: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.
translation.source: 中国政府认为 ， " 长期以来，美国将自己的政治制度和价值理念强加于人，推行'民主改造 ' ， 滥施单边制裁，策动'颜色革命 ' ， 造成灾难性后果。
translation.medium: The Chinese government believes that "for a long time, the United States has imposed its political system and value concepts on others, carried out 'democratic reform', imposed unilateral sanctions, instigated 'color revolutions', causing disastrous consequences."
translation.reference: According to the Government of China, “for a very long time, the U.S. has been imposing its own political systems and values on others, carried out ‘democratic transformation’, used unilateral sanction indiscriminately and has instigated ‘Color Revolution’, leading to disastrous consequences.

translation.zh: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
translation.en: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.
translation.source: '民主'早已成为美国干涉别国的'大规模杀伤性武器 ' 。
translation.medium: 'Democracy' has already become a 'massive lethal weapon' for US interference in other countries.
translation.reference: “Democracy has long become the weapon of mass destruction the United States used to interfere with other countries.

translation.zh: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
translation.en: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.
translation.source: 此次峰会是拜登兑现其竞选承诺的行动。
translation.medium: This meeting is an action taken by Biden to fulfill his campaign promises.
translation.reference: The summit was the action that Biden took to fulfill his promise made during the campaign.

translation.zh: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
translation.en: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.
translation.source: 为期两天的会议以视频方式进行，全球111个国家领导人应邀与会，其中包括台湾领导人，但中国和俄罗斯没有受到邀请。
translation.medium: The two-day conference will be held in a video format, with 111 global leaders in attendance, including the leader of Taiwan, but China and Russia have not been invited.
translation.reference: The meetings during the 2-days summit were held via video call, and leaders from 111 countries were invited to attend the meeting, including the leaders of Taiwan; however, leaders of China and Russia were not invited.

translation.zh: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
translation.en: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.
translation.source: 峰会前夕，中国和俄罗斯就以美国自身民主出现问题抨击美国，称美国没有资格主持召开这样的峰会。
translation.medium: On the eve of the summit, China and Russia criticized the United States for its own democratic problems and said that the United States had no qualifications to hold such a summit.
translation.reference: China and Russia attacked the U.S. for what was wrong with its own democracy before the summit, and said that the U.S. did not have the qualification to hold such a summit.

translation.zh: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
translation.en: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.
translation.source: 而国际上和美国国内也有质疑声音，例如批评受邀与会的包括一些有威权专制倾向的领导人，比如菲律宾、波兰和巴西等国的领导人，有人怀疑拜登政府的真正意图并非为了民主而是为了地缘政治目的组织了这次峰会。
translation.medium: However, there are also skeptical voices both internationally and in the United States, such as criticism of the invitees, including some authoritarian leaders with a tendency towards imperialism, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland, and Brazil, etc. Some people suspect that the true intention of the Biden administration in organizing this summit is not for the sake of democracy, but for geopolitical purposes.
translation.reference: There were doubts internationally and in the U.S.; for example, the U.S. was criticized for inviting leaders who had the tendency to be authoritarians, such as the leaders of the Philippines, Poland and Brazil, and some suspected that the real intention of the Biden government was geopolitics, not democracy.

translation.zh: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
translation.en: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.
translation.source: 刚上任的德国总理肖尔茨也参加了视频民主峰会
translation.medium: The newly appointed German Chancellor Angela Merkel also participated in the video democracy summit.
translation.reference: German Chancellor Scholz who just took office also attended the video Democracy Summit.

translation.zh: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
translation.en: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.
translation.source: 中国外交部周六的声明称 ， " 今天的美式民主病态尽显，金钱政治、身份政治、政党对立、政治极化、社会撕裂、种族矛盾、贫富分化等问题愈演愈烈 " ， 美国的民主是建立在资本基础上的"富人游戏 " 。
translation.medium: The Chinese Foreign Ministry issued a statement on Saturday, saying that "the current state of American democracy is evident, with issues such as money politics, identity politics, party opposition, political polarization, social fragmentation, racial conflicts, income inequality, and social polarization becoming increasingly severe." The US democracy is built on a capitalist basis, which is a "game of the rich."
translation.reference: According to the statement made by Chinese Foreign Ministry on Saturday, “the American democracy today is morbid, with increasingly obvious problems such as money politics, identity politics, political opposition, political polarization, social tearing, racial conflicts and polarization of the rich and the poor”, and the democracy of the U.S. was the “game of the rich” established based on the capital.

translation.zh: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
translation.en: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”
translation.source: 美国总统拜登在发言中表示 ， " 作为政府的领导人，我们有责任倾听我们的公民，加固民主的护栏，推动改革，实现透明的问责治理，更能抵御专制的缓冲和冲击的力量，以及那些想在公共利益之前赤裸裸地追求权力的人 。 "
translation.medium: US President Biden said in his speech that "as the leader of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to our citizens, strengthen the barriers of democracy, promote reforms, achieve transparent accountability governance, and more effectively resist the buffer and impact of authoritarianism, as well as those who openly seek power at the expense of public interest."
translation.reference: The U.S. President, Biden, expressed in his speech, “as the leaders of the government, we have the responsibility to listen to ideas of our citizens, reinforce the guardrail of democracy, promote reforms and realize transparent accountability and governance, to fight against the power of impact of buffer of autocracy and those who bluntly pursue power before public benefits.”

translation.zh: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
translation.en: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”
translation.source: 他强调，民主并不是想当然的 ， " 我们必须在每一代人当中不断更新它，在我看来，这是我们这个时代的决定性挑战 。 "
translation.medium: He stressed that democracy is not something that should be taken for granted, "We must continuously update it in every generation, in my view, this is a decisive challenge of our time."
translation.reference: He emphasized that democracy should not be taken for granted, “we must keep update it in every generations which is, in my opinion, the decisive challenge of our era.”

translation.zh: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
translation.en: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.
translation.source: 拜登还说，全球民主及人权"面对持续且令人忧心的挑战之际，民主需要斗士来捍卫 " 。
translation.medium: Biden also said that "in the face of continuous and worrying challenges to democracy and human rights around the world, democracy needs defenders to protect it."
translation.reference: Biden also said that global democracy and human rights are “facing continuous and worrying challenges, and democracy should be guarded by fighters”.

translation.zh: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
translation.en: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.
translation.source: 美国方面承诺，在本次民主峰会后，将展开为期一年的行动，包含一项金额4.244亿美元的倡议，以加强世界各地的民主，并对独立新闻媒体提供支持。
translation.medium: The United States has promised to launch a one-year action plan after the upcoming democracy summit, including a proposal worth 4.244 billion US dollars to strengthen democracy around the world and provide support to independent news media.
translation.reference: The United States promised that after this Democracy Summit, it will carry out a series of year-long actions including a 424.4 million USD initiative to strengthen democracy around the globe and provide support to independent new media.

translation.zh: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
translation.en: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.
translation.source: 美国希望各国在计划于2022年底举行的实体民主峰会前，作出具体的公开承诺，以改善其民主制度。
translation.medium: The United States hopes that each country will make specific public promises before the end of 2022 to improve its democratic system.
translation.reference: The U.S. wants all countries to make specific and open promises before the democratic summit held at the end of 2022, so as to improve the democratic system.

translation.zh: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
translation.en: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.
translation.source: 拜登说 ， " 让我们所有国家都落实我们的承诺并在明年报告我们所取得的进展 " 。
translation.medium: Biden said, "Let's make sure that every country fulfills their commitments and reports their progress to us by next year."
translation.reference: Biden said, “let’s all fulfill our promises and report our progresses next year”.

translation.zh: 好的，我只怕他送错了地址
translation.en: OK, I just worry that he will deliver it to the wrong address.
translation.source: 好的，我只怕他送错了地址
translation.medium: Okay, I'm just afraid he sent the wrong address.
translation.reference: OK, I just worry that he will deliver it to the wrong address.

translation.zh: 门口总是要等很久才能吃上的煲仔饭，煲仔饭的砂锅都开裂了…

translation.medium: It's so rare to find a restaurant with available seats right away, and the food quality is just as good as always.
translation.reference: It was rare to have seats available as soon as I arrived, and the dishes were great as always.
