translation.zh: 48小时核酸阴性、设“缓冲区 ” 国务院联防联控机制发文要求加强口岸城市疫情防控-新华网
translation.en: Negative nucleic acid test result within 48 hours and setting up a "buffer zone", the State Council joint prevention and control mechanism issued a document to strengthen epidemic prevention and control in port cities - Xinhua News
translation.source: 48小时核酸阴性、设“缓冲区 ” 国务院联防联控机制发文要求加强口岸城市疫情防控-新华网
translation.medium: The National Health Commission issued a document requiring the strengthening of epidemic prevention and control measures in border cities, with a 48-hour negative nucleic acid test result and the establishment of a "buffer zone" - Xinhua Net.
translation.reference: Negative nucleic acid test result within 48 hours and setting up a "buffer zone", the State Council joint prevention and control mechanism issued a document to strengthen epidemic prevention and control in port cities - Xinhua News

translation.zh: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
translation.en: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporters Dong Ruifeng, Gu Tiancheng) State Council joint prevention and control mechanism recently issued a notice about strengthening epidemic prevention and control of COVID-19 in port cities, asking people who recently left land border port cities (except those connected with ports of Hong Kong and Macao) to hold the negative result of nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who go to the land border port cities should take the nucleic acid test at least once after arrival.
translation.source: 新华社北京12月11日电（记者董瑞丰、顾天成）国务院联防联控机制日前印发关于加强口岸城市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作的通知，要求近期离开陆地边境口岸城市（与香港、澳门有口岸相连的除外）人员需持有48小时内核酸检测阴性证明，前往陆地边境口岸城市人员抵达后至少进行1次核酸检测。
translation.medium: The State Council's Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism recently issued a notice on strengthening the prevention and control of the COVID-19 epidemic at the land port cities, requiring people who need to leave the land port cities (excluding those with a land border with Hong Kong and Macao) within the next 48 hours to have a negative nucleic acid test result and to undergo at least one nucleic acid test upon arrival in the land port city.
translation.reference: Xinhua News Agency Beijing December 11th (Reporters Dong Ruifeng, Gu Tiancheng) State Council joint prevention and control mechanism recently issued a notice about strengthening epidemic prevention and control of COVID-19 in port cities, asking people who recently left land border port cities (except those connected with ports of Hong Kong and Macao) to hold the negative result of nucleic acid test within 48 hours, and people who go to the land border port cities should take the nucleic acid test at least once after arrival.

translation.zh: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
translation.en: According to the notice, the time range of the aforementioned request is from the date when the province, autonomous region and city determine the scope of port cities and announce it until March 15, 2022.
translation.source: 根据通知，上述要求的时间范围为，从各省区市确定口岸城市范围并公告之日起，至2022年3月15日。
translation.medium: According to the notice, the time range for the above requirements is from the date of determining the coastal city range in each province, autonomous region, and municipality directly under the Central Government and publishing it to March 15, 2022.
translation.reference: According to the notice, the time range of the aforementioned request is from the date when the province, autonomous region and city determine the scope of port cities and announce it until March 15, 2022.

translation.zh: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
translation.en: In addition, the notice also requests that port cities with the capability can study the possibility of setting up epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction.
translation.source: 此外，通知还提出，有条件的口岸城市可研究在辖区内设置疫情防控缓冲区。
translation.medium: In addition, the notice also proposes that under certain conditions, cities along the border can set up epidemic prevention and control buffer zones within their administrative areas.
translation.reference: In addition, the notice also requests that port cities with the capability can study the possibility of setting up epidemic prevention and control buffer zone within their jurisdiction.

translation.zh: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
translation.en: According to the introduction of the person in charge of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission, for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main local economic pillar and the border residents from both sides have frequent exchanges.
translation.source: 国家卫生健康委疾病预防控制局有关负责人介绍，对于一些口岸城市来说，跨境边贸是当地主要经济支柱，双方边民往来频繁。
translation.medium: The National Health and Health Commission's Disease Prevention and Control Office has introduced that for some border cities, cross-border trade is the main economic pillar, and people from both sides travel back and forth frequently.
translation.reference: According to the introduction of the person in charge of the Bureau of Disease Prevention and Control of the National Health Commission, for some port cities, cross-border trade is the main local economic pillar and the border residents from both sides have frequent exchanges.

translation.zh: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
translation.en: The implementation of the policy of zoning and differentiated management is to make one defense line of the spread of prevention and control into two lines, make it possible to move the gateway forward, reduce the risk of the spread of the epidemic, and to achieve the maximum effectiveness of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost.
translation.source: 实行分区差异化管理政策，由一道防控外溢防线变为两道防线，有望实现关口前移，压缩疫情外溢风险，以最小社会影响、最低社会成本实现疫情防控最大成效。
translation.medium: Implement differential control policies, from a single line of defense to two lines of defense, which can achieve the goal of pre-emptive control and reduce the risk of epidemic spread, with the aim of achieving the maximum epidemic prevention effect at the minimum social impact and lowest social cost.
translation.reference: The implementation of the policy of zoning and differentiated management is to make one defense line of the spread of prevention and control into two lines, make it possible to move the gateway forward, reduce the risk of the spread of the epidemic, and to achieve the maximum effectiveness of epidemic prevention and control with the minimum social impact and social cost.

translation.zh: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
translation.en: Recently, there have been many local cluster outbreaks of diagnosed cases in China, all of which were imported from overseas through port cities.
translation.source: 近期我国发生多起本土聚集性疫情，均是境外疫情经口岸城市输入。
translation.medium: In recent weeks, there have been many local outbreaks of the epidemic in our country, all of which are imported from abroad through border cities.
translation.reference: Recently, there have been many local cluster outbreaks of diagnosed cases in China, all of which were imported from overseas through port cities.

translation.zh: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
translation.en: The notice points out that this has exposed some problems, such as the untimely monitoring and warning of epidemic in some places, the non-existing implementation of closed-loop management of personnel in high-risk positions, regular nucleic acid testing becoming a mere formality, the inadequate disinfection and sterilization of cold-chain items in all links, the non-standard management of centralized quarantine sites, and the unscientific and inaccurate emergency response of epidemic situation.
translation.source: 上述通知指出，这暴露出一些地方疫情监测预警不及时、高风险岗位人员闭环管理不落实、定期核酸检测流于形式、冷链物品各环节消杀不到位、集中隔离场所管理不规范、疫情应急处置不够科学精准等问题。
translation.medium: The above notice points out that some places have not timely issued epidemic monitoring and early warning, the closed-loop management of high-risk personnel has not been implemented in a timely manner, the regular nucleic acid testing has been formalistic, the disinfection of cold chain logistics has not been effective, the management of centralized isolation areas is not standardized, and the scientific and accurate handling of the epidemic has not been sufficient.
translation.reference: The notice points out that this has exposed some problems, such as the untimely monitoring and warning of epidemic in some places, the non-existing implementation of closed-loop management of personnel in high-risk positions, regular nucleic acid testing becoming a mere formality, the inadequate disinfection and sterilization of cold-chain items in all links, the non-standard management of centralized quarantine sites, and the unscientific and inaccurate emergency response of epidemic situation.

translation.zh: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
translation.en: The notice requests that efforts should be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system and implementing border control measures, to speed up the improvement of the weak links in the prevention and control of port cities, deliver the prevention and control work scientifically, accurately and without relaxing, as well as to strengthen the defense line of curbing imported cases.
translation.source: 通知要求，从完善口岸城市疫情防控机制、健全疫情监测预警体系、落实边境管控措施等9个方面着力，加快补齐口岸城市防控短板弱项，毫不放松、科学精准做好防控工作，织密扎牢外防输入防线。
translation.medium: Notify the need to strengthen the prevention and control mechanism of the city's epidemic, improve the monitoring and warning system for epidemics, implement border control measures, and strengthen the weak links in the prevention and control of the city's epidemic. Do not relax, do scientific and accurate work, and tighten the defense line of epidemic prevention and control.
translation.reference: The notice requests that efforts should be made in nine aspects, including improving the epidemic prevention and control mechanism in port cities, improving the epidemic monitoring and early warning system and implementing border control measures, to speed up the improvement of the weak links in the prevention and control of port cities, deliver the prevention and control work scientifically, accurately and without relaxing, as well as to strengthen the defense line of curbing imported cases.

translation.zh: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
translation.en: The notice stresses that all port cities should study and deploy the epidemic prevention and control and safeguard people's livelihood at the same time, publish and monitor the smooth running of the people's livelihood hotline, regularly check the potential dangers in the supply and price of basic life necessities, and timely solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reflected by the masses.
translation.source: 通知强调，各口岸城市要将疫情防控与民生保障工作同步研究、同步部署，公布并畅通民生保障热线，定期排查基本生活物资供应、价格等方面的苗头隐患，及时解决和主动回应群众反映的突出问题。
translation.medium: Notify that all coastal cities should synchronize the prevention and control of the epidemic with the guarantee of people's livelihood, and publish and widely disseminate the hotline for people's livelihood guarantee. Regularly investigate and resolve the hidden dangers in the supply and price of basic necessities, and actively respond to the prominent issues reflected by the masses.
translation.reference: The notice stresses that all port cities should study and deploy the epidemic prevention and control and safeguard people's livelihood at the same time, publish and monitor the smooth running of the people's livelihood hotline, regularly check the potential dangers in the supply and price of basic life necessities, and timely solve and actively respond to the outstanding problems reflected by the masses.

translation.zh: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
translation.en: According to the notice, the port cities mentioned include counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (areas, prefectures, leagues) and municipalities directly under the central government where the open land, water and air ports are located, and specific scope shall be determined and timely announced by the provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the central government) according to the demand of epidemic prevention and control.
translation.source: 根据通知，其中所指的口岸城市包括开放的陆路、水路、航空口岸所在县（市、区、旗 ） 、 所在市（地、州、盟）及所在直辖市，具体范围由各省（自治区、直辖市）根据疫情防控需要确定并及时公告。
translation.medium: According to the notice, the "border city" referred to includes the open land, water, and air ports of the specified counties (cities, districts, banners), as well as the counties (cities, regions, banners), and the cities (autonomous regions, municipalities) where they are located. The specific scope shall be determined by each province (autonomous region, municipality) based on the epidemic prevention and control needs and announced in a timely manner.
translation.reference: According to the notice, the port cities mentioned include counties (cities, districts, banners), cities (areas, prefectures, leagues) and municipalities directly under the central government where the open land, water and air ports are located, and specific scope shall be determined and timely announced by the provinces (autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the central government) according to the demand of epidemic prevention and control.

translation.zh: 颜色：如图色（拍摄色差避免不了，实物最接近的颜色会说明，外拍光线會造成衣物颜色变亮，颜色问题购买前请提前咨询）
translation.en: Color: as shown in the picture (color difference is inevitable in the photos; the color closest to the clothes will be specified; outdoor shooting may cause the color of clothes to be lighter; please consult us if you have questions about colors before placing an order)
translation.source: 颜色：如图色（拍摄色差避免不了，实物最接近的颜色会说明，外拍光线會造成衣物颜色变亮，颜色问题购买前请提前咨询）
translation.medium: Color: As shown in the picture (please note that the shooting color may cause color difference, and the real color of the item will be the closest to the color shown in the picture. The color of the item may change due to external lighting when taking pictures, and there may be color difference problems when purchasing. Please consult in advance before purchasing.)
translation.reference: Color: as shown in the picture (color difference is inevitable in the photos; the color closest to the clothes will be specified; outdoor shooting may cause the color of clothes to be lighter; please consult us if you have questions about colors before placing an order)

translation.zh: 此品为古着，第一次购买古着者请百度“vintage”或“古着”词条。
translation.en: These are vintage clothes; please search “vintage” on Baidu if you have never bought vintage clothes before.
translation.source: 此品为古着，第一次购买古着者请百度“vintage”或“古着”词条。
translation.medium: This is a vintage item. For the first time purchasing a vintage item, please refer to the "vintage" or "antique" tags.
translation.reference: These are vintage clothes; please search “vintage” on Baidu if you have never bought vintage clothes before.

translation.zh: 孤品。
translation.en: One of a kind.
translation.source: 孤品。
translation.medium: Lonely.
translation.reference: One of a kind.

translation.zh: 古着单品难免微小瑕疵，所以您如果决定购买古着类产品就有这方面的心里准备，如果您是完美主义者慎拍，较为明显的瑕疵我就会进行说明，这是古着产品存在的特性，个人认为好东西也不在乎那一点点小小的影响！
translation.en: Tiny flaws are inevitable for one-of-a-kind vintage items, so make sure you are prepared for them if you decide to purchase vintage products, and please be cautious when you place an order if you are a perfectionist; I’ll explain about obvious flaws, which are the characteristics of vintage products; in my opinion, good items are not impacted by tiny flaws!
translation.source: 古着单品难免微小瑕疵，所以您如果决定购买古着类产品就有这方面的心里准备，如果您是完美主义者慎拍，较为明显的瑕疵我就会进行说明，这是古着产品存在的特性，个人认为好东西也不在乎那一点点小小的影响！
translation.medium: Antiques are inevitably accompanied by some minor flaws, so if you decide to buy antique products, you should have this in mind. If you are a perfectionist, I will explain the more obvious flaws. This is a characteristic of antique products, and I believe that a good thing is not affected by a few minor details!
translation.reference: Tiny flaws are inevitable for one-of-a-kind vintage items, so make sure you are prepared for them if you decide to purchase vintage products, and please be cautious when you place an order if you are a perfectionist; I’ll explain about obvious flaws, which are the characteristics of vintage products; in my opinion, good items are not impacted by tiny flaws!

translation.zh: 店里古着产品是不接受退换。
translation.en: The vintage products in the store cannot be exchanged or refunded.
translation.source: 店里古着产品是不接受退换。
translation.medium: The products in the store are not eligible for return or exchange.
translation.reference: The vintage products in the store cannot be exchanged or refunded.

translation.zh: 所谓古着，vintage，设计都会带有年代的复古感，也就是怀旧，之所以喜欢古着也是喜欢它的岁月感，和它的质感！
translation.en: The design of so-called vintage products has a sense of vintage, also known as nostalgia; people who are keen on vintage products love the sense of time and the sense of texture!
translation.source: 所谓古着，vintage，设计都会带有年代的复古感，也就是怀旧，之所以喜欢古着也是喜欢它的岁月感，和它的质感！
translation.medium: The term "vintage" or "retro" refers to a design that carries the flavor of a certain era, which is also known as nostalgia. This is why people who like vintage clothing also like its age and quality!
translation.reference: The design of so-called vintage products has a sense of vintage, also known as nostalgia; people who are keen on vintage products love the sense of time and the sense of texture!

translation.zh: 所以个别驾驭不了的姑娘不要说衣服老气，只能说你不适合！
translation.en: For this reason, some girls who cannot handle the style shall not describe the clothes as old-fashioned, because they are just not suitable for you!
translation.source: 所以个别驾驭不了的姑娘不要说衣服老气，只能说你不适合！
translation.medium: So if you can't control your temper, don't say that the clothes are old-fashioned. You can only say that you're not suitable for it.
translation.reference: For this reason, some girls who cannot handle the style shall not describe the clothes as old-fashioned, because they are just not suitable for you!

translation.zh: 没有一丁点儿抗风险能力的慎买，网购有风险，购物需谨慎。
translation.en: Buyers who have totally no risk resistance capacity shall be cautious before buying; online shopping is risky, and be cautious please.
translation.source: 没有一丁点儿抗风险能力的慎买，网购有风险，购物需谨慎。
translation.medium: There is no point in being cautious when shopping online, as there are risks involved. It is important to be careful when shopping online.
translation.reference: Buyers who have totally no risk resistance capacity shall be cautious before buying; online shopping is risky, and be cautious please.

translation.zh: 如物品因买家自身不适合、不喜欢等原由 ，可找店主上架代转，一旦售出不退不换，做不到的勿拍，谢谢各位的配合！
translation.en: The seller can resell the product on behalf of the buyer if he/she intends to sell it due to reasons such as it is not suitable for the buyer or the buy doesn’t like it; no product in the shop can be exchanged or refunded once they are sold; thank you for your cooperation!
translation.source: 如物品因买家自身不适合、不喜欢等原由 ，可找店主上架代转，一旦售出不退不换，做不到的勿拍，谢谢各位的配合！
translation.medium: If the item is not suitable for the buyer due to personal reasons such as not liking it, it can be found on the shelf of the store owner. Once it is sold, it cannot be returned or exchanged, and please do not take photos of it. Thank you for your cooperation!
translation.reference: The seller can resell the product on behalf of the buyer if he/she intends to sell it due to reasons such as it is not suitable for the buyer or the buy doesn’t like it; no product in the shop can be exchanged or refunded once they are sold; thank you for your cooperation!

translation.en: June 11, 2021, some of the circled products have been sold.
translation.medium: Partially sold out on June 11, 2021.
translation.reference: June 11, 2021, some of the circled products have been sold.

translation.zh: 看好编号下单，古董物品售出不退不换。
translation.en: Please check the serial number before placing an order, and all products of the antique type cannot be exchanged or refunded once sold.
translation.source: 看好编号下单，古董物品售出不退不换。
translation.medium: Look good on the invoice, antique items are non-refundable and non-replaceable.
translation.reference: Please check the serial number before placing an order, and all products of the antique type cannot be exchanged or refunded once sold.

translation.zh: 购买须知
translation.en: Purchase Notes
translation.source: 购买须知
translation.medium: Buying Must-Know
translation.reference: Purchase Notes

translation.zh: 本店出售的商品一律不退换
translation.en: All products sold from the store cannot be exchanged or refunded.
translation.source: 本店出售的商品一律不退换
translation.medium: All products sold in this store are non-refundable and non-returnable.
translation.reference: All products sold from the store cannot be exchanged or refunded.

translation.zh: 请花几钟看看购买须知
translation.en: Please take a few minutes to read the Purchase Notes.
translation.source: 请花几钟看看购买须知
translation.medium: Please spend a few minutes to read the purchase must-know.
translation.reference: Please take a few minutes to read the Purchase Notes.

translation.zh: 本店东西均以实物拍摄部分商品可能会因显示器和光线等问题存在一点色差，不接受任何色差的请看清这条，考虑清楚再购买，色差问题 不作为中差评和退换货的理由
translation.en: Photos were taken for all the products in the store, and there may be color differences due to factors such as differences of displayer and light; buyers who can’t accept any color differences please read this part and carefully think about it before placing an order, and the problem of color difference is not a reason for medium or negative review, or exchanging or refunding of products.
translation.source: 本店东西均以实物拍摄部分商品可能会因显示器和光线等问题存在一点色差，不接受任何色差的请看清这条，考虑清楚再购买，色差问题 不作为中差评和退换货的理由
translation.medium: The store's products are photographed in real life, and there may be some color differences due to the display screen and lighting issues. Please note that color differences are not accepted as reasons for returns or exchanges. Consider carefully before purchasing, and color differences are not considered as a basis for poor reviews or refunds.
translation.reference: Photos were taken for all the products in the store, and there may be color differences due to factors such as differences of displayer and light; buyers who can’t accept any color differences please read this part and carefully think about it before placing an order, and the problem of color difference is not a reason for medium or negative review, or exchanging or refunding of products.

translation.zh: 本店不接受与想像中的不一样，款式风格不合为理作为退换和中差评的理由，
translation.en: We do not accept exchange or refunding or medium or negative reviews due to the product received being different from what you imagined or the style is not suitable for you,
translation.source: 本店不接受与想像中的不一样，款式风格不合为理作为退换和中差评的理由，
translation.medium: This store does not accept differences with the imagination, and the style is not suitable as a reason for return or exchange.
translation.reference: We do not accept exchange or refunding or medium or negative reviews due to the product received being different from what you imagined or the style is not suitable for you,

translation.zh: 尺码都是实物平铺量取的，误差肯定存在，但我们辛苦量的相信误差已经很小了,如果亲收到尺码不合适，也是不能退换的，所以之前一定要考虑清楚。
translation.en: The size of all the products in the store were measured while being laid flat, so there must be error; we have tried our best to reduce the error; if the clothes you receive are not in your size, you cannot exchange or refund it, so please think carefully before placing the order.
translation.source: 尺码都是实物平铺量取的，误差肯定存在，但我们辛苦量的相信误差已经很小了,如果亲收到尺码不合适，也是不能退换的，所以之前一定要考虑清楚。
translation.medium: The measurements of all the clothes are taken from real garments, so there will definitely be some error. However, we have worked hard to minimize the error as much as possible. If you receive clothes that do not fit, it is not possible to return or exchange them, so please make sure to consider this carefully before ordering.
translation.reference: The size of all the products in the store were measured while being laid flat, so there must be error; we have tried our best to reduce the error; if the clothes you receive are not in your size, you cannot exchange or refund it, so please think carefully before placing the order.

translation.zh: 亲有什么问题请马上联系我，我一定会用心解决，如出现恶意差评我一律投诉到底，
translation.en: Please contact me immediately if you have any problem, and I’ll try my best to solve it; I’ll definitely complain about vicious negative comments,
translation.source: 亲有什么问题请马上联系我，我一定会用心解决，如出现恶意差评我一律投诉到底，
translation.medium: If you have any questions, please contact me immediately. I will definitely solve them with heart, and if there is any malicious evaluation, I will report it to the end.
translation.reference: Please contact me immediately if you have any problem, and I’ll try my best to solve it; I’ll definitely complain about vicious negative comments,

translation.zh: 每样东西发出前 我们会仔细检查的，质量不会有问题。
translation.en: We will check each product carefully before we dispatch it to ensure there’s no quality problem.
translation.source: 每样东西发出前 我们会仔细检查的，质量不会有问题。
translation.medium: For every item that is shipped out, we will carefully inspect it to ensure that the quality is not compromised.
translation.reference: We will check each product carefully before we dispatch it to ensure there’s no quality problem.

translation.zh: 收到衣物后请在48小时内确认收货并给于评价，亲们要体谅我们的辛苦。
translation.en: Please confirm receipt within 48 hours after receiving the clothes and give us reviews; please take our efforts into consideration.
translation.source: 收到衣物后请在48小时内确认收货并给于评价，亲们要体谅我们的辛苦。
translation.medium: Please confirm receipt of the item within 48 hours after receiving it, and give us a rating. Our hard work is appreciated by you.
translation.reference: Please confirm receipt within 48 hours after receiving the clothes and give us reviews; please take our efforts into consideration.

translation.zh: 油管视频起底美军20年嗜血杀戮真相-新华网
translation.en: YouTube video uncovers the truth of US army’s bloodthirsty killing of 20 years - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 油管视频起底美军20年嗜血杀戮真相-新华网
translation.medium: Oil pipeline video exposes US military's 20-year bloodthirsty killing spree - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: YouTube video uncovers the truth of US army’s bloodthirsty killing of 20 years - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: （视频来源：油管）
translation.en: (source of video: YouTube)
translation.source: （视频来源：油管）
translation.medium: (Video source: oil pipe)
translation.reference: (source of video: YouTube)

translation.zh: 12月11日，油管平台一条名为《杀戮机器》的微纪录片引起广泛关注。
translation.en: On December 11, a short documentary named Killing Machine went viral on YouTube.
translation.source: 12月11日，油管平台一条名为《杀戮机器》的微纪录片引起广泛关注。
translation.medium: On December 11th, a micro-documentary named "Killer Machine" was posted on the oil pipeline platform, attracting widespread attention.
translation.reference: On December 11, a short documentary named Killing Machine went viral on YouTube.

translation.zh: 该片讲述了美国以“反恐”为名发动阿富汗战争，通过战争强行输出美式民主，20年穷兵黩武、嗜血成性、滥杀无辜，犯下种种反人类罪行。
translation.en: The documentary tells of various kinds of antihuman crimes committed by the US, including launching the war against Afghanistan in the name of “anti-terrorism”, outputting American democracy forcefully via wars, exhausting its resources to build up its military power, being obsessive about bloodthirsty killing, and massacring the innocent at will for 20 years.
translation.source: 该片讲述了美国以“反恐”为名发动阿富汗战争，通过战争强行输出美式民主，20年穷兵黩武、嗜血成性、滥杀无辜，犯下种种反人类罪行。
translation.medium: The film tells the story of how the United States, under the guise of fighting terrorism, launched a war in Afghanistan, and through the war, forced the export of American-style democracy. After 20 years of poverty, brutality, bloodlust, and murder of the innocent, the United States has committed countless crimes against humanity.
translation.reference: The documentary tells of various kinds of antihuman crimes committed by the US, including launching the war against Afghanistan in the name of “anti-terrorism”, outputting American democracy forcefully via wars, exhausting its resources to build up its military power, being obsessive about bloodthirsty killing, and massacring the innocent at will for 20 years.

translation.zh: 滥用无人机空袭医院、学校等民用场所，扭曲人性，成立杀人小组。
translation.en: The US army launched air strikes to civil places such as hospitals and schools by abusing UAV, and established killing squad with distorting human nature.
translation.source: 滥用无人机空袭医院、学校等民用场所，扭曲人性，成立杀人小组。
translation.medium: Use drones to bomb hospitals, schools, and other civilian facilities, twist human nature, and form a murderous group.
translation.reference: The US army launched air strikes to civil places such as hospitals and schools by abusing UAV, and established killing squad with distorting human nature.

translation.zh: 20年来，美军杀害了数万阿富汗无辜平民。
translation.en: The US army has killed dozens of thousands of innocent Afghanistan civilians for 20 years.
translation.source: 20年来，美军杀害了数万阿富汗无辜平民。
translation.medium: For the past 20 years, the US military has killed tens of thousands of innocent Afghans.
translation.reference: The US army has killed dozens of thousands of innocent Afghanistan civilians for 20 years.

translation.zh: 美军设“黑狱”对“嫌犯”施加种种酷刑、人身羞辱。
translation.en: The US army set up “black prison” to apply various cruel tortures and personal humiliation to “suspects”.
translation.source: 美军设“黑狱”对“嫌犯”施加种种酷刑、人身羞辱。
translation.medium: The US military has set up a "black jail" to subject "suspects" to various forms of torture and humiliation.
translation.reference: The US army set up “black prison” to apply various cruel tortures and personal humiliation to “suspects”.

translation.zh: 一桩桩反人类罪行激起更多阿富汗人的仇恨。
translation.en: Countless antihuman crimes stirred up hatred from even more Afghan civilians.
translation.source: 一桩桩反人类罪行激起更多阿富汗人的仇恨。
translation.medium: The increasing number of anti-human crimes in Afghanistan arouses more hatred among the Afghans.
translation.reference: Countless antihuman crimes stirred up hatred from even more Afghan civilians.

translation.zh: 正如视频所说，美式“反恐”战争“越反越恐 ” 。
translation.en: Just as what the video says, American anti-terrorism war “is creating more terrorism”.
translation.source: 正如视频所说，美式“反恐”战争“越反越恐 ” 。
translation.medium: As the video says, the "anti-terrorism" war in the United States is "getting worse and more terrifying."
translation.reference: Just as what the video says, American anti-terrorism war “is creating more terrorism”.

translation.zh: 战争没有给阿富汗人民带去和平民主、繁荣希望，带去的只有满目疮痍的国家和无数的杀戮破坏。
translation.en: The war did not bring peacefulness, democracy, prosperity or hope to Afghan people; instead, they threw the country in a state of devastation and countless killing and destruction.
translation.source: 战争没有给阿富汗人民带去和平民主、繁荣希望，带去的只有满目疮痍的国家和无数的杀戮破坏。
translation.medium: War has not brought peace, democracy, prosperity, and hope to the Afghan people. It has only brought destruction and suffering.
translation.reference: The war did not bring peacefulness, democracy, prosperity or hope to Afghan people; instead, they threw the country in a state of devastation and countless killing and destruction.

translation.zh: 戳视频，让我们一起来揭穿美国以“反恐”为名，嗜血杀戮的真相，戳穿美式民主的虚伪假面！
translation.en: Let us click on the video and reveal the truth of bloodthirsty killing in the name of “anti-terrorism” of the US, and rip off the false mask of American democracy!
translation.source: 戳视频，让我们一起来揭穿美国以“反恐”为名，嗜血杀戮的真相，戳穿美式民主的虚伪假面！
translation.medium: Stab the video, let's expose the truth behind America's "anti-terrorism" bloodbath, and pierce through the hypocrisy of American democracy!
translation.reference: Let us click on the video and reveal the truth of bloodthirsty killing in the name of “anti-terrorism” of the US, and rip off the false mask of American democracy!

translation.zh: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
translation.en: I came across the following article, which talks about why this customer wants the logistics company in the bonded area to help with canning from the perspective of business and shelf life; although canning is deep processing and is not within the business scope of the bonded logistics company, the following text perhaps can explain why the customer wants to do this.
translation.source: 无意中看到如下一篇文章，从商业的角度以及保存期的角度谈为什么这个客户要保税区里面的物流公司帮做罐装，虽然罐装属于深加工，不属于保税物流公司的经营范围，这里如下这篇文字也许可以解释 为什么客户想要这么做？
translation.medium: I accidentally saw the following article, from the perspective of business and storage period, why this customer wants to have a packaging company in the bonded area. Although packaging belongs to deep processing and does not belong to the scope of operation of the bonded logistics company, here is the text of the article that may explain why the customer wants to do this.
translation.reference: I came across the following article, which talks about why this customer wants the logistics company in the bonded area to help with canning from the perspective of business and shelf life; although canning is deep processing and is not within the business scope of the bonded logistics company, the following text perhaps can explain why the customer wants to do this.

translation.zh: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
translation.en: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and gained contact with many production lines of milk powder.
translation.source: 我去很多奶粉的厂家，接触很多奶粉的生产线。
translation.medium: I have visited many dairy factories and seen many dairy production lines.
translation.reference: I have visited many milk powder manufacturers and gained contact with many production lines of milk powder.

translation.zh: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
translation.en: Actually, the raw materials of milk powder in bags and in cans are exactly the same.
translation.source: 其实袋装跟听装的奶粉它们的原材料是一模一样的，没有任何区别的。
translation.medium: In fact, the ingredients of the baby formula in a pouch and a can are the same, there is no difference between them.
translation.reference: Actually, the raw materials of milk powder in bags and in cans are exactly the same.

translation.zh: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
translation.en: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of milk powder one year in bags and two years or longer in cans?
translation.source: 那么大家肯定会问：为什么袋装保质期是一年，而听装的保质期是两年或更长呢？
translation.medium: So everyone will definitely ask: Why is the warranty period for bags one year, while the warranty period for hearing aids is two years or even longer?
translation.reference: Then you may ask: why is the shelf life of milk powder one year in bags and two years or longer in cans?

translation.zh: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
translation.en: Or you may ask: why are the prices of bagged and canned milk powder so different?
translation.source: 或者又问：听装与袋装的价格为什么差价这么大呢？
translation.medium: Or again, I ask: Why is the price difference between hearing aids and pouches so large?
translation.reference: Or you may ask: why are the prices of bagged and canned milk powder so different?

translation.zh: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
translation.en: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers or mothers think that the quality will be much better because the raw materials are different.
translation.source: 其实从这点出发很多消费者，或者妈妈级的认为这是因为原材料不一样所以质量上会好很多。
translation.medium: Actually, many consumers believe that the quality is better because the raw materials are different.
translation.reference: Actually, from this point of view, many consumers or mothers think that the quality will be much better because the raw materials are different.

translation.zh: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
translation.en: Actually, the raw materials are the same, and people just think the goods are more expensive because they are better.
translation.source: 其实原材料一样，只是大家认为贵的就是好的。
translation.medium: In fact, the original materials are the same, it's just that everyone thinks that your's is better.
translation.reference: Actually, the raw materials are the same, and people just think the goods are more expensive because they are better.

translation.zh: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
translation.en: There are also customers in this mindset who say that the taste is indeed different after drinking it!
translation.source: 也有消费者出于这种心态吃了后反应还说听装的口感或味道就是不一样！
translation.medium: There are also consumers who, due to this mentality, eat it afterward and say that the taste or aroma is different!
translation.reference: There are also customers in this mindset who say that the taste is indeed different after drinking it!

translation.zh: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
translation.en: Now I will introduce why the canned ones are expensive.
translation.source: 现在我跟大家先说一下听装贵的原因，贵在哪里？
translation.medium: Now I'll tell everyone the reason why we're so expensive, where is the luxury?
translation.reference: Now I will introduce why the canned ones are expensive.

translation.zh: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
translation.en: Why are the prices so different when the raw materials are the same?
translation.source: 它们的原材料相同为何差价如此之大呢？
translation.medium: Why is the price difference so great when their raw materials are the same?
translation.reference: Why are the prices so different when the raw materials are the same?

translation.zh: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
translation.en: When the manufacturers set the price, they know that if they price too high, it is difficult for the customers to accept and the profits will be very low for the manufacturers or there will be no profit at all; then what will the manufacturers live on?
translation.source: 因为厂家在定价的时候大多数都考虑到如果袋装定价太高，消费者很难去接受，这就意味着厂家产生的利润很低，或者说没有利润，那厂家靠什么去生存呢？
translation.medium: Because when the factory is pricing, most of them consider that if the packaging price is too high, consumers will find it difficult to accept, which means that the factory's profit is very low, or even no profit, then how does the factory survive?
translation.reference: When the manufacturers set the price, they know that if they price too high, it is difficult for the customers to accept and the profits will be very low for the manufacturers or there will be no profit at all; then what will the manufacturers live on?

translation.zh: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
translation.en: Therefore, in the price setting of the canned ones, they set it much higher to guarantee their profits.
translation.source: 所以他们在听装的定价上，有了一个很大的上升幅度来保障他们的利润空间。
translation.medium: Therefore, in terms of pricing, they have a very large upward price range to ensure their profit space.
translation.reference: Therefore, in the price setting of the canned ones, they set it much higher to guarantee their profits.

translation.zh: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
translation.en: As a result, many manufacturers recommend canned ones instead of bagged ones.
translation.source: 因此大多数厂家主推的是听装，而不是袋装。
translation.medium: Therefore, most factories recommend hearing protection, rather than earplugs.
translation.reference: As a result, many manufacturers recommend canned ones instead of bagged ones.

translation.zh: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
translation.en: Just think about where the tens of millions or even hundreds of millions yuan advertising fee of the manufacturers come from every year.
translation.source: 还有你想那么多的厂家每年的广告费都要几千万甚至是几个亿，这个费用何来？
translation.medium: There are many factories that you want to advertise every year, and the advertising fees are several hundred million or even several billion. Where is this money from?
translation.reference: Just think about where the tens of millions or even hundreds of millions yuan advertising fee of the manufacturers come from every year.

translation.zh: 大家可想而知。
translation.en: Everyone knows it.
translation.source: 大家可想而知。
translation.medium: Everyone can think and know.
translation.reference: Everyone knows it.

translation.zh: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
translation.en: With the development of society, the market promotion expenses kept increasing, such as the cost of promotion personnel at shopping malls, the display expenses of products at shopping malls, the cost of gifts of products, advertising expenses, etc.
translation.source: 那么随着社会的发展，市场的推广费用，比如说：商场的促销人员、商场的陈列费用、产品的赠品费用、广告费用等也在不断的增加。
translation.medium: So as society develops, the promotion costs for the market, such as the cost of promotional personnel in the shopping mall, the cost of display in the shopping mall, the cost of gifts for products, and advertising costs, are constantly increasing.
translation.reference: With the development of society, the market promotion expenses kept increasing, such as the cost of promotion personnel at shopping malls, the display expenses of products at shopping malls, the cost of gifts of products, advertising expenses, etc.

translation.zh: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
translation.en: Therefore, various manufacturers are also constantly adding new products in can packaging, and the price kept rising as well; in fact, these new product are introduced due to the increase of market costs.
translation.source: 所以各个厂家也在不断地增加新品，而且是听装，其价格也是不断地上涨，其实这是随着市场费用的增加而出的新品。
translation.medium: Therefore, each factory is constantly increasing the number of new products, and they are all custom-made. The prices of these new products are also constantly rising, in fact, this is due to the increase in market costs.
translation.reference: Therefore, various manufacturers are also constantly adding new products in can packaging, and the price kept rising as well; in fact, these new product are introduced due to the increase of market costs.

translation.zh: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
translation.en: The main objective is to gain more profits; the increased cost of raw materials is actually no more than 3 or 4 yuan.
translation.source: 主要目的是为了获取更高的利润，其实他们的原材料增加的成本最多不会超过3、4元钱。
translation.medium: The main purpose is to obtain higher profits. In fact, the cost of their raw materials increased by a few cents at most.
translation.reference: The main objective is to gain more profits; the increased cost of raw materials is actually no more than 3 or 4 yuan.

translation.zh: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
translation.en: There are also some brands that, in order to promote their products, cooperate with doctors in the hospital by all means, and ask them to assist in the promotion of products, drawing profits ranging from 30 yuan to 80 yuan from one can.
translation.source: 还有一部分品牌，为了推广自己的产品，不择手段，跟医院的医生挂钩，由他们协助产品的推广，从一听里面抽成30元到80元不等的利润。
translation.medium: There is another part of the brand that, in order to promote their products, will stop at nothing and hook up with doctors in hospitals, relying on them to help promote the products, from taking one pill to earning 30 yuan to 80 yuan or more in profit.
translation.reference: There are also some brands that, in order to promote their products, cooperate with doctors in the hospital by all means, and ask them to assist in the promotion of products, drawing profits ranging from 30 yuan to 80 yuan from one can.

translation.zh: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
translation.en: China’s relevant laws by no means allow such operations because this practice is in fact harming consumers.
translation.source: 而中国的相关法律是绝对不允许这样的操作方式方法的，其实这种做法是在坑害消费者。
translation.medium: And in China, relevant laws and regulations absolutely prohibit such operation methods, in fact, this kind of behavior is harmful to consumers.
translation.reference: China’s relevant laws by no means allow such operations because this practice is in fact harming consumers.

translation.zh: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
translation.en: It is recommended that you buy bagged milk powder and put it into cans if you have cans at home, which can save money and increase the preservation time and hermetic seal of milk powder; it won’t have any influence on the children.
translation.source: 建议大家在家里有罐的前提下买袋装的奶粉装入罐中，这样可以节省费用，而增加奶粉的保存性和密封性，对小孩子也没有任何影响。
translation.medium: It is recommended to buy powdered milk in bags and store it in containers at home, which can save costs and improve the storage and sealing of the milk powder. It has no impact on children.
translation.reference: It is recommended that you buy bagged milk powder and put it into cans if you have cans at home, which can save money and increase the preservation time and hermetic seal of milk powder; it won’t have any influence on the children.

translation.zh: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
translation.en: Also, don’t think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones; the shelf life of canned ones is the same as that of bagged ones after unpacked; it’s just that bagged ones are not easy to be preserved and are easy to become damp and deteriorate.
translation.source: 还有大家不要认为听装的保质期就比袋装长，如果在开包以后听装与袋装的保质期是一样的，只是说袋装开包以后不容易保存，容易受潮变质。
translation.medium: Don't think that the shelf life of packaged food is longer than that of unpackaged food just because it's packaged. If the shelf life of packaged food and unpackaged food is the same after opening, it's just that packaged food is more difficult to preserve after opening and is more prone to changes in quality due to moisture.
translation.reference: Also, don’t think that the shelf life of canned ones is longer than that of bagged ones; the shelf life of canned ones is the same as that of bagged ones after unpacked; it’s just that bagged ones are not easy to be preserved and are easy to become damp and deteriorate.

translation.zh: 送餐迟了，食物都凉了，凉了后又干又硬，完全没办法吃
translation.en: The delivery was late, and after the food got cold, it was dry and hard, completely inedible.
translation.source: 送餐迟了，食物都凉了，凉了后又干又硬，完全没办法吃
translation.medium: The food delivery is late, and the food is all cold. After it cools down, it becomes dry and hard, and there is no way to eat it.
translation.reference: The delivery was late, and after the food got cold, it was dry and hard, completely inedible.

translation.zh: 而且汤汁还洒了出来
translation.en: Also the soup was spilled.
translation.source: 而且汤汁还洒了出来
translation.medium: And the soup spilled out of the bowl.
translation.reference: Also the soup was spilled.

translation.zh: 立即取消，他 #PRS_ORG# 补送来的东西肯定都凉了
translation.en: Cancel it immediately, the stuff he #PRS_ORG# resends here must be cold.
translation.source: 立即取消，他 #PRS_ORG# 补送来的东西肯定都凉了
translation.medium: Cancel immediately. The PRS_ORG-sponsored items must have cooled off by now.
translation.reference: Cancel it immediately, the stuff he #PRS_ORG# resends here must be cold.

translation.zh: 我没拿过！
translation.en: I didn’t take it!
translation.source: 我没拿过！
translation.medium: I haven't touched it!
translation.reference: I didn’t take it!

translation.zh: #NAME# 说你们没有人去拿
translation.en: #NAME# said no one went to pick it up.
translation.source: #NAME# 说你们没有人去拿
translation.medium: #NAME# says you don't have anyone to take it.
translation.reference: #NAME# said no one went to pick it up.

translation.zh: 我们打电话过去了
translation.en: We called.
translation.source: 我们打电话过去了
translation.medium: We have already made a phone call.
translation.reference: We called.

translation.zh: 你不退款的话我就报警
translation.en: I’ll call the police if you don’t refund it.
translation.source: 你不退款的话我就报警
translation.medium: If you don't refund my money, I'll report you to the police.
translation.reference: I’ll call the police if you don’t refund it.

translation.zh: 多次用#PRS_ORG#，今天这次是最差的体验
translation.en: I’ve used #PRS_ORG# many times, and today I had the worst experience.
translation.source: 多次用#PRS_ORG#，今天这次是最差的体验
translation.medium: I have used #PRS\_ORG# multiple times, and today's experience was the worst.
translation.reference: I’ve used #PRS_ORG# many times, and today I had the worst experience.

translation.zh: 完全不能接受
translation.en: Totally unacceptable.
translation.source: 完全不能接受
translation.medium: Cannot accept completely
translation.reference: Totally unacceptable.

translation.zh: 好的，可以
translation.en: Okay, fine.
translation.source: 好的，可以
translation.medium: Sure, I can.
translation.reference: Okay, fine.

translation.zh: 但也要提醒餐厅及骑手
translation.en: But you need to remind the restaurant and delivery person.
translation.source: 但也要提醒餐厅及骑手
translation.medium: But also remind the restaurant and the driver.
translation.reference: But you need to remind the restaurant and delivery person.

translation.zh: 避免下次再发生
translation.en: To prevent it from happening again.
translation.source: 避免下次再发生
translation.medium: Avoid repeating next time.
translation.reference: To prevent it from happening again.

translation.zh: 我想知道确切的送餐时间
translation.en: I want to know the exact delivery time.
translation.source: 我想知道确切的送餐时间
translation.medium: I want to know the exact delivery time.
translation.reference: I want to know the exact delivery time.

translation.zh: 那个时间不断延迟
translation.en: The time kept being put off.
translation.source: 那个时间不断延迟
translation.medium: The time keeps delaying
translation.reference: The time kept being put off.

translation.zh: 不知道要等到什么时候
translation.en: I don’t know how much longer do I have to wait.
translation.source: 不知道要等到什么时候
translation.medium: Don't know when to wait.
translation.reference: I don’t know how much longer do I have to wait.

translation.zh: 如果取消订单，可不可以退回钱款
translation.en: If I cancel the order, can I get the money back?
translation.source: 如果取消订单，可不可以退回钱款
translation.medium: Can I get a refund if I cancel the order?
translation.reference: If I cancel the order, can I get the money back?

translation.zh: 想向骑手支付服务费，怎么给？
translation.en: I want to pay service fee to the delivery person, how can I do it?
translation.source: 想向骑手支付服务费，怎么给？
translation.medium: How do I pay for the rideshare service fee in Chinese?
translation.reference: I want to pay service fee to the delivery person, how can I do it?

translation.zh: 一个多小时前已确认有一名骑手
translation.en: It was confirmed more than an hour ago that there was a delivery person.
translation.source: 一个多小时前已确认有一名骑手
translation.medium: A flight attendant has been confirmed for a flight that will take place in a few hours.
translation.reference: It was confirmed more than an hour ago that there was a delivery person.

translation.zh: 不愿再等待了
translation.en: Not willing to wait any longer.
translation.source: 不愿再等待了
translation.medium: I can't wait any longer.
translation.reference: Not willing to wait any longer.

translation.zh: 不要把人吓倒在起跑线-新华网
translation.en: Don’t scare people off at the starting line - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 不要把人吓倒在起跑线-新华网
translation.medium: Don't push people onto the starting line - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Don’t scare people off at the starting line - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
translation.en: We can usually feel the popularity of books on success when we go to bookstores.
translation.source: 逛书市时，往往能感受到成功学类书籍的火爆。
translation.medium: When browsing bookstores, you often feel the booming fire of success books.
translation.reference: We can usually feel the popularity of books on success when we go to bookstores.

translation.zh: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
translation.en: Many books on success nowadays advocate the “best principle”, which first assumes or implies that you can “do it”, and then tell you “what it is” that you need to do.
translation.source: 现今的成功学书籍，很多宣扬的都是“最好原则 ” — —即先假定或暗示你能“做到 ” ， 然后再告诉你需要做到的事情“是什么 ” 。
translation.medium: Many successful self-help books today claim to be based on the "best principles" - that is, they first assume or imply that you can "do it" and then tell you what you need to do to achieve success.
translation.reference: Many books on success nowadays advocate the “best principle”, which first assumes or implies that you can “do it”, and then tell you “what it is” that you need to do.

translation.zh: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
translation.en: It skips the most important and fundamental link of “how to do it”.
translation.source: 等于说一下子越过了“如何做到”这个其实最重要、最根本的环节。
translation.medium: Equivalent to saying that one has actually gone beyond the "how to do it" phase, which is actually the most important and fundamental part.
translation.reference: It skips the most important and fundamental link of “how to do it”.

translation.zh: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
translation.en: As such, these books have one common characteristic; you either work to be the best or do nothing at all; you either be 100 or be 0; you either climb on Mount Tai or stay where you are.
translation.source: 正因如此，这些书都有一个共同的特点 — — 要么就一鼓作气地干到最好，要么就干脆什么也别干；要么就是100，要么就是0；要么你就登泰山，要么你就干脆在原地待着。
translation.medium: Therefore, these books all have a common characteristic - either they are done to perfection or they are completely worthless; either they are 100, or they are 0; either you climb to the top of the mountain, or you simply wait at the bottom.
translation.reference: As such, these books have one common characteristic; you either work to be the best or do nothing at all; you either be 100 or be 0; you either climb on Mount Tai or stay where you are.

translation.zh: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
translation.en: The “best principle” will make every reader believe it is “absolutely right”, but 99% of people will be scared off at the starting line.
translation.source: 这种“最好原则 ” ， 让谁看都会承认“正确无比 ” ， 但是99%的人都会被吓倒在起跑线前。
translation.medium: This "best principle" makes everyone recognize its "correctness beyond measure", but 99% of people will be knocked down at the starting line.
translation.reference: The “best principle” will make every reader believe it is “absolutely right”, but 99% of people will be scared off at the starting line.

translation.zh: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
translation.en: Because this theory advocates a route in which “you have to be resolute to start again and change 180 degrees”, and this happens to be the weakest point of many people.
translation.source: 因为这种理论鼓吹的是一种“你要痛下决心，重新做人，来个180度的大转变”的路径，而这恰恰是很多人的致命弱项。
translation.medium: Because this theory advocates a path of "you need to make a firm decision, undergo a 180-degree transformation, and start over," which is the fatal weakness of many people.
translation.reference: Because this theory advocates a route in which “you have to be resolute to start again and change 180 degrees”, and this happens to be the weakest point of many people.

translation.zh: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
translation.en: Shouting “you need to change” to people who stick to the rules, follow the old ways, and refuse to change is lying to yourself and casting pearls before swine.
translation.source: 对于墨守成规、因循守旧、拒绝变化的人，你偏偏要在他的耳旁大喊“你要转变 ” ， 无疑是自欺欺人、对牛弹琴之举。
translation.medium: For those who are rigid in adhering to tradition, sticking to the old ways, and resisting change, you insist on shouting "you need to transform" in their ears, which is undoubtedly self-deception and ridiculing oneself.
translation.reference: Shouting “you need to change” to people who stick to the rules, follow the old ways, and refuse to change is lying to yourself and casting pearls before swine.

translation.zh: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
translation.en: The majority of people will be timid in front of “change”, reluctant to move forward or make the decision; or, they have made the decision to “change” on an impulse and bravely taken the first step, but it doesn’t last long and they will lose courage after persevering for while; they cannot be persistent.
translation.source: 绝大多数人都会在“转变”两字面前露怯，裹足不前，难下决心；又或者凭着一时的冲动痛下了“转变”之决心，并勇敢地迈出了第一步，但往往是好景不长，坚持不了多一会儿就败下阵来，难见持续性。
translation.medium: Most people will be intimidated by the word "transformation" and will not dare to take the first step, or they will make a rash decision based on a temporary impulse and take the first step boldly, but it is difficult to maintain it for a long time.
translation.reference: The majority of people will be timid in front of “change”, reluctant to move forward or make the decision; or, they have made the decision to “change” on an impulse and bravely taken the first step, but it doesn’t last long and they will lose courage after persevering for while; they cannot be persistent.

translation.zh: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
translation.en: From Tomorrow On, the famous sketch from Mr. Ma Sanli, most vividly depicts the classic of “common humanity”.
translation.source: 马三立先生那段著名的《从明天开始》的相声，就是最传神地表现了这一“普遍人性”的经典。
translation.medium: The famous "From Tomorrow" song by Mr. Ma Sanli, which is widely regarded as a classic that vividly portrays the universal human nature.
translation.reference: From Tomorrow On, the famous sketch from Mr. Ma Sanli, most vividly depicts the classic of “common humanity”.

translation.zh: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
translation.en: The biggest problem of the “best principle” is the threshold is too high; it surpasses the limit of the ability of ordinary people and leave most people “sigh at the beginning”.
translation.source: “最好原则”的最大问题在于门槛太高，它往往超越了普通人的能力极限，让绝大多数人“望门兴叹 ” 。
translation.medium: The biggest problem with the "best practices" is that the threshold is too high, often exceeding the ability limit of ordinary people, making most people "look at the door in awe."
translation.reference: The biggest problem of the “best principle” is the threshold is too high; it surpasses the limit of the ability of ordinary people and leave most people “sigh at the beginning”.

translation.zh: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
translation.en: Or, the “second best principle” perhaps is a route for more ordinary people to be successful.
translation.source: 或许 ， “ 次好原则”才是一种有可能让更多普通人走上相对成功之路的途径。
translation.medium: Perhaps, "the second-best principle" is a path that can lead more ordinary people to a relatively successful life.
translation.reference: Or, the “second best principle” perhaps is a route for more ordinary people to be successful.

translation.zh: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
translation.en: The core of the “second best principle” is lowering the threshold; it encourages “accumulating small successes to have big success”; even if you cannot reach 100, you can be 1, because 1 is always bigger than 0; if you cannot climb on Mount Tai, you can climb on the small dune in front of your house, because that is still better than marching on the spot.
translation.source: “次好原则”的核心在于“降低门槛 ” — —它鼓励的是一种“积小胜为大胜”的理论，即如果做不到100，只做到1也行：因为1永远大于0；如果登不上泰山，只登上你家门口的小沙丘也行，因为那也总比原地踏步强。
translation.medium: The core of the "principle of the second-best" lies in "reducing thresholds" - it encourages a "small victory is better than none" theory, that is, if you can't do 100, doing 1 is okay: because 1 is always greater than 0; if you can't climb Mount Tai, just climb the small sand hill by your house, because that's still better than staying where you started.
translation.reference: The core of the “second best principle” is lowering the threshold; it encourages “accumulating small successes to have big success”; even if you cannot reach 100, you can be 1, because 1 is always bigger than 0; if you cannot climb on Mount Tai, you can climb on the small dune in front of your house, because that is still better than marching on the spot.

translation.zh: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
translation.en: Anyway, doing anything is better than doing nothing at all.
translation.source: 总之，只要你做了点什么，就总比不做强。
translation.medium: In summary, just do something, and it will be better than not doing anything.
translation.reference: Anyway, doing anything is better than doing nothing at all.

translation.zh: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
translation.en: Due to the dramatic lowering of the threshold, the possibility of ordinary people persevering with it is higher; the success rate will be higher for anything as long as you persevere,
translation.source: 由于门槛大幅度降低，因此就多了使普通人做到坚持的可能性，而凡事只要坚持，成功概率也会加大。
translation.medium: Because the threshold has been lowered significantly, it has increased the possibility for ordinary people to persevere, and as long as one perseveres, the success probability will also increase.
translation.reference: Due to the dramatic lowering of the threshold, the possibility of ordinary people persevering with it is higher; the success rate will be higher for anything as long as you persevere,

translation.zh: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
translation.en: It’s just that the journey will be longer if you follow the “second best principle”.
translation.source: 只不过遵循“次好原则”的成功之路，其路程略长一些而已。
translation.medium: The success path that follows the "second-best principle" is slightly longer than that of simply adhering to it.
translation.reference: It’s just that the journey will be longer if you follow the “second best principle”.

translation.zh: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
translation.en: In all, although the “best principle” on the surface claims to make everyone successful, it will eventually only encourage few people in actuality; the “second best principle” can effectively encourage more people and make more people actually gain benefit.
translation.source: 总而言之 ， “ 最好原则”尽管在表面上打着让所有人都成功的旗号，但它最终能够激励的，实际上还是少数；而“次好原则 ” ， 才能有效激励更多的人，尽可能地让更多人受益。
translation.medium: In summary, although "the best principle" may sound like a flag for everyone to succeed on the surface, it ultimately only motivates a small number of people. On the other hand, "the second-best principle" can effectively motivate more people, making it possible for more people to benefit as much as possible.
translation.reference: In all, although the “best principle” on the surface claims to make everyone successful, it will eventually only encourage few people in actuality; the “second best principle” can effectively encourage more people and make more people actually gain benefit.

translation.zh: 青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年增加0.71万吨-新华网
translation.en: The reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in the Qinghai Lake have increased by 7.1 thousand tons - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年增加0.71万吨-新华网
translation.medium: The resource reserves of Qinghai Lake have increased by 71,000 tons this year - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: The reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in the Qinghai Lake have increased by 7.1 thousand tons - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
translation.en: Report from Xinhua News Agency Xining on December 11 (Reporters Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters learned from the Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province that the latest monitoring results showed that the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources increased by 7,100 tons this year compared with the previous year, reaching 108,500 tons; there is a cumulative increase of more than 40 times compared with that in the initial stage of protection in 2002.
translation.source: 新华社西宁12月11日电（记者骆晓飞、张宏祥）记者从青海省农业农村厅获悉，最新监测结果显示，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量今年较上年增加0.71万吨,达到10.85万吨，与2002年保护初期相比，累计增长40余倍。
translation.medium: According to a report from Xinhua News Agency in Yining on December 11, a journalist from the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs in Qinghai Province learned that the latest monitoring results show that the resource storage capacity of Qinghai Lake has increased by 0.71 million tons this year, reaching 10.85 million tons. Compared with the initial protection period in 2002, the cumulative increase is more than 40 times.
translation.reference: Report from Xinhua News Agency Xining on December 11 (Reporters Luo Xiaofei, Zhang Hongxiang) Reporters learned from the Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province that the latest monitoring results showed that the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources increased by 7,100 tons this year compared with the previous year, reaching 108,500 tons; there is a cumulative increase of more than 40 times compared with that in the initial stage of protection in 2002.

translation.zh: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
translation.en: Gymnocypris przewalskii, commonly known as “scaleless carp”, is a unique and precious fish species in the Qinghai Lake, which plays an indispensable role in maintaining the safety and biodiversity of the “water, fish, bird” ecological chain in Qinghai Lake Basin.
translation.source: 青海湖裸鲤俗名“湟鱼 ” ， 是青海湖中特有的珍贵鱼种，对维系青海湖流域“水-鱼-鸟”生态链安全和生物多样性有着举足轻重的作用。
translation.medium: The Qinghai Lake carp, also known as the "Tibetan carp", is a rare and valuable fish species endemic to Qinghai Lake. It plays a crucial role in maintaining the safety and diversity of the "water-fish-bird" ecological chain in the Qinghai Lake watershed.
translation.reference: Gymnocypris przewalskii, commonly known as “scaleless carp”, is a unique and precious fish species in the Qinghai Lake, which plays an indispensable role in maintaining the safety and biodiversity of the “water, fish, bird” ecological chain in Qinghai Lake Basin.

translation.zh: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
translation.en: In the 1960s and 1970s, the number of gymnocypris przewalskii has decreased sharply due to the human hunting in vast quantities and the increasingly degraded environment of breeding waters of gymnocypris przewalskii, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in Qinghai Lake in 2002 were only 2,592 tons.
translation.source: 20世纪六七十年代，受人为大量捕杀、裸鲤繁殖水域环境日益退化等因素影响，青海湖裸鲤数量锐减，2002年青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量仅为2592吨。
translation.medium: In the 20th century, the 60s and 70s, the large-scale killing and overbreeding of Qinghai Lake carp led to the deterioration of the aquatic environment, resulting in a sharp decline in the number of Qinghai Lake carp. In 2002, the resource storage capacity of Qinghai Lake carp was only 2592 tons.
translation.reference: In the 1960s and 1970s, the number of gymnocypris przewalskii has decreased sharply due to the human hunting in vast quantities and the increasingly degraded environment of breeding waters of gymnocypris przewalskii, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources in Qinghai Lake in 2002 were only 2,592 tons.

translation.zh: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
translation.en: In 2004, gymnocypris przewalskii was listed as an endangered species in the Red List of Chinese Species.
translation.source: 2004年在《中国物种红色名录》中青海湖裸鲤被列为濒危物种。
translation.medium: In 2004, the Chinese Species Red List listed the Qinghai Lake bream as an endangered species.
translation.reference: In 2004, gymnocypris przewalskii was listed as an endangered species in the Red List of Chinese Species.

translation.zh: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
translation.en: From 2003, Qinghai province implemented the closure of lakes for fish breeding, prohibited any unit, collective or individual from fishing gymnocypris przewalskii in the main rivers and tributaries in the lake area, and prohibited the sale of gymnocypris przewalskii and their products.
translation.source: 从2003年起，青海省实施封湖育鱼，禁止任何单位、集体和个人到青海湖及湖区主要河流及支流捕捞裸鲤，禁止销售裸鲤及其制品。
translation.medium: Since 2003, Qinghai Province has implemented a ban on fishing in Qinghai Lake and its main tributaries, prohibiting any unit, collective, or individual from fishing for crucian carp in the lake and its tributaries, and prohibiting the sale of crucian carp and its products.
translation.reference: From 2003, Qinghai province implemented the closure of lakes for fish breeding, prohibited any unit, collective or individual from fishing gymnocypris przewalskii in the main rivers and tributaries in the lake area, and prohibited the sale of gymnocypris przewalskii and their products.

translation.zh: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
translation.en: In the meantime, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources have increased year by year through artificial breeding and releasing, clearing of the main rivers flowing into Qinghai Lake and river courses, designing scientific and reasonable “fish passage” and other measures to continue to strengthen protection.
translation.source: 与此同时，通过人工增殖放流以及清理青海湖主要入湖河流河道、设计科学合理的“过鱼通道”等措施持续加大保护力度，青海湖裸鲤资源蕴藏量逐年增加。
translation.medium: At the same time, through the artificial breeding and release of fish and the cleaning of the main inlet and outlet rivers of Qinghai Lake, as well as the design of scientific and reasonable "fish passages," measures have been continuously strengthened to protect the resources of Qinghai Lake carp, and the resource storage capacity of Qinghai Lake carp has increased year by year.
translation.reference: In the meantime, the reserves of gymnocypris przewalskii resources have increased year by year through artificial breeding and releasing, clearing of the main rivers flowing into Qinghai Lake and river courses, designing scientific and reasonable “fish passage” and other measures to continue to strengthen protection.

translation.zh: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。
translation.en: Yang Lin, Deputy Director General of Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, introduced that up until now, nearly 180 million gymnocypris przewalskii have been artificially reproduced and released, contributing more than 23% to the recovery of gymnocypris przewalskii resources.
translation.source: 青海省农业农村厅副厅长杨林介绍，截至目前，青海湖裸鲤已累计实施人工增殖放流近1.8亿尾，对青海湖裸鲤资源恢复的贡献率超过23 % 。
translation.medium: The vice director of the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, Yang Lin, introduced that as of now, nearly 1.8 billion fingerlings of Qinghai Lake carp have been artificially bred and released into the lake, which has contributed more than 23% to the restoration of Qinghai Lake carp resources.
translation.reference: Yang Lin, Deputy Director General of Department of Agriculture and Rural Affairs of Qinghai Province, introduced that up until now, nearly 180 million gymnocypris przewalskii have been artificially reproduced and released, contributing more than 23% to the recovery of gymnocypris przewalskii resources.

translation.zh: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。
translation.en: Qinghai three-rivers area is an important ecological barrier and water conservation area in China and even Asia, and Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function area to control the eastward spread of desertification in the west.
translation.source: 青海三江源地区是我国乃至亚洲重要的生态屏障和水源涵养区，而青海湖是控制西部荒漠化向东蔓延的天然屏障和生态功能区。
translation.medium: The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau is an important ecological barrier and water source in China and even Asia, and Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function area that controls the expansion of the western desert to the east.
translation.reference: Qinghai three-rivers area is an important ecological barrier and water conservation area in China and even Asia, and Qinghai Lake is a natural barrier and ecological function area to control the eastward spread of desertification in the west.

translation.zh: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。
translation.en: In order to protect the ecological environment of the three rivers area and the waters of Qinghai Lake, protect aquatic wildlife, and maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, Qinghai has issued a notice banning fishing in the key waters of the Yangtze River, the Yellow River, and Qinghai Lake since this year, and established a comprehensive management system of fishing ban of “one river, one river, and one lake”.
translation.source: 为了保护三江源地区和青海湖水域生态环境、保护水生野生动物，维护青藏高原生物多样性，今年以来，青海先后发布长江、黄河、青海湖重点水域禁捕通告，构建起了“一江一河一湖”全面禁捕管理体系。
translation.medium: To protect the ecological environment of the Three Rivers Region and the Qinghai Lake watershed, to protect the aquatic wildlife, and to maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau, since this year, Qinghai has successively issued notices on the prohibition of fishing in the upper reaches of the Yangtze River, the Yellow River, and Qinghai Lake, and has established a comprehensive "one river, one lake, one river" fishing ban management system.
translation.reference: In order to protect the ecological environment of the three rivers area and the waters of Qinghai Lake, protect aquatic wildlife, and maintain the biodiversity of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau, Qinghai has issued a notice banning fishing in the key waters of the Yangtze River, the Yellow River, and Qinghai Lake since this year, and established a comprehensive management system of fishing ban of “one river, one river, and one lake”.
