translation.zh: 二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。
translation.en: 2. Although the Rightists had their time in history, it was not long, and the reason why it was short was they were over their head once they got a tiny bit of sweetness; a little success will lead to insatiable desires, and just one blow and they will lose their ground to exist.
translation.source: 二、虽然右派在历史上有得志时代，但不长，所以短是因为给点儿阳光就灿烂，喝点儿开水就出汗；稍得志便得陇望蜀，遭打击便毛将焉附。
translation.medium: Although the rightists have had some shining moments in history, they have not lasted long, so they are short-lived. This is because they are like a spark that glows brightly when it is struck by a little bit of sunlight, but quickly fades away when the sunlight is gone. Similarly, they are like a person who sweats profusely when they drink a little bit of cold water, but quickly cools down when the water is gone. Furthermore, they are like a person who becomes arrogant and boastful when they achieve a little bit of success, but quickly loses their confidence when they are faced with setbacks.
translation.reference: 2. Although the Rightists had their time in history, it was not long, and the reason why it was short was they were over their head once they got a tiny bit of sweetness; a little success will lead to insatiable desires, and just one blow and they will lose their ground to exist.

translation.zh: 但实事求是来说，右派在社会进步过程中起到过积极作用。
translation.en: But to speak the truth, the Rightists have once played a positive role in the process of social progress.
translation.source: 但实事求是来说，右派在社会进步过程中起到过积极作用。
translation.medium: But in reality, the rightists have played an active role in promoting social progress.
translation.reference: But to speak the truth, the Rightists have once played a positive role in the process of social progress.

translation.zh: 从结束文革定义真理标准，发展经济提高科技以及促进行政制度化和人权保障等方面，右派的积极意义不该否定。
translation.en: The positive significance of the Rightists should not be denied in terms of ending the cultural revolution, defining the standard of truth, developing the economy, improving science and technology, and promoting the institutionalization of administration and the protection of human rights.
translation.source: 从结束文革定义真理标准，发展经济提高科技以及促进行政制度化和人权保障等方面，右派的积极意义不该否定。
translation.medium: From defining the standard of truth at the end of the Cultural Revolution to developing the economy, promoting technological advancement, and advancing political institutionalization and human rights protection, the positive significance of the right-wing cannot be denied.
translation.reference: The positive significance of the Rightists should not be denied in terms of ending the cultural revolution, defining the standard of truth, developing the economy, improving science and technology, and promoting the institutionalization of administration and the protection of human rights.

translation.zh: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
translation.en: 3. For me, although I don’t fully agree with some of Li Weidong’s statements, I really care about his statements and respect Li Weidong; Because he is conscientious, he is serious about China, and he also takes China’s social problems seriously.
translation.source: 三、就我而言，尽管不完全同意李伟东的有些说法，但我很在意他的说法，也很尊重李伟东这个人；因为他是认真的，他对中国是认真的，对中国的社会问题也是认真看待的。
translation.medium: Three, in my opinion, although I do not fully agree with some of Li Weidong's statements, I am very concerned about his statements and highly respect Li Weidong as a person; because he is sincere, he is sincere about China, and he is sincere in his view of China's social problems.
translation.reference: 3. For me, although I don’t fully agree with some of Li Weidong’s statements, I really care about his statements and respect Li Weidong; Because he is conscientious, he is serious about China, and he also takes China’s social problems seriously.

translation.zh: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
translation.en: But I oppose his anti-communist theory; I believe that unnecessary revolution should be opposed to; revolution will inevitably lead to social unrest and damage to people’s livelihood; political groups will be mixed, and foreign countries will avail themselves of the opportunity to get in.
translation.source: 但我反对他的反共理论，我认为反必要革命，革命则必然导致社会动荡，民生受损，政治团体鱼龙混杂泥沙俱下，再就是外国趁虚而入。
translation.medium: But I am opposed to his anti-communist theory. I believe that revolution is not necessary, and that it will inevitably lead to social unrest, damage to the people's livelihoods, and the chaos of political parties. It will also provide an opportunity for foreign powers to intervene.
translation.reference: But I oppose his anti-communist theory; I believe that unnecessary revolution should be opposed to; revolution will inevitably lead to social unrest and damage to people’s livelihood; political groups will be mixed, and foreign countries will avail themselves of the opportunity to get in.

translation.zh: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
translation.en: 4. Changing or improving China requires patience and the attitude to be responsible for the country and the people; those who try to make money from political opportunities are not Rightists, but bastards.
translation.source: 四、改变或改善中国要有耐心和为国为民负责的态度，政治投机企图火中取栗者，那不是右派，是混蛋。
translation.medium: Fourth, to change or improve China, one must have patience and a responsible attitude towards the country and the people. Political opportunities seekers who try to take advantage of the situation, those are not rightists, they are troublemakers.
translation.reference: 4. Changing or improving China requires patience and the attitude to be responsible for the country and the people; those who try to make money from political opportunities are not Rightists, but bastards.

translation.zh: 再聊聊左。
translation.en: Let’s talk about Leftists.
translation.source: 再聊聊左。
translation.medium: Let's talk more.
translation.reference: Let’s talk about Leftists.

translation.zh: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
translation.en: Leftists, in fact, are a group of outcasts of the times and politics.
translation.source: 左，其实是一帮时代和政治的弃儿。
translation.medium: In fact, the Left is a group of abandoned children of history and politics.
translation.reference: Leftists, in fact, are a group of outcasts of the times and politics.

translation.zh: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
translation.en: If the Rightists are of positive significance to society, and the Communist Party will listen to some of the Rightists’ remarks and analyze their thoughts when necessary, the Leftists don’t have such luck, because what the Leftists want is the dross thrown away by the Communist Party!
translation.source: 如果说右具有对社会的积极意义，共产党还会在需要的时候听取一些右的言论和分析他们的思想，那么左就没这造化了，因为左所要的正是共产党所扔掉的糟粕！
translation.medium: If the right has positive significance for society, the Communist Party will listen to some right-wing opinions and analyze their thoughts when needed. However, the left has no need for this, because the left's goal is to get rid of the negative aspects that the Communist Party has thrown away!
translation.reference: If the Rightists are of positive significance to society, and the Communist Party will listen to some of the Rightists’ remarks and analyze their thoughts when necessary, the Leftists don’t have such luck, because what the Leftists want is the dross thrown away by the Communist Party!

translation.zh: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
translation.en: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the rebels and crazy Leftists at the same time, and they got really angry; I don't think it’s necessary at all.
translation.source: 五、最近看到一些朋友边怼反贼边驳左癫，还挺动真气，我觉得大可不必。
translation.medium: 5、 Recently, I saw some friends on the left side of the road when they saw a thief on the right side of the road, they all shouted and chased after him. I think it's not necessary to do so.
translation.reference: 5. Recently, I saw some friends refuting the rebels and crazy Leftists at the same time, and they got really angry; I don't think it’s necessary at all.

translation.zh: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
translation.en: Don’t try to reason with rebels and crazy Leftists; they are all one track minded and unreasonable.
translation.source: 跟汉奸跟左癫都不要试图讲理，都是一根儿筋，无理可讲。
translation.medium: Don't try to reason with the Han collaborators and the leftists, they are all a bunch of nonsense, with no logic to speak of.
translation.reference: Don’t try to reason with rebels and crazy Leftists; they are all one track minded and unreasonable.

translation.zh: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
translation.en: Don’t try to prove we are right, and don’t even think about asking rebels and crazy Leftists to admit it; why bother?
translation.source: 也不要试图证明咱们是正确的，更不要想着让反贼和左癫承认，何必呢？
translation.medium: Don't try to prove that we are right, and don't think about making traitors and leftists admit it. Why bother?
translation.reference: Don’t try to prove we are right, and don’t even think about asking rebels and crazy Leftists to admit it; why bother?

translation.zh: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
translation.en: I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!
translation.source: 我这样告诉朋友们：当反贼骂你五毛，当左癫骂你右狗的时候，恰恰证明我们的这条中间道路是正确的！
translation.medium: I tell my friends: When the villains insult you for five cents, and when the left-handed person insults you for your right dog, it just proves that our middle road is correct!
translation.reference: I told my friends: when the rebels call you a fifty-cent and when the leftist call you a rightist dog, they prove we are on the correct track in the middle!

translation.zh: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
translation.en: Many people had dreams when they were young, but they forgot about them when they got older; or, they pursue their dreams and become paranoid.
translation.source: 许多人少年时候也有理想，老了之后，却忘了理想，或追求理想，却沦为偏执。
translation.medium: Many people have ideals when they are young, but as they get older, they forget their ideals or become obsessed with them and end up as fanatics.
translation.reference: Many people had dreams when they were young, but they forgot about them when they got older; or, they pursue their dreams and become paranoid.

translation.zh: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
translation.en: They drift apart from their dreams and the young Dragon Slayer will eventually become a vicious dragon.
translation.source: 和理想渐行渐远，甚至屠龙少年终成恶龙。
translation.medium: Gradually approaching the ideal, even the slaughter of the dragon youth may eventually become a wise dragon.
translation.reference: They drift apart from their dreams and the young Dragon Slayer will eventually become a vicious dragon.

translation.zh: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
translation.en: I think left and right generally refers to restraint and freedom; the innate genes of China’s history and culture make China overall relatively left.
translation.source: 左右我觉得一般是指约束和自由，中国从历史文化的先天基因导致中国整体应该是偏左。
translation.medium: I think that "left" and "right" generally refer to constraints and freedom, and China's overall tendency should be biased towards the left due to its historical and cultural genetic inheritance.
translation.reference: I think left and right generally refers to restraint and freedom; the innate genes of China’s history and culture make China overall relatively left.

translation.zh: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
translation.en: The domestic Rightists are free and stress efficiency and development, while the Leftists strengthen supervision and pay more attention to fairness and safety.
translation.source: 而国内右派自由，注重效率和发展，左派加强监管，更注重公平以及安全。
translation.medium: The right-wing libertarians in China prioritize efficiency and development, while the left-wingers strengthen regulation and prioritize fairness and safety.
translation.reference: The domestic Rightists are free and stress efficiency and development, while the Leftists strengthen supervision and pay more attention to fairness and safety.

translation.zh: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
translation.en: At present, society overall hopes to pay more attention to justice; at the same time, it is certain that when China and the United States fight, it is bound to lean towards left, which is estimated to continue for many years.
translation.source: 现在社会总体希望更注重公平，同时中美相争，偏左是肯定的，估计还得持续很多年。
translation.medium: In today's society, there is a general desire for greater fairness, while China and the United States are in competition, and it is generally believed that the left is winning, and it is estimated that this will continue for many years to come.
translation.reference: At present, society overall hopes to pay more attention to justice; at the same time, it is certain that when China and the United States fight, it is bound to lean towards left, which is estimated to continue for many years.

translation.zh: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
translation.en: Just like it if you don’t understand.
translation.source: 虽然看不懂，点赞就完事儿啦
translation.medium: Although I don't understand, just click the like button and it's done.
translation.reference: Just like it if you don’t understand.

translation.zh: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
translation.en: No need to say more, Huahua is generous.
translation.source: 啥也不说了，花花就是这么仗义
translation.medium: What's the use of talking about it? Flowers bloom on their own, and that's that.
translation.reference: No need to say more, Huahua is generous.

translation.zh: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
translation.en: In the past two years, the blockade and interception of the US on Huawei chips not only made Huawei fall into an unprecedented difficult position but also made “American” enterprises suffer from huge losses.
translation.source: 近两年，美帝对华为芯片的封锁和围堵，不仅让华为陷入前所未有的困境，也让“美系”企业遭遇巨大的损失。
translation.medium: In the past two years, the US has imposed sanctions and restrictions on Huawei's chips, not only leaving Huawei in an unprecedented predicament, but also causing "American" companies to suffer huge losses.
translation.reference: In the past two years, the blockade and interception of the US on Huawei chips not only made Huawei fall into an unprecedented difficult position but also made “American” enterprises suffer from huge losses.

translation.zh: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
translation.en: The US suppresses China’s chips industry and required its own enterprises and relevant enterprises of its allies to block China’s chip industry at the same time; the direct consequence was that the number of orders and profits of global chip suppliers were affected, resulting in the decrease in the investment of research and development and production capacity of chip manufacturers, which further led to the disorder of chip supply chain shortages on a global scale.
translation.source: 美帝打压中国芯片产业，要求自家企业及盟友国相关企业同时对我国芯片产业进行封锁，直接导致的后果就是全球芯片供应商的订单和利润受到影响，造成芯片生产企业的研发投入降低、产能下降，从而造成了全球范围内芯片供应链的短缺的紊乱。
translation.medium: The US is suppressing China's semiconductor industry, and is demanding that its own companies and allied foreign companies simultaneously impose a blockade on China's semiconductor industry. This directly leads to the impact on the orders and profits of global semiconductor suppliers, resulting in a reduction in research and development investment and a decrease in production capacity of semiconductor manufacturers, causing disorder in the global semiconductor supply chain.
translation.reference: The US suppresses China’s chips industry and required its own enterprises and relevant enterprises of its allies to block China’s chip industry at the same time; the direct consequence was that the number of orders and profits of global chip suppliers were affected, resulting in the decrease in the investment of research and development and production capacity of chip manufacturers, which further led to the disorder of chip supply chain shortages on a global scale.

translation.zh: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
translation.en: Today, “lack of chips” has affected all major industries of the world, resulting in the suspension of production of car enterprises and rise in prices of mobile phones; almost all the industries using chips are greatly impacted.
translation.source: 如今“缺芯”已经波及到了全球各大行业，比如车企停产、手机涨价，几乎所有用到芯片的行业都深受其害。
translation.medium: Nowadays, the shortage of chips has affected industries all over the world, such as car manufacturers stopping production and mobile phone price increases. Almost all industries that use chips have been affected.
translation.reference: Today, “lack of chips” has affected all major industries of the world, resulting in the suspension of production of car enterprises and rise in prices of mobile phones; almost all the industries using chips are greatly impacted.

translation.zh: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
translation.en: To gain the right to make their own decisions on “chips”, more and more countries’ tech giants are taking the path of “de-Americanized”.
translation.source: 为了掌握“芯片”自主权，越来越多国家的科技巨头开始走向“去美化”的道路。
translation.medium: In order to grasp the "chip" self-sufficiency, more and more countries' technology giants are starting to take the road of "de-Americanization".
translation.reference: To gain the right to make their own decisions on “chips”, more and more countries’ tech giants are taking the path of “de-Americanized”.

translation.zh: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
translation.en: In order to firmly holding the right to control global semiconductor in its hands and pin down the development of China’s semiconductor industry, the United States have made frequent moves recently such as hosting the “chip summit”, inviting the giants of 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance and allocating funds to support the local technology giants in the United States; in order to regain its leading position in the chip industry, Intel, an old technology giant in the United States, spent $ 20 billion to build two wafer processing plants in Arizona, US and opened its chip OEM business.
translation.source: 为了牢牢把控全球半导体控制权，牵制中国半导体行业的发展，最近老美动作频频，又是主持“芯片峰会”；又是邀请64国巨头成立半导体联盟，并拔款扶持美国本土科技巨头，比如，美帝老牌科技巨头英特尔为了夺回在芯片领域的主导地位，斥资200亿美元在美国亚利桑那州建2座晶圆加工厂，并对外开放芯片代工业务。
translation.medium: To firmly control the global semiconductor industry and suppress the development of China's semiconductor industry, the United States has been taking frequent actions recently. It has even hosted the "Chip Summit" and invited 64 major companies from around the world to form a semiconductor alliance. It has also provided financial support to American domestic technology giants, such as Intel, which is trying to regain its leading position in the semiconductor industry by investing $200 billion in building two wafer fabrication plants in Arizona and opening up semiconductor manufacturing services to overseas customers.
translation.reference: In order to firmly holding the right to control global semiconductor in its hands and pin down the development of China’s semiconductor industry, the United States have made frequent moves recently such as hosting the “chip summit”, inviting the giants of 64 countries to establish a semiconductor alliance and allocating funds to support the local technology giants in the United States; in order to regain its leading position in the chip industry, Intel, an old technology giant in the United States, spent $ 20 billion to build two wafer processing plants in Arizona, US and opened its chip OEM business.

translation.zh: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
translation.en: When most people think Intel’s move will make certain impact on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and even steal their job.
translation.source: 当大多数人都以为，英特尔此番举动将对台积电造成一定冲击，并很有可能抢走台积电的“饭碗”。
translation.medium: Most people believe that Intel's move will have a certain impact on TSMC and may even steal TSMC's "bowl of rice."
translation.reference: When most people think Intel’s move will make certain impact on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and even steal their job.

translation.zh: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
translation.en: They are sure about it because Intel, as an old tech giant in the US, worked diligently in the semiconductor industry for dozens of years and have a large amount of talent teams and technological reserve; it is bound to rise within a short time and defeat Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.
translation.source: 之所以这么肯定，是因为，英特尔作为美帝老牌科技巨头，在半导体领域深耕几十年，拥有大量的人才队伍和技术储备，必定能在短期内迅速崛起，打败台积电。
translation.medium: The reason why it is so certain is that Intel, as the flagship technology giant of the United States, has been deeply cultivating in the semiconductor field for several decades, with a large team of talents and abundant technical reserves. It must be able to quickly rise and defeat TSMC in the short term.
translation.reference: They are sure about it because Intel, as an old tech giant in the US, worked diligently in the semiconductor industry for dozens of years and have a large amount of talent teams and technological reserve; it is bound to rise within a short time and defeat Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company.

translation.zh: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
translation.en: However, Zhang Zhongmou, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, sniffed at the decision of Intel.
translation.source: 然而，对于英特尔的这个决定，台积电创始人张忠谋却不屑一顾。
translation.medium: However, for Intel's decision, TSMC's founder Chang Zheng-Ming was not impressed.
translation.reference: However, Zhang Zhongmou, founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, sniffed at the decision of Intel.

translation.zh: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
translation.en: At the “2021 Master Think Tank Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a surprising remark and spoke bluntly about Intel’s move to build a wafer factory, “it is rather ironic for Intel to build an OEM factory of chips”.
translation.source: 在今年四月举行的“2021大师智库论坛”上，张忠谋语出惊人，对于英特尔斥资建晶圆厂这个举动，张忠谋毫无顾忌直言：英特尔建芯片代工厂，相当讽刺。
translation.medium: At the "2021 Master's Think Tank Forum" held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a shocking statement, openly criticizing Intel's decision to invest in building a semiconductor factory. Zhang Zhongmou said without hesitation: Building a semiconductor factory by Intel is a parody.
translation.reference: At the “2021 Master Think Tank Forum” held in April this year, Zhang Zhongmou made a surprising remark and spoke bluntly about Intel’s move to build a wafer factory, “it is rather ironic for Intel to build an OEM factory of chips”.

translation.zh: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
translation.en: Zhang Zhongmou disdained Intel’s decision to get into the wafer industry because Zhang Zhong still holds a grudge against a feud between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Intel more than 30 years.
translation.source: 张忠谋之所以对英特尔进军晶圆领域颇为不屑，是因为张忠谋对30多年前台积电与英特尔的一段恩怨依然耿耿于怀。
translation.medium: Zhang Zhongmou was not very enthusiastic about Intel's entry into the memory field because he still harbored resentment towards Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) and Intel from over 30 years ago.
translation.reference: Zhang Zhongmou disdained Intel’s decision to get into the wafer industry because Zhang Zhong still holds a grudge against a feud between Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Intel more than 30 years.

translation.zh: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
translation.en: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel has been the pearl in the manufacturing industry of the United States, occupying the leading position in the world; it was a king in the semiconductor industry in the world.
translation.source: 上世纪六七十年代，英特尔一直是美帝制造业中的明珠，雄居全球巅峰的位置，是世界半导体领域的霸主。
translation.medium: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel was the shining star in the American manufacturing industry, occupying the pinnacle of the global market, and was the dominant player in the semiconductor field.
translation.reference: In the 1960s and 1970s, Intel has been the pearl in the manufacturing industry of the United States, occupying the leading position in the world; it was a king in the semiconductor industry in the world.

translation.zh: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
translation.en: Until the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips have been controlled by a few strong ones.
translation.source: 到上世纪80年代，世界半导体高端芯片一直被少数强者掌握。
translation.medium: In the 1980s, the high-end semiconductor chips were monopolized by a few dominant players in the world.
translation.reference: Until the 1980s, the world's high-end semiconductor chips have been controlled by a few strong ones.

translation.zh: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
translation.en: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode; chips were designed, manufactured and sealed by the same factory, and Intel was a representative of that era.
translation.source: 当时半导体行业以IDM模式为特征，芯片从设计、制造到封测都是由一家工厂来完成，英特尔就是那个时代的代表。
translation.medium: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by the IDM model, where chips were designed, manufactured, and packaged by a single factory. Intel was the representative of that era.
translation.reference: At that time, the semiconductor industry was characterized by IDM mode; chips were designed, manufactured and sealed by the same factory, and Intel was a representative of that era.

translation.zh: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
translation.en: However, such a model has overwhelmed some small enterprises, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs could only flinch in the face of huge production line construction costs.
translation.source: 然而这样的模式让一些小企业不堪重负，很多半导体创业者面对巨额的产线建设费用只能望而却步。
translation.medium: However, such a pattern makes it difficult for some small enterprises to bear the burden, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs face huge costs for building production lines and can only hesitate.
translation.reference: However, such a model has overwhelmed some small enterprises, and many semiconductor entrepreneurs could only flinch in the face of huge production line construction costs.

translation.zh: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
translation.en: To respond to the calling of market demand, after entering the 1980s, the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation of chips industry began to appear; in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there were companies specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there were companies specializing in design, a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing could be established.
translation.source: 在市场需求的感召下，进入80年代后，芯片行业开始出现分工合作的现象，1984年张忠谋听说有专门做芯片设计的公司，便认为既然有专门做设计的，那么就可以成立一家专门用于晶圆制造的工厂。
translation.medium: In response to market demand, after entering the 1980s, the semiconductor industry began to show the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation, and in 1984, Zhang Zhongming heard that there was a company specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there was a company specializing in design, then he could establish a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing.
translation.reference: To respond to the calling of market demand, after entering the 1980s, the phenomenon of division of labor and cooperation of chips industry began to appear; in 1984, Zhang Zhongmou heard that there were companies specializing in chip design, so he thought that since there were companies specializing in design, a factory specializing in wafer manufacturing could be established.

translation.zh: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
translation.en: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou’s imagination became reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was created.
translation.source: 不久之后，张忠谋的设想变成了现实，台积电应运而生。
translation.medium: Not long after, Zhang Zhongmou's plan became a reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) was born.
translation.reference: Soon after, Zhang Zhongmou’s imagination became reality, and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was created.

translation.zh: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
translation.en: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company aimed to set the single link of “processing of wafers” as its primary business; without design, only OEM services of wafer manufacturing was provided.
translation.source: 台积电把主营业务瞄准了“晶圆加工”这个单一环节，不进行设计，只提供晶圆制造的代工服务。
translation.medium: TSMC has aimed its main business at "crystal cutting" (晶圆加工), a single link in the semiconductor manufacturing process, without engaging in design and only providing contract manufacturing services for crystal cutting.
translation.reference: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company aimed to set the single link of “processing of wafers” as its primary business; without design, only OEM services of wafer manufacturing was provided.

translation.zh: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
translation.en: The newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was only a small player in front of Intel the giant.
translation.source: 当时刚创立的台积电，在英特尔这个巨无霸面前就是小喽啰。
translation.medium: At that time, the newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) was just a small player in front of Intel, the giant.
translation.reference: The newly established Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company was only a small player in front of Intel the giant.

translation.zh: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
translation.en: In order to gain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but Intel was arrogant when it heard Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only participated in the manufacturing of the chips industry; Intel looked down on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and resolutely refused to invest in it.
translation.source: 为了获取资本支持，张忠谋就曾找英特尔投资，但当时英特尔一听说台积电只做芯片行业的制造环节，显然有些自视甚高，看不起台积电，果断拒绝对台积电进行投资。
translation.medium: To obtain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but when Intel heard that TSMC only does the manufacturing process of semiconductor chips, it was obviously a bit arrogant and looked down on TSMC, and decisively rejected the idea of investing in TSMC.
translation.reference: In order to gain capital support, Zhang Zhongmou once approached Intel for investment, but Intel was arrogant when it heard Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company only participated in the manufacturing of the chips industry; Intel looked down on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and resolutely refused to invest in it.

translation.zh: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
translation.en: Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel despised wafer manufacturing services at that time.
translation.source: 张忠谋也认定英特尔当时是看不起晶圆制程服务的。
translation.medium: Zhang Zhuguo also acknowledged that Intel at the time did not take Jingyuan's service seriously.
translation.reference: Zhang Zhongmou also believed that Intel despised wafer manufacturing services at that time.

translation.zh: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
translation.en: Unexpectedly, the giant that looked down on wafer manufacturing services back in the days will also start to do wafer foundry now.
translation.source: 没想到当年看不起晶圆制造服务的巨头，如今却也要开始做晶圆代工。
translation.medium: I didn't expect the company that made jewelry last year to be so big, and now they have to start doing jewelry OEM.
translation.reference: Unexpectedly, the giant that looked down on wafer manufacturing services back in the days will also start to do wafer foundry now.

translation.zh: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
translation.en: Therefore, Zhang Zhongmou thinks it is ironic for Intel to work on wafer foundry.
translation.source: 所以，张忠谋觉得英特尔进入晶圆代工很讽刺。
translation.medium: So, Zhang Zhongming thought it was ironic for Intel to enter the wafer fabrication business.
translation.reference: Therefore, Zhang Zhongmou thinks it is ironic for Intel to work on wafer foundry.

translation.zh: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
translation.en: The market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has surpassed that of Intel.
translation.source: 如今台积电的市值已经超过了英特尔。
translation.medium: Today, the market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) has surpassed that of Intel.
translation.reference: The market value of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company has surpassed that of Intel.

translation.zh: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
translation.en: Facing the powerful attack of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, Intel naturally dares not to stand still.
translation.source: 面对台积电的强势进攻，英特尔自然也是不敢固步自封。
translation.medium: In the face of TSMC's strong offensive, Intel is also unwilling to stand still.
translation.reference: Facing the powerful attack of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company, Intel naturally dares not to stand still.

translation.zh: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
translation.en: Now, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is trying to develop to the 3nm chips, and Intel still stays at the 14nm 7 years ago.
translation.source: 如今，台积电已经向着3nm芯片冲刺，而英特尔仍然停留在7年前的14nm。
translation.medium: Today, TSMC has been pushing towards 3nm chips, while Intel is still stuck at 14nm from 7 years ago.
translation.reference: Now, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company is trying to develop to the 3nm chips, and Intel still stays at the 14nm 7 years ago.

translation.zh: 想要赶超其实并非易事。
translation.en: It is actually not difficulty to surpass it.
translation.source: 想要赶超其实并非易事。
translation.medium: "Wanting to surpass others in reality is not an easy task."
translation.reference: It is actually not difficulty to surpass it.

translation.zh: 不等了
translation.en: I won’t wait any more.
translation.source: 不等了
translation.medium: Can't wait any longer.
translation.reference: I won’t wait any more.

translation.zh: 到 19:06 就下单 2 小时了😅
translation.en: It will be 2 hours since I placed the order at 19:06😅
translation.source: 到 19:06 就下单 2 小时了😅
translation.medium: I placed an order at 19:06 and it's been 2 hours already 😅
translation.reference: It will be 2 hours since I placed the order at 19:06😅

translation.zh: 今天来看一些【奇怪的热搜】。
translation.en: Let’s see some “strange trending topics” today.
translation.source: 今天来看一些【奇怪的热搜】。
translation.medium: Today, I'll take a look at some [weird search trends].
translation.reference: Let’s see some “strange trending topics” today.

translation.zh: 什么是正常的舆情？
translation.en: What is normal public opinion?
translation.source: 什么是正常的舆情？
translation.medium: What is a normal public opinion?
translation.reference: What is normal public opinion?

translation.zh: 随机挑选三个热搜：二月二龙抬头、好丽友涨价、货拉拉事件，舆情扩散形成波峰，然后【指数下降】（平滑曲线）最终消散，如果产生次生舆情会有小驼峰再次出现。
translation.en: Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again.
translation.source: 随机挑选三个热搜：二月二龙抬头、好丽友涨价、货拉拉事件，舆情扩散形成波峰，然后【指数下降】（平滑曲线）最终消散，如果产生次生舆情会有小驼峰再次出现。
translation.medium: Randomly select three hot searches: February 2nd Long Live the Dragon, Hua Li You's price increase, and the PLRLA incident. The buzz spreads and forms a peak, then the index drops (smooth curve), and if a secondary buzz occurs, there will be a small peak again.
translation.reference: Select three trending topics randomly, the rise of the head of the dragon on the 2nd of February, the price rise of ORLON, and the Huolala incident; the public opinion spread to form a peak, and then the [index declined] to form a (smooth curve) until it finally dissipated; if a secondary public opinion occurs, there will be a small hump again.

translation.zh: 它们看起来和网信办官网曾展示的【网络舆情演化模型】相差无二。
translation.en: They look no different from the [evolution model of online public opinion] once displayed on the official website of Cyberspace Administration.
translation.source: 它们看起来和网信办官网曾展示的【网络舆情演化模型】相差无二。
translation.medium: They look exactly the same as the network sentiment evolution model displayed on the official website of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.
translation.reference: They look no different from the [evolution model of online public opinion] once displayed on the official website of Cyberspace Administration.

translation.zh: 什么是异常的舆情？
translation.en: What is abnormal public opinion?
translation.source: 什么是异常的舆情？
translation.medium: What is an abnormal public opinion?
translation.reference: What is abnormal public opinion?

translation.zh: 随机挑选同一事件中的六个热搜，呈现出【孤峰状】、【锯齿状】、【断崖状】。
translation.en: Randomly select three trending topics from the same event, there are [solitary peak], [zigzag] and [cliff].
translation.source: 随机挑选同一事件中的六个热搜，呈现出【孤峰状】、【锯齿状】、【断崖状】。
translation.medium: Randomly select six keywords from the same event and present them in the form of a peak, a sawtooth, and a cliff.
translation.reference: Randomly select three trending topics from the same event, there are [solitary peak], [zigzag] and [cliff].

translation.zh: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。
translation.en: [Solidary peak] means the topic is artificially heated, quickly rushing to the trending topics list and attracting public attention; [Zigzag] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that topic stays on the trending topics list; [Cliff] means collective evacuation; after the topic has played its “function”, they received a new task and rushed to a new battlefield.
translation.source: 【孤峰状】即人为加热，迅速冲榜热搜，引起大众关注；【锯齿状】即周期性加热，确保话题盘踞热搜榜单；【断崖状】即集体撤离，该热搜发挥完“功能”，接到新任务、冲向新战场。
translation.medium: 【Isolated Peak】This refers to the act of heating up by oneself, resulting in rapid climbing of the hot search rankings and attracting public attention; 【Sawtooth】This refers to periodic heating, ensuring that the topic stays on the hot search rankings; 【Cliff】This refers to the collective withdrawal, where the hot search has fulfilled its "function", and it is ready to receive a new task or move on to a new battlefield.
translation.reference: [Solidary peak] means the topic is artificially heated, quickly rushing to the trending topics list and attracting public attention; [Zigzag] refers to periodic heating, ensuring that topic stays on the trending topics list; [Cliff] means collective evacuation; after the topic has played its “function”, they received a new task and rushed to a new battlefield.

translation.zh: 图9中，一个事件的热度波峰恰好是另一事件的波谷，时间分秒不差，必定是统一批水军接到任务，开启新一轮攻势。
translation.en: In picture 9, the peak of the heat wave of one event happens to be the trough of another event, and the time is exactly the same; it must be because a unified batch of paid internet trolls have received the task and started a new round of offensive.
translation.source: 图9中，一个事件的热度波峰恰好是另一事件的波谷，时间分秒不差，必定是统一批水军接到任务，开启新一轮攻势。
translation.medium: In Figure 9, the heat wave peak of one event coincides with the trough of another event, with time differences of only a few seconds, which must be the moment when the unified water army received the task and launched a new round of attacks.
translation.reference: In picture 9, the peak of the heat wave of one event happens to be the trough of another event, and the time is exactly the same; it must be because a unified batch of paid internet trolls have received the task and started a new round of offensive.

translation.zh: 黑公关的专业化可见一斑：几十个热搜同时上榜，哪些吸引目光、哪些负责科普、哪些引战造势、哪些转移视线、哪些影响认知、哪些误导判断、哪些煽动情感、哪些裹挟决策，黑产账号分批次、分节点精细化作战，几乎考虑到舆情传播扩散中的所有要素。
translation.en: The professionalism of black public relations can be seen: dozens of trending topics are on the list at the same time, which attract attention, which are responsible for explanation, which lead to argument and accumulate momentum, which divert attention, which affect understanding, which mislead judgment, which incite emotion, which coerce decision-making; the black production accounts work in batches and conduct segmented operations in different batches and time nodes, taking into account almost all elements in the spread of public opinion.
translation.source: 黑公关的专业化可见一斑：几十个热搜同时上榜，哪些吸引目光、哪些负责科普、哪些引战造势、哪些转移视线、哪些影响认知、哪些误导判断、哪些煽动情感、哪些裹挟决策，黑产账号分批次、分节点精细化作战，几乎考虑到舆情传播扩散中的所有要素。
translation.medium: The professionalization of public relations can be seen in a few spots: several hot searches at the same time, which ones attract attention, which ones are responsible for publicity, which ones provoke war, which ones shift the focus, which ones influence cognition, which ones lead to wrong judgments, which ones incite emotions, which ones wrap up decisions, black PR accounts are divided into batches and fine-tuned at different nodes, almost considering all elements of the spread of public opinion.
translation.reference: The professionalism of black public relations can be seen: dozens of trending topics are on the list at the same time, which attract attention, which are responsible for explanation, which lead to argument and accumulate momentum, which divert attention, which affect understanding, which mislead judgment, which incite emotion, which coerce decision-making; the black production accounts work in batches and conduct segmented operations in different batches and time nodes, taking into account almost all elements in the spread of public opinion.

translation.zh: 传播是一门科学，抛开立场、情感所有主观因素，仅从客观数据，黑公关也会无处遁形。
translation.en: Communication is a science which disregards all subjective factors such as standpoint and emotion and only takes into account objective data; black public relations will have nowhere to hide.
translation.source: 传播是一门科学，抛开立场、情感所有主观因素，仅从客观数据，黑公关也会无处遁形。
translation.medium: Propaganda is a science, discarding all subjective factors such as standpoints and emotions, and only relying on objective data. Even black public relations will have nowhere to hide.
translation.reference: Communication is a science which disregards all subjective factors such as standpoint and emotion and only takes into account objective data; black public relations will have nowhere to hide.

translation.zh: 凡走过必留下痕迹，这样的痕迹，我们一起挖出来。
translation.en: Traces will be left from anyone walked by, and we can dig out these traces together.
translation.source: 凡走过必留下痕迹，这样的痕迹，我们一起挖出来。
translation.medium: Everyone who passes by must leave a trace, and these traces, we will dig them out together.
translation.reference: Traces will be left from anyone walked by, and we can dig out these traces together.

translation.zh: 数据来源：热搜时光机。
translation.en: Source of data: trending topics time machine.
translation.source: 数据来源：热搜时光机。
translation.medium: Data source: Time Machine.
translation.reference: Source of data: trending topics time machine.

translation.zh: 毛里求斯等国首次发现奥密克戎毒株感染病例-新华网
translation.en: Omicron strain infection cases were found in Mauritius and other countries for the first time - Xinhuanet
translation.source: 毛里求斯等国首次发现奥密克戎毒株感染病例-新华网
translation.medium: Mauritius and other countries have reported the first cases of Omicron variant infection - Xinhua Net
translation.reference: Omicron strain infection cases were found in Mauritius and other countries for the first time - Xinhuanet

translation.zh: 新华社北京12月12日电 综合新华社驻外记者报道：毛里求斯、塞浦路斯和马拉维近日首次报告发现新冠变异病毒奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.en: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 12, reported by foreign corespondent of comprehensive Xinhua News Agency: Mauritius, Cyprus and Malawi recently reported to have found the infection cases of Omicron strains, the new COVID-19 variant, for the first time.
translation.source: 新华社北京12月12日电 综合新华社驻外记者报道：毛里求斯、塞浦路斯和马拉维近日首次报告发现新冠变异病毒奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.medium: According to a comprehensive report by the Xinhua News Agency, Mauritius, Cyprus, and Malawi have recently reported the first cases of the new coronavirus variant Omicron.
translation.reference: Message from Xinhua News Agency Beijing on December 12, reported by foreign corespondent of comprehensive Xinhua News Agency: Mauritius, Cyprus and Malawi recently reported to have found the infection cases of Omicron strains, the new COVID-19 variant, for the first time.

translation.zh: 毛里求斯10日首次报告该国两例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.en: Mauritius reported two infection cases of Omicron strains on December 10 for the first time.
translation.source: 毛里求斯10日首次报告该国两例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.medium: Mauritius reported its first two cases of the Omicron variant of COVID-19 on December 10th.
translation.reference: Mauritius reported two infection cases of Omicron strains on December 10 for the first time.

translation.zh: 据毛卫生部长凯莱什·贾古特帕尔介绍，一名感染者为自南非出发于11月27日抵达毛里求斯的游客；另一名感染者为毛里求斯本地居民，他与一名近期曾前往南非后返回的人员接触后，于11月30日核酸检测呈阳性。
translation.en: According to introduction from Kelesh Jagutpal, Minister of Ministry of Health of Mauritius, one of the infected people was a tourist departing from South Africa and arriving in Mauritius on November 27; the other infected person was a local resident of Mauritius, who was tested positive in nucleic acid test on November 30 after contacting a person who returned from South Africa.
translation.source: 据毛卫生部长凯莱什·贾古特帕尔介绍，一名感染者为自南非出发于11月27日抵达毛里求斯的游客；另一名感染者为毛里求斯本地居民，他与一名近期曾前往南非后返回的人员接触后，于11月30日核酸检测呈阳性。
translation.medium: According to the introduction by Mao Zedong, a visitor from South Africa who arrived in Mauritius on November 27, and another local resident who had contact with a person who recently returned from South Africa, both tested positive for COVID-19 on November 30.
translation.reference: According to introduction from Kelesh Jagutpal, Minister of Ministry of Health of Mauritius, one of the infected people was a tourist departing from South Africa and arriving in Mauritius on November 27; the other infected person was a local resident of Mauritius, who was tested positive in nucleic acid test on November 30 after contacting a person who returned from South Africa.

translation.zh: 经医院隔离治疗后，这两名感染者核酸检测结果均转为阴性，目前已返回各自的居住地。
translation.en: The nucleic acid test results of the two infected people changed to negative after quarantine and receiving treatment in the hospital, and now they have returned to their own respective residence.
translation.source: 经医院隔离治疗后，这两名感染者核酸检测结果均转为阴性，目前已返回各自的居住地。
translation.medium: After being isolated and treated at the hospital, the two infected individuals had their nucleic acid test results turn to negative, and they have now returned to their respective places of residence.
translation.reference: The nucleic acid test results of the two infected people changed to negative after quarantine and receiving treatment in the hospital, and now they have returned to their own respective residence.

translation.zh: 塞浦路斯卫生部10日宣布该国首次确诊3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.en: It was announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that the country confirmed three cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.
translation.source: 塞浦路斯卫生部10日宣布该国首次确诊3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.medium: The health department of Cyprus announced the first three cases of monkeypox infection in the country.
translation.reference: It was announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that the country confirmed three cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.

translation.zh: 这3人都是学生，本月初从国外旅行回来，由于均为轻症，并未入院治疗。
translation.en: All of the 3 infected people were students who came back after traveling in other countries at the beginning of this month; all of them were not hospitalized because they were mild cases.
translation.source: 这3人都是学生，本月初从国外旅行回来，由于均为轻症，并未入院治疗。
translation.medium: These 3 people are all students. They have just returned from abroad and have not been hospitalized for treatment due to their mild illnesses.
translation.reference: All of the 3 infected people were students who came back after traveling in other countries at the beginning of this month; all of them were not hospitalized because they were mild cases.

translation.zh: 为防范奥密克戎毒株蔓延，塞政府不断加大防控力度。
translation.en: In order to prevent the spreading of the Omicron strains, the government of Cyprus kept strengthening the prevention and control.
translation.source: 为防范奥密克戎毒株蔓延，塞政府不断加大防控力度。
translation.medium: To prevent the spread of the Omicron variant, the government has been strengthening its epidemic prevention and control measures.
translation.reference: In order to prevent the spreading of the Omicron strains, the government of Cyprus kept strengthening the prevention and control.

translation.zh: 从12月6日到明年1月10日，乘飞机入境的12岁以上旅客抵塞后都需自费在机场接受核酸检测。
translation.en: All the passengers above 12 years old who enter the country by plane shall take nucleic acid test at their own expenses at the airport from December 6 to January 10 next year.
translation.source: 从12月6日到明年1月10日，乘飞机入境的12岁以上旅客抵塞后都需自费在机场接受核酸检测。
translation.medium: From December 6th to January 10th of next year, all 12-year-old and above travelers who arrive by plane in China will need to pay for a nucleic acid test at the airport upon arrival.
translation.reference: All the passengers above 12 years old who enter the country by plane shall take nucleic acid test at their own expenses at the airport from December 6 to January 10 next year.

translation.zh: 塞卫生部10日还宣布，将开始为该国5岁至11岁的儿童接种辉瑞新冠疫苗。
translation.en: It was also announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that they would start inoculate children from 5 to 11 years old in the country with Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.
translation.source: 塞卫生部10日还宣布，将开始为该国5岁至11岁的儿童接种辉瑞新冠疫苗。
translation.medium: The State Council's Health and Family Planning Commission announced on the 10th that it will start vaccinating children aged 5 to 11 in China against COVID-19.
translation.reference: It was also announced by Ministry of Health of Cyprus on December 10 that they would start inoculate children from 5 to 11 years old in the country with Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.

translation.zh: 马拉维卫生部长昆比泽·奇蓬达9日说，该国首次发现3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.en: Kunbizze Chiponda, Minister of Ministry of Health of Malawi, said on December 9 that Malawi found 3 cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.
translation.source: 马拉维卫生部长昆比泽·奇蓬达9日说，该国首次发现3例奥密克戎毒株感染病例。
translation.medium: The Minister of Health and Wellness, Kwame Akufo-Addo, said on Wednesday that Ghana has discovered its first three cases of the Omicron variant of COVID-19.
translation.reference: Kunbizze Chiponda, Minister of Ministry of Health of Malawi, said on December 9 that Malawi found 3 cases of infection with the Omicron strains for the first time.

translation.zh: 该国卫生部门对从11月9日至12月2日采集的12个新冠阳性样本开展基因组测序，发现了这3例感染病例。
translation.en: The Department of Health of Malawi conducted genomic sequencing for 12 COVID-19 positive samples collected from November 9 to December 2 and found the 3 cases of infection.
translation.source: 该国卫生部门对从11月9日至12月2日采集的12个新冠阳性样本开展基因组测序，发现了这3例感染病例。
translation.medium: The health department of this country conducted gene sequencing on 12 samples collected from November 9th to December 2nd, and found these 3 cases of infection.
translation.reference: The Department of Health of Malawi conducted genomic sequencing for 12 COVID-19 positive samples collected from November 9 to December 2 and found the 3 cases of infection.

translation.zh: 外卖从没送达
translation.en: The takeout order never arrived.
translation.source: 外卖从没送达
translation.medium: "外卖从没送达" means "food delivery has never arrived".
translation.reference: The takeout order never arrived.

translation.en: Even the number of the delivery person is fake.
translation.source: 连骑手电话号码都是假的
translation.medium: All the phone numbers provided are fake.
translation.reference: Even the number of the delivery person is fake.

translation.zh: 我已经重新下单
translation.en: I have already re-placed the order.
translation.source: 我已经重新下单
translation.medium: I have already reordered.
translation.reference: I have already re-placed the order.

translation.zh: 上一张单是否会退款？
translation.en: Will I get a refund for the last order?
translation.source: 上一张单是否会退款？
translation.medium: Can the previous invoice be refunded?
translation.reference: Will I get a refund for the last order?

translation.zh: 如果不行，请取消订单并退款
translation.en: If it doesn’t work, please cancel the order and ask for a refund.
translation.source: 如果不行，请取消订单并退款
translation.medium: If it doesn't work, please cancel the order and refund.
translation.reference: If it doesn’t work, please cancel the order and ask for a refund.

translation.zh: 想着早点叫餐，可以早点吃，但是现在都等到 7 点了还没有吃上
translation.en: I thought if I ordered early, I could eat it early, but now it’s 7 and I still don’t have it.
translation.source: 想着早点叫餐，可以早点吃，但是现在都等到 7 点了还没有吃上
translation.medium: Thinking about having breakfast early, but now it's already 7 o'clock and I haven't eaten anything yet.
translation.reference: I thought if I ordered early, I could eat it early, but now it’s 7 and I still don’t have it.

translation.zh: 我不明白你在说什么……
translation.en: I don’t understand what you are talking about...
translation.source: 我不明白你在说什么……
translation.medium: I don't understand what you're saying……
translation.reference: I don’t understand what you are talking about...

translation.zh: 你的中文是翻译过来的吗？还是你 prefer 用英文？
translation.en: Was your Chinese translated? Or would you prefer English?
translation.source: 你的中文是翻译过来的吗？还是你 prefer 用英文？
translation.medium: Is your Chinese translation or do you prefer to use English?
translation.reference: Was your Chinese translated? Or would you prefer English?

translation.zh: 那发送到
translation.en: Then send it to
translation.source: 那发送到
translation.medium: To whom it may concern,
translation.reference: Then send it to

translation.zh: 要打电话跟他说吗
translation.en: Shall I tell him on the phone?
translation.source: 要打电话跟他说吗
translation.medium: Should you call him and say?
translation.reference: Shall I tell him on the phone?

translation.zh: 尊敬的顾客您好！
translation.en: Hello, deal customer!
translation.source: 尊敬的顾客您好！
translation.medium: Dear valued customer, how can I assist you today?
translation.reference: Hello, deal customer!

translation.zh: 感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，您吃的开心快乐一直是我们的使命，为您和您的家人提供更可口放心的菜肴，更优质的服务，您的满意跟好评一直是我们前进的动力！
translation.en: Thank you for choosing Zhi Yun Restaurant, and offering you a pleasant meal has been our mission; we are committed to providing you and your family with delicious food, quality service, and your satisfaction and good review will always be our momentum to move forward!
translation.source: 感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，您吃的开心快乐一直是我们的使命，为您和您的家人提供更可口放心的菜肴，更优质的服务，您的满意跟好评一直是我们前进的动力！
translation.medium: Thank you for choosing to dine at Sky Cloud Restaurant. Our mission has always been to bring happiness and satisfaction to our customers through delicious food and exceptional service. We strive to provide our guests with a dining experience that is both enjoyable and worry-free. Your satisfaction and positive feedback are the driving force behind our continuous improvement and growth!
translation.reference: Thank you for choosing Zhi Yun Restaurant, and offering you a pleasant meal has been our mission; we are committed to providing you and your family with delicious food, quality service, and your satisfaction and good review will always be our momentum to move forward!

translation.zh: 感谢亲的五星好评哦，爱你么么哒！
translation.en: Thank you for your 5-star review, lots of love!
translation.source: 感谢亲的五星好评哦，爱你么么哒！
translation.medium: Thank you for the five-star review, I love you so much!
translation.reference: Thank you for your 5-star review, lots of love!

translation.zh: 感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，由此给您带来困扰，非常抱歉！
translation.en: Thank you for choosing Zhi Yuan Restaurant, and we are deeply sorry for the trouble brought to you!
translation.source: 感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，由此给您带来困扰，非常抱歉！
translation.medium: Thank you for choosing to dine at Cloud Café. I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.
translation.reference: Thank you for choosing Zhi Yuan Restaurant, and we are deeply sorry for the trouble brought to you!

translation.zh: 同时非常感谢您给予真实体验评价，让我们及时发现不足的地方，我们一定采取有效的措施进行改善，严格把控菜品的质量及分量，我是支雲餐厅“小雲”我们的电话是18912251735微信同步，期待与再此你相遇
translation.en: At the same time, we are grateful for your review of your real experience so that we can timely find our shortcomings, and we will definitely take effective measures to make improvement, strictly control the quality and amount of dishes; we are “Xiao Yun” of Zhi Yun Restaurant and our phone number and WeChat account is 18912251735; we look forward to meeting you again.
translation.source: 同时非常感谢您给予真实体验评价，让我们及时发现不足的地方，我们一定采取有效的措施进行改善，严格把控菜品的质量及分量，我是支雲餐厅“小雲”我们的电话是18912251735微信同步，期待与再此你相遇
translation.medium: Thank you very much for giving us a real experience evaluation, allowing us to promptly discover any shortcomings and take effective measures for improvement. We will strictly control the quality and quantity of our dishes, and our phone number is 18912251735, and our WeChat is synchronized. We look forward to meeting you again.
translation.reference: At the same time, we are grateful for your review of your real experience so that we can timely find our shortcomings, and we will definitely take effective measures to make improvement, strictly control the quality and amount of dishes; we are “Xiao Yun” of Zhi Yun Restaurant and our phone number and WeChat account is 18912251735; we look forward to meeting you again.

translation.zh: 尊敬的顾客您好，感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，因为菜品的问题给您带来不愉快的用餐体验我们深感歉意，我们已与厨房对接沟通对菜品进行严格把控，同事感谢您对我们的理解与支持，我是支雲餐厅小雲，期待与您再此相遇！
translation.en: Hello, dear customer, thank you for choosing Zhi Yun Restaurant, and we are deeply sorry for your unpleasant dining experience due to the issues of the dishes; we have communicated with the kitchen to strictly control the quality of dishes, and we would like to thank you for your understanding and support for us at the same time; we are Xiao Yun of Zhi Yun Restaurant, and we look forward to meeting you again!
translation.source: 尊敬的顾客您好，感谢您能够选择支雲餐厅用餐，因为菜品的问题给您带来不愉快的用餐体验我们深感歉意，我们已与厨房对接沟通对菜品进行严格把控，同事感谢您对我们的理解与支持，我是支雲餐厅小雲，期待与您再此相遇！
translation.medium: Dear valued customer, thank you for choosing to dine at Sky Cloud Restaurant. We apologize for any unpleasant dining experience caused by the menu issues. Our team has been in communication with the kitchen to strictly control the menu, and we appreciate your understanding and support. I am Sky Cloud Restaurant's Little Cloud, and I look forward to serving you again in the future!
translation.reference: Hello, dear customer, thank you for choosing Zhi Yun Restaurant, and we are deeply sorry for your unpleasant dining experience due to the issues of the dishes; we have communicated with the kitchen to strictly control the quality of dishes, and we would like to thank you for your understanding and support for us at the same time; we are Xiao Yun of Zhi Yun Restaurant, and we look forward to meeting you again!

translation.zh: 赴宴来支雲，留下好心情！
translation.en: Come to Zhi Yun and enjoy a pleasant meal!
translation.source: 赴宴来支雲，留下好心情！
translation.medium: Come to the banquet and support the cloud, and leave with a good mood!
translation.reference: Come to Zhi Yun and enjoy a pleasant meal!

translation.zh: 亲爱的顾客，感谢您对我们“小雲”的评价与支持，当我们用心烹饪的菜品得到您的肯定时，是我们最开心的时刻！
translation.en: Dear customer, thank you for you comment and support for “Xiao Yun”, and it is our happiest moment to win your affirmation for the food we carefully cooked!
translation.source: 亲爱的顾客，感谢您对我们“小雲”的评价与支持，当我们用心烹饪的菜品得到您的肯定时，是我们最开心的时刻！
translation.medium: Dear valued customer, thank you for your evaluation and support of our "Xiao Yun" dishes. When we receive your recognition, it is the happiest moment for us to use our heart to cook delicious dishes for you!
translation.reference: Dear customer, thank you for you comment and support for “Xiao Yun”, and it is our happiest moment to win your affirmation for the food we carefully cooked!

translation.zh: 期待与再此你相遇
translation.en: We look forward to meeting you again.
translation.source: 期待与再此你相遇
translation.medium: "Expecting to meet you again"
translation.reference: We look forward to meeting you again.

translation.zh: 亲爱的小主，首先非常感谢您的认可和评价，支雲会努力越做越好!
translation.en: Dear customer, we would like to first thank you for your affirmation and comment, and Zhi Yun will work hard and get better and better!
translation.source: 亲爱的小主，首先非常感谢您的认可和评价，支雲会努力越做越好!
translation.medium: Dear little master, first of all, I would like to express my gratitude for your recognition and evaluation, and I will strive to do better!
translation.reference: Dear customer, we would like to first thank you for your affirmation and comment, and Zhi Yun will work hard and get better and better!

translation.zh: 其次也特别感谢您在百忙之中的支持和点赞，祝您用餐愉快天天好心情!
translation.en: We would also love to thank you for your support and likes out of your busy schedule, and we wish you a happy meal time and good mood every day!
translation.source: 其次也特别感谢您在百忙之中的支持和点赞，祝您用餐愉快天天好心情!
translation.medium: 其次也特别感谢您在百忙之中的支持和点赞，祝您用餐愉快天天好心情！
translation.reference: We would also love to thank you for your support and likes out of your busy schedule, and we wish you a happy meal time and good mood every day!

translation.zh: 我不认为此举有任何帮助！
translation.en: I don’t think this act is helpful at all!
translation.source: 我不认为此举有任何帮助！
translation.medium: I don't think this will be of any help!
translation.reference: I don’t think this act is helpful at all!

translation.zh: 收到是金钱肚
translation.en: What I received is tripe.
translation.source: 收到是金钱肚
translation.medium: Received is a belly full of money.
translation.reference: What I received is tripe.

translation.zh: 订单是凤爪
translation.en: The order is chicken feet.
translation.source: 订单是凤爪
translation.medium: Order is a talon of a bird.
translation.reference: The order is chicken feet.

translation.zh: 好的，电话是 #PHONENUMBER#
translation.en: Okay, the phone number is #PHONENUMBER#.
translation.source: 好的，电话是 #PHONENUMBER#
translation.medium: "Good, the phone number is #PHONENUMBER#."
translation.reference: Okay, the phone number is #PHONENUMBER#.

translation.zh: 我需要留在对话里吗
translation.en: Do I need to stay in this conversation?
translation.source: 我需要留在对话里吗
translation.medium: Do I need to stay in the conversation?
translation.reference: Do I need to stay in this conversation?

translation.zh: 我#NAME#打电话跟你们的 staff 说明了
translation.en: I #NAME# called your staff to explain it.
translation.source: 我#NAME#打电话跟你们的 staff 说明了
translation.medium: I called your staff and explained everything to them.
translation.reference: I #NAME# called your staff to explain it.

translation.zh: 你们的骑手告诉我说地址太远
translation.en: Your delivery person told me the address is too far.
translation.source: 你们的骑手告诉我说地址太远
translation.medium: Your driver told me the address is too far.
translation.reference: Your delivery person told me the address is too far.

translation.zh: 大美360集成家装
translation.en: Damei 360 Integrated Home Decoration
translation.source: 大美360集成家装
translation.medium: 大美3
translation.reference: Damei 360 Integrated Home Decoration

translation.zh: 地 址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼
translation.en: Address: Happy Home Building 12, South Ring Road 156
translation.source: 地 址：环城南路156号幸福家园12楼
translation.medium: Address: South Road of the Ring, No. 156, Happy Family Garden, 12th Floor.
translation.reference: Address: Happy Home Building 12, South Ring Road 156

translation.zh: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
translation.en: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.
translation.source: 一开始是朋友介绍的因为信任，所以选择来看一下起初我的预算是7万做个基本装修。
translation.medium: At the beginning, it was introduced by a friend because of trust, so I chose to come and take a look at the initial budget of 70,000 yuan for basic renovation.
translation.reference: I trusted it because my friend made the recommendation, so I chose to check it out, and originally my budget for a basic decoration was 70,000.

translation.zh: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
translation.en: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.
translation.source: 来到店里就开始一系列的骗术。
translation.medium: As soon as you enter the store, a series of tricks begin.
translation.reference: A series of scam began as soon as I came into the store.

translation.zh: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
translation.en: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.
translation.source: 我是第一次到店只是给他们看了我的户型图，他们并没有去实地量过房子，他们居然就能给我报价说我的135的房子7万是可以搞定的，大概的给我看了一下他们的材料也并不知道他们是什么品牌的材料。
translation.medium: I went to the store for the first time just to show them my model drawing. They didn't measure the actual house, but they were able to give me a quote saying that my 135 square meter house could be done for 7 million. They basically showed me their materials, but I didn't know what brand of materials they were.
translation.reference: When I first came to the store, I showed them my floor plan; although they didn’t really go to my apartment to take the measurement, they said they could do it within 70,000 for my 135 square meters apartment, and they showed me their materials whose brand was unclear.

translation.zh: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
translation.en: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.
translation.source: 他们的第二套骗术就是你只要到店就会拖着你把定金交了（而这个钱一旦交了你是永远退不出来，除非你有足够的经历和他们打理论战）。
translation.medium: Their second trick is that you'll be dragged to the store and forced to pay the deposit (once you've paid the deposit, you'll never be able to get it back, unless you have enough experience and can handle the theory war with them).
translation.reference: The second scam was forcing you to pay the deposit, which cannot be refunded once paid, unless you have enough experience to reason with them.

translation.zh: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
translation.en: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.
translation.source: 我在犹豫要不要交定金的时候，他们就会邀请他们所谓的经理来告诉你，你今天只要把定金交了我们就能给你多少的优惠。
translation.medium: When I was hesitating whether to pay the deposit or not, they would invite their so-called manager to tell you that if you pay the deposit today, we can give you a certain amount of discount.
translation.reference: As I hesitated about whether to pay the deposit, they would invite their so-called manager to tell me that once I paid the deposit on that day, they could give me certain discount.

translation.zh: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
translation.en: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.
translation.source: 这个就是一个大坑，我就是活生生被骗的例子，在头脑冲动的时候，交了一万多的定金。
translation.medium: This is a big pitfall, and I am an example of being cheated alive. When my brain was in a rush, I paid a deposit of over 10,000 yuan.
translation.reference: This is a big swindle, and I was a victim who paid a deposit of more than 10,000 when I didn’t really think it through.

translation.zh: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
translation.en: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.
translation.source: 他给我的报价有很多问题7万不包括水电改造，不包括任何门和橱柜 浴室，而这三个就是基装的费用大头。
translation.medium: He gave me a quote with many questions. The price is 7 million without including water and electricity renovation, and it doesn't include any doors or cabinets. The bathroom is also not included in the basic costs.
translation.reference: Their quoted price had a lot of problems; for instance, the 70,000 didn’t include water and electricity renovation, doors, cabinets or bathrooms, and these three take up a large proportion of the cost of basic installation.

translation.zh: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
translation.en: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.
translation.source: 除去这些他们的服务点费收的也比其他家公司的高。
translation.medium: They charge more for their service points than other companies do.
translation.reference: Apart from these, their service point fee is also higher than that of other companies.

translation.zh: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
translation.en: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.
translation.source: 我对这个公司失去了信任，一开始什么都没有讲清楚就让我签合同。
translation.medium: I lost trust in this company. At the beginning, nothing was clear and they made me sign a contract.
translation.reference: I’ve lost trust in this company, because they asked me to sign the contract when they didn’t explain anything clearly.

translation.zh: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
translation.en: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.
translation.source: 当我去找他们退钱的时候他们表现出很有经验的样子，有专门的小团队来对付你。
translation.medium: When I went to get my money back from them, they acted like they had a lot of experience and had a special team to deal with me.
translation.reference: When I went to ask for a refund, they acted rather experienced and sent a small team to deal with me.

translation.zh: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。
translation.en: Anyway, they just said it was the client’s problem and they had absolutely no responsibility for it.
translation.source: 无论如何都会一口咬死是客户的问题他们全然无责。
translation.medium: No matter what, it will be the customer's problem, and they are completely innocent.
translation.reference: Anyway, they just said it was the client’s problem and they had absolutely no responsibility for it.

translation.zh: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
translation.en: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.
translation.source: 各种推卸责任，还有很多细节，不想一一说了都是泪，总之不要选择他们，因为我朋友找他们装修的房子也是质量不好，后期给你算各种费用。
translation.medium: There are various responsibilities, and there are many details. I don't want to say them all, but basically, don't choose them. My friend found their services for renovating a house, and the quality was not good. They will charge you various fees in the later stage.
translation.reference: They just shrunk their responsibility in any way possible, and there were a lot more details that I don’t want to mention now; all in all, do not choose them because my friend had them renovate her apartment, and the quality was poor and they would charge you all kinds of other costs in the later stage.

translation.zh: 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。
translation.en: Swindle; they used to be the swindler company Longtou Renovation, then it’s changed to Damei, and now it seems they have closed down and changed into something else.
translation.source: 坑爹，他们就是原来骗人的龙头装饰，现在改成大美，好像又倒闭了又改成其他的。
translation.medium: The scam artist, they were originally the decoration of the scam, now they have become big and beautiful, as if they have collapsed and changed into something else.
translation.reference: Swindle; they used to be the swindler company Longtou Renovation, then it’s changed to Damei, and now it seems they have closed down and changed into something else.

translation.zh: 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。
translation.en: So please don’t choose such a swindler company.
translation.source: 所以大家别选择这样坑爹的装修公司。
translation.medium: So everyone should avoid choosing such a shitty interior design company.
translation.reference: So please don’t choose such a swindler company.

translation.zh: 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。
translation.en: When you choose renovation companies in the future, please search them on Baidu because renovation cost is not a small amount.
translation.source: 以后大家在选择的时候多百度看看这些查一下这些咨询因为装修不是小钱。
translation.medium: In the future, everyone should pay more attention to these consultations and inquiries when choosing, because renovation is not a small matter.
translation.reference: When you choose renovation companies in the future, please search them on Baidu because renovation cost is not a small amount.

translation.zh: 想要向商家提问，请先登录或注册
translation.en: If you want to ask the merchant a question, please log in or register first.
translation.source: 想要向商家提问，请先登录或注册
translation.medium: To ask a question to the merchant, please log in or register first.
translation.reference: If you want to ask the merchant a question, please log in or register first.

translation.zh: 严禁发布各种形式的商家点评，详细请见商户收录声明
translation.en: It is strictly prohibited to publish any type of merchant review, and please refer to the Merchant Inclusion Statement for details.
